name: Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin E
about: What it is: A full coverage, natural matte foundation that lasts up to 24 hours and delivers waterproof, sweat, humidity and transfer-resistant wear...Coverage: Full..Finish: Matte..Formulation: Liquid..Ingredient Callouts: Free of mineral oil and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance...What Else You Need to Know: This liquid foundation has a breathable formula with hyaluronic acid, vitamin E, moringa seed extracts and prebiotics. Chromium Oxide Green pigments were added to create shades for olive skin tones that arenu2019t too yellow or orange, and Ultra Marine Blue pigments create deep shades without gray cast...Clinical Results: In a study of 193 participants:.- 97% liked the new formula.- 90% liked the original formula
ingredients: Water, Dimethicone, Isododecane, Alcohol Denat., Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Butyleneglycol, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Perlite, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Moringa Oleifera Seed Extract, Polymnia Sonchifolia Root Juice, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Glycerin, Dipentaerythrityl Tetrahydroxystearate/ Tetraisostearate, Alpha-Glucan Oligosaccharide, Sodium Hyaluronate, Silica, Silica Silylate, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Cellulose, Aluminum Hydroxide, Magnesium Sulfate, Nylon-12, Disodium Phosphate, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Isopropyl Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Hydrogen Dimethicone, Citric Acid, Diisopropyl Sebacate, Bis-Peg/Ppg-14/14 Dimethicone, Lactobacillus, Maltodextrin, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Bht, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol; May Contain: Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxides
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.How to Apply: .- Step 1: Shade match! Shade numbers have changed with this reformulation. Take a look at the conversion chart to easily find your new shade! .- Step 2: Prep your skin with Advanced Genifique Radiance Boosting Face Serum for added hydration. .- Step 3: For long-wear and a smoother canvas, apply oil-free La Base Pro Perfecting and Smoothing Makeup Primer. .-Step 4: Apply the foundation with your favorite tool. Apply with a foundation brush for maximum coverage and a flawless result. Apply with a damp sponge for medium-to-full coverage and a dewy makeup look. Apply with fingers for the lightest application and a no makeup makeup look .....Pro tip:.For a radiant foundation finish, mix a drop of Advanced Genifique Radiance Boosting Face Serum or your favorite moisturizer with your foundation before applying. .....Diving Deeper Into Foundation Color Match:.Find your undertone.-Cool: Bare skin usually burns easily in the sun. Veins appear blue. .-Neutral: Bare skin has combination of both cool and warm undertones. Veins appear a mix of green and blue. .-Warm: Bare skin appears golden/yellow and tans easily in the sun. Olive skin can sometimes skew warm as well for those with a slightly more gold hue. Veins appear green.

reviews.review_text: I was so upset when I found out they changed the shade numbers. I went without makeup for months because I knew I'd have to go in the store for a shade match. This color is perfect and the formula is ud83dudd25!  I'm glad I stuck with my old faithful Lancome.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of two foundations at Sephora without breakout triggers for me and it didnu2019t break me out so thatu2019s something. It also did wear long but not well. Every time Iu2019ve worn this I would have preferred to wear nothing. It looks that bad! Emphasis on texture, pores and dryness  yet my skin feels super oily with it on? It just looks really bad after about 20 minutes on. The worst thing about this though is it plays horribly with every product it goes on with. Serum, primer, moisturizer etc I have to literally wear nothing under this product or it ballls up and flakes off very badly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this formula. Thin, full coverage foundation. I pump coveraged my entire face and was FLAWLESS! Lasted all night, partner with Milk matte setting spray.  Worth every penny!!!! ud83dude18ud83eudd70

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my perfect foundation. I have oily skin and Iu2019m in my late thirties. This is perfect for me. It not only stays put but it feels lightweight and flawless!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally my favorite foundation ever. It stays on, blurs, and has a soft matte finish. Perfect for combo and oily skin!! Doesnu2019t break me out. However, it does clog my pores however that could be my makeup removing routine. BUY THIS!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Horrible formula. I have combo skin. This stuff is too watery, not full coverage, transfers, doesnu2019t last all day, it smells bad, and worst of all, oxidizes in just a few hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing color match for my olive tan skin, hard to nail the undertone in foundations so this is a godsend for olive skin ! :)

reviews.review_title: New formula is not as good
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ugh the old formula was way better. This has consistently been too liquidy to evenly apply and then too dry as it sets on my face, despite trying different exfoliants and setting spray and primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation gives a natural skin finish. I have oily skin and it doesnu2019t leave my skin greasy and shiny. I havenu2019t broken out either, which is a huge plus for my problem skin type. Reduces redness and covered up blemishes and dark spots fairly well. I recommend giving it a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Was hesitant to buy this due to purchasing the wrong Shade but the shade that I got was true to color love how it feels light weight but covers all my blemishes. Definitely I foundation to buy and try it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 250W - For light to medium skin with warm/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Hi all! I received the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation from Influenster as a complimentary package. Lancu00f4me is a great brand, always smells great, still the wrong shade but overall itu2019s pretty good regarding coverage, finish, and texture

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 097N - for fair skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my second time investing in this incredible product. Looking back, I realize I was far too harsh in my first review. I was in such a frantic rush, desperately slathering on foundation just to beat the impending expiration date. When I snagged it during a sale, I couldnu2019t shake the feeling that it was just a last-ditch effort to clear out soon-to-expire stock. Yet, despite my previous experience, I let excitement take the reins once more when I saw it on sale again. Thankfully, this time it doesnu2019t expire until next yearu2014what a relief! Now, as I apply a delicate amount, itu2019s like a weight has lifted; it feels as if Iu2019m wearing nothing at all! And yet, astonishingly, it delivers full coverage. I'm truly enchanted!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 097N - for fair skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and have had my cystic acne under control for years. I swapped over from ester lauder to Lancu00f4me for my foundation and it has been my biggest mistake. My skin is no longer smooth and flawless and the only thing I can attribute this to is the change in foundation. After researching I found out this product has an ingredient which causes fungal acne. EW! I wish I hadnu2019t bought this in anticipation of my ester lauder running out! 3/4ths of my bottle is wasted.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 355N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do enjoy this foundation. The coverage is nice. It stays on all day. I am combination skin and I do get shiny towards the end of the day. Just be aware the shade 355N is straight up grey in color. No other tones to it. I have to mix it with two other shades to get close to my skin tone (medium neutral-cool olive).

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 135N - For fair to light skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far, one of the best foundations I have ever used. I use it everyday, I never break out and it lasts allllll day with no issues!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: 10/10 this is hands down the best long wearing full coverage foundation. Made me look airbrushed from 4:00 til 12:00am

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 310N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I  loved this Lancome long wear matte foundation.  It went on smooth, matched my skin color perfectly, and stayed on all day.  I would recommend to any family and friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this matte foundation, itu2019s like medium coverage to me and didnu2019t cause any breakouts on my skin , easy to apply but you will need a double cleanse to get it off your faceu2026

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 345N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received this  Idole foundation I tried as a sample first time , in exchange for my honest review and loved it from the beginning, so I bought the whole product. Right off the bat I noticed it has lots of color to chose from, and

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this foundation for over a year now and it is the absolute best. Itu2019s buildable to full coverage but it has the most amazing natural finish. It is so dreamy and I will continue to repurchase it for EVER.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great foundation that is lightweight, buildable, and long wearing. I have sensitive skin and this product did not irritate it. I like that there is no heavy fragrance. The only thing is that it doesn't blur imperfections and texture as well as I would like, so make sure you use primer and create a good base underneath.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who lives in a very sunny and hot location in the US, wearing sunscreen and makeup with SPF is very important to me, especially in my 40's. I have been using Teint Idole for a few weeks and am SO happy and impressed with it. here's what I love.  No Sweating/beading: I tend to sweat a lot from my face, and unfortunately most tinted moisturizers with SPF tend to run right off of my face, leaving me vulnerable to the sun. This AMAZING formula locks into place, without feeling heavy, and does not sweat off or bead up on me. On that fact alone I am sold.  Formula: I love the pleasant light scent of this foundation, and as someone with fragrance sensitivity it causes me no problems. And even though it's matte, it looks natural on my skin, not chalky or cakey like mattes tend to do.  Color matching: I tried 345N and it's a great match for my tan, golden peachy skin tone. Also, as someone who has trouble reading tiny print, I LOVE that they add a little sticker on the back of the bottle with the color number code.   Overall, I am really pleased with this foundation. It makes my skin look nicer, while not sweating or running off, and has SPF, which I absolutely want to ensure I have on me. This one is joining the rotation and I will purchase when it runs out!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 345N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the feeling of this foundation. Itu2019s very lightweight and build able. It has great coverage without looking cakey. The color match on my skin is spot on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation! This foundation feels very lightweight on the skin but gives amazing coverage. It evens out my skin tone, hides redness, and covers any little blemishes without looking heavy. One of the best things about this foundation is how long it lasts. I put it on in the morning, and it still looks fresh by the evening without needing to touch it up. It also has a natural matte finish that looks smooth but not dry, so my skin looks polished but not shiny. Itu2019s very easy to apply, whether I use a brush, sponge, or even my fingers. I just need a small amount to cover my whole face, so the bottle lasts a long time, which makes it worth the price. The color range is fantastic, so itu2019s easy to find a perfect match for my skin tone. Overall, I highly recommend the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation if you want a long-lasting, full-coverage foundation that still feels light and natural. Itu2019s perfect for everyday use and even special occasions.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 100W - For fair skin with warm/yellow undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this product after the first use! It doesnu2019t have that cakey look after applying. It also isnu2019t super thick but covers like it should!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation from Lancome !!! It last long all day. I love how easy it blends on my skin and very lightweight. This foundation brings a smooth and medium coverage,  not too thick which I love the most. But if you have a dry skin, should put on moisturizer really well before use this foundation or it will dry out your skin after. Overall, I really like this Foundation and it will be my Favorite One. Highly recommend!!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 245C - For light to medium skin with cool/rosy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this foundation is a pretty great option for people looking for something that won't look different every day. Whether my skin was more dry or more oily that day, it still had the same finish and had similar lasting power. This is foundation, and looks as such, so don't expect it to look like a BB cream or a tinted sunscreen, but it definitely does it's job. As with all my other experiences with foundation, it does settle into pores a little bit and will emphasize your texture if it is particularly visible. It has great coverage and doesn't look cakey as long as you don't apply too much -- a little goes a long way! I found blending it out with a damp sponge was my favorite way to apply this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute favourite foundation ever! I'm a little sad by the change in formula but I typically mix two shades now and that's fine!

reviews.review_title: A must have of you have large pores and oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: An everyday foundation that doesn't accentuate pores or look cakey. It's the best foundation for oily skin and large pores. One recommendation: use a moisturizer as it can be a bit drying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a 50 year old woman, finding a foundation that doesnu2019t settle into fine lines or wrinkles is key.  If it also offers additional benefits such as hydration and brightening, that is a bonus.  I was given a sample of the Lancome Teint Idole Ultra Wear and it exceeded my expectations.  It was creaseless and left my skin smooth and even.  If is a full coverage foundation and a little goes a long way.  The beautiful finish left me with a healthy glow all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used the Lancome shade finder and my color match was 335W. This was too yellow for me to use it long term but I did do a quick look. This foundation worked well with my skincare products and blended well with both high end and drugstore products. I have combination skin and I didn't have a problem building coverage or patchiness. Overall I wouldn't mind trying this again on my own dime as long as I'm able to test shades in person.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m absolutely in love with this foundationu2019s formula! It has a beautifully smooth texture that blends seamlessly with my skin, giving me a natural, flawless look. What I love most is how buildable it is. I can layer it for a bit more coverage without it ever looking cakey or heavy. It feels lightweight on my skin, but still provides enough coverage to even out my complexion and hide any imperfections.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The shade was slightly darker than my skin color, perfect for my summer tan. This cover up lasted all day, and it didnu2019t feel heavy and oily. It had a light breathable coverage that hides all imperfections perfectly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised with how lightweight this foundation was, while being full coverage. I usually have a hard time with medium or full coverage  foundation because it becomes Cakey or makes my skin look flakey but not this one. It covers all the flaws I want it to but feels like I'm only wearing a bb cream. I would absolutely buy this product again.

reviews.review_title: great foundation is you can find your shade match
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome teint idole ultra wear foundation I chose the shade 345N but I feel like it is nowhere close to neutral. I was very disappointed with the shade range. I have neutral with warm olive undertones and the shade description for 345N seemed to be perfect. Other than disappointing shade range, I really like the sleek frosted bottle. I like the fact that it has SPF 15. Not that I rely on foundation for sun protection, but I'll take any extra protection. Despite being advertised as a matte foundation, I like the natural finish it provides. It has good coverage and sets on my skin after application. Overall it has the potential to be a great foundation, if you can find your perfect match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is very lightweight.  Not cakey at all. I like that it has SPF!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product. This foundation perfectly evened out my complexion. The color seemed to enhance my natural skin tone, and the full coverage liquid minimized all of my skin concerns or blemishes. I will continue using this product and will fully recommend this product to all of my friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation is wonderful. It provides a nice coverage while feeling incredibly lightweight on my skin.The finish is natural- not cakey, and it stays put without needing constant touch-ups. Perfect for anyone looking for a foundation that lasts and feels barely there. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a cc cream wearer for the past 10 years. I love the dewy look and youthful texture. This was my first time using a matte product that looked like my natural skin and non drying. It layered well with my moisturizer and blush and bronzers and made my skin look even. The color was the best match out of any foundation Iu2019ve ever tried. And the packaging looks high end on my counter top.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a bottle of Lancome Teint Idole Ultra Wear foundation from BzzAgent in exchange for my honest review. I normally wear a skin tint or Mac Studio face and body foundation since I can't stand the heavy feeling of a foundation or the make-up'y look of it but I like to have more coverage for certain occasions. I was pleasantly surprised that I can get medium coverage and long wear with Lancome Teint Idole Ultra Wear foundation without any of the negatives, so thank you Bzz Agent for the free product. I wore it to a dance class and it stayed and kept my face natural rather than shiny looking through it as well as several hours later without touchups. Love the beautiful glass bottle, which feels solid and looks great on my bathroom countertop. Pump works well, too, and doesn't spew out too much product. It did make my pores look more noticeable, which is why I gave this foundation 4 and not 5 stars, so a good primer and skin prep are essential before using it. For reference, I have normal to slightly dry aging olive light medium skin with neutral undertones and 330N was a near perfect match for me.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 115C - For fair skin with cool/pinky undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this foundation for a couple weeks, and its solid, but doesn't beat out my personal favorite.  It goes on smooth and provides great coverage with excellent staying power.  It just feels a little heavier than I like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this foundation for a few weeks and it has a good amount of coverage and is easy to apply. I do have to use a specific primer with it or else it starts pilling for me. other than that i like the finish that his foundation has

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best foundations I have used in a while! Has a beautiful matte finish and feels very lightweight, while still being full coverage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After trying this product for the last few weeks, I have fallen in LOVE. My skin is combo and the coverage lasted all day. No break up at the end of my shifts. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s not my favorite foundation but I do like it for a quick optio. For light weight coverage.   I received this as a gift for review

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 305N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation.. Feels great on skin. Smooths out look of skin. Leaves skin glowing and hydrated. Lasts all day!

reviews.review_title: Iu2019m never going back to my previous product !
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried this skin tint and was thoroughly impressed. The lightweight formula felt breathable on my skin, making it perfect for all-day wear. It provided long-lasting coverage without leaving any streaks, which is a huge plus for me.  As someone with sensitive skin, I was relieved to find that I had no adverse reactions to the ingredients. My skin felt comfortable and looked fresh throughout the day. Overall, this skin tint is a fantastic choice for anyone seeking a natural look with great staying power. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 305N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really great foundation. I loved the feel of it going on and it is definitely long wearing. This would be a great foundation for events! I'd definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Some of the best foundation Iu2019ve used. Easy to apply and doesnu2019t leave blotchy marks.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for hot and humid weather!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation sunscreen foundation was great! It provided full coverage and blended so well. This product made my skin look glass clear, and it covered any blemishes/imperfections that I had. It truly was a matte finish and even being in the Florida heat and humidity it did not budge. The pump applicator made it so easy to apply the product to my face and with having sunscreen built in, it cut down on my routine time! Lancu00f4me offers over 50 shades for any skin color. I love it and would definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 310N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: amazing on the skin really smooth and hydrating love is so much would recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First time using this brand and I really like it is lightweight has good coverage and you can build up the coverage without looking cakey the only thing is that  oxidases a little bit

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 355N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm unable to give a proper review due to this was an error on my end. I received the Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation as part of a free promotion and i selected color 355N under the pretenses of what I THOUGHT to be the shade I needed....it indeed was NOT. But not due to anything outside of ME selecting the wrong color choice for my skin tone. So unfortunately I was unable to review the product properly.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 305N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Buzz Agents sampling program. This foundation ended up being a good color match as well as lasted well throughout the day and outside at a concert. Unfortunately, I have acne prone, sensitive skin and the next day I broke out with several little whiteheads around my mouth, most likely relating to the sunscreen in the foundation as my face tends to break out from chemical related sunscreen. Unfortunately I will not be using again but when I wore it, it looked great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for a review. Firstly, the container is very weighty and feels luxurious. I like the pump dispenser. It makes it mess-free. The consistency is smooth and creamy. Spreads very easily. I applied it using a beauty blender. It sinks into the skin so quickly and easily. It looks extremely natural. It is a buildable formula. I started off with very little, and it let my natural blush peek through. When I added more, it covered all the redness on my cheeks easily. I love how quickly it blends into the skin. Iu2019m super impatient and canu2019t handle makeup that I have to sit there and blend for a while to get a seamless look. It leaves my skin matte, but not dry or tight feeling. I applied blush over it once and it applied well. The foundation didnu2019t move around. In the included photo, I am wearing no makeup other than this foundation and a lip oil.

reviews.review_title: Lancome Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. Builds nicely. Feels great in skin. Smooths out look of skin. Leaves skin glowing and hydrated. Lasts all day!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the ease of putting it on and how easy it was to blend. For me a little went a long way as I donu2019t like to put tons of make up on my face

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: iu2019ve been trying this out for a month now and it is incredible however, it does not match my exact shade so I will be rebuying in something similar to my skin tone. It leaves my skin feeling so smooth and even, no one can ever tell that iu2019m wearing something on my face. Really natural smooth finish, no weird smell and amazing applicator. THE PACKAGING IS BEAUTIFUL TOO!! Such high quality product that I will never stop recommending, really long lasting too!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has lightweight, buildable coverage and a matte finish. My makeup looks fresh after a full day and I love that the foundation has SPF and saves me an extra step in my skincare routine. The shade range for this line of foundation is incredible!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this Lancome Teint Idol Ultra Wear Foundation. I have combination skin and tend to end up a bit oily by the end of the day, but this foundation actually held up pretty well and still looked good at the end of the day. I like that its buildable and I don't have to use a lot of product to get coverage and that it gives me a matte finish. Overall, I'm happy with this foundation and will continue to use it.

reviews.review_title: Amazing formula. Definitely worth the try!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the way this foundation feels! It feels so lightweight but the coverage is amazing and buildable. Bonus points for the included SPF = extra protection! Love that. The first time I wore it I thought it was too drying for my skin type, but after trying different skincare bases and primers I've found the perfect fit. One of the best foundation formulas especially if your skin is more on the oily side. The soft matte finish doesn't move throughout the day! My makeup base was flawless. I was unsure between two shades since I received this online and this one was perfect. Concealer blended in perfectly and was not left looking too patchy after powder. Amazed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation melts into your skin like butter & blends in so effortlessly. I use this product every single day & truly love it! Iu2019ve already ordered a second bottle! My new go too!

Other than that the formula feels nice on the skin ,itu2019s medium to full coverage and itu2019s buildable. It resists water pretty good. I noticed one thing as well, when I first pumped the foundation on my skin it seemed a match for my skin color but after I started to blend it , it started to change to a darker shade. Iu2019m not sure if this called oxidation but it hasnu2019t happened with the other foundations that I ever used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Full coverage foundation is typically never on my radar. Iu2019m usually medium or light coverage. This was quite a surprise. It goes on so smooth and blends well. Mixed well with my base and lasted all day.

reviews.review_title: Go into Sephora to get matched for your perfect sh
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation  Color: 215C - For light skin with cool/pinky undertones product as a free gift for my honest review.   Per the pictures you can see that I chose the wrong color, however the description of the foundation color was for my type of skin color. Which is rosy red.....  I thought it looked dark in the bottle, and as you can see by the pictures below, it doesn't look natural on me.  I had to put it on my neck and chest area . Then my arms were still red. Hahaha    I did look at other shades of the foundation on the sephora.com website, and it seems there are a few different shades that might work with similar descriptions.   There is 245c is for light/medium skintones with cool/rosy skin undertones and 320c is for medium skin with cool/rosy undertones   The product itself is lovely. I mixed mine with a little bit of my moisturizer and it went on like a dream. It does last a good portion of the day. I sweat alot on my forehead, It stayed on. A+ for me. It doesn't smell like sunscreen. A+ for me.  I looked at the ingredients and WOW! I don't know if any of them were good? If your skin reacts to alcohol then this one isnt for you.    Outside of the shade not matching me. I love the product. It has good coverage, as you can see below in the pictures that it covered my rosy red skin.   What do you think about the shade on me?  I'm not really a fan. Lol   If you are interested in this and you've never used it. I suggest going into Sephora and get matched with their little device that they hold up to your face and it chooses a shade to try. I dont know the name of the device. Lol  I hope this helps anyone struggling to pick a shade. I know I did and it still wasn't the right one. Lol  Ladies, have a great day!

Definitely upgrading to this from my old Lu2019Oreal drugstore spf foundation. Would recommend to a friend!

reviews.review_title: New Foundation added to my Collection!

reviews.review_text: I was given this foundation to make a true and honest review. After using this foundation for the past two weeks, I'm in love with it!! Yes it is watery, but that allows you to begin at the center of your face and work your way outwards. The longevity is also a big plus for me. It held up extremely well from 6:00am until 2:00am. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in love with this foundation it has perfect coverage and it's so buildable that I can use it for both everyday occasions and is also good for the nightlife.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation in Color: 225N. It goes on smoothly and feels incredibly lightweight, almost as if Iu2019m not wearing foundation. The matte finish is flawless, providing just the right amount of coverage without feeling heavy. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! For me, a little goes a long way I like to touch up my imperfections and dark circles before work. Itu2019s buildable coverage and lasts all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome kindly gave me this foundation for free so that I could review it. Even though this particular bottle was gifted, I have purchased this foundation myself, multiple times, in the past. The Teint Idole foundation is a classic, and for good reason! It goes on so smooth leaving such a beautiful natural semi matte finish. I love how natural I can make this foundation look, but can also build on it when I need additional coverage. My favorite days to wear this foundation is when I want minimal makeup. I can use this foundation, a little concealer, mascara, and lipgloss and look so put together for work zoom calls. The glass bottle is slim, attractive, and does not take up much room in my makeup bag. As far as longevity goes, it stays on a lot longer during the colder months on my semi oily skin. However, I still wear it on warm days, when I do not need to have it on for longer than six hours, and have it wear down beautifully. Overall, I think this foundation continues to be a cult favorite and I see myself repurchasing it in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Literally one of my favorite foundations ever! I look flawless when I wear it and it's buildable coverage.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 305N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones

I will continue to try it out, but at this point, I donu2019t know that I would buy it again.

reviews.review_title: Lives up to its name, great quality and function!

I would definitely recommend Lancome Tient Idole 24 hour long-wear Matt foundation for your more put-together looks!

This was just ok for me. I thought that the application was good and it wasn't too heavy, but the coverage wasn't what I was looking for. It was very runny and hard to keep on my hands or the sponge. Also, my face continued to feel moist while wearing it instead of having a nice feeling that it had set.

The color unfortunately was subtly different from my other 215C, a little darker and more yellow on my skin. So be sure to test the color first if youu2019re allowed. reviews.review_title: Definitely added to my favorite foundations
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted Lancome Teint Ultra Wear for my honest review and let me just say I was very impressed with the coverage and how this felt on. I have sensitive skin so many foundations break me out but this one didn't.  Love this foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I find that with this matte foundation, I still need to set it with powder since I have combination skin. I love that the coverage is buildable, and it does a great job covering my redness. The formula is on the more liquid side, but a little goes a long way! Overall, I enjoy the coverage, though I personally prefer my foundation to be a bit less liquid.

reviews.review_title: A nice addition to my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was given the opportunity to try Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation Color: 305N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones for free in exchange for an unbiased review.  This is the first time I have tried a Lancu00f4me product and was skeptical about trying it since my normal foundation changed formula and began drying out my skin and sinking into my fine lines - I thought maybe it's my skin's new normal.  I was pleasantly surprised when I tried this product, and happy with the coverage.  The product is thin, but buildable. With it being thin, it does not feel heavy and I was able to wear it for a full day without feeling like I was wearing makeup.  The wear time was also fantastic and there was no need to reapply or touch up.  I also found that it did not sink into my fine lines like my other foundation.  I will say, it looked better with my Mattifying primer than my Hydrating primer, so make sure your primer has the same base as the foundation. The color was spectacular, and I'm happy to have find a shade that blends easily with my olive like complexion (with sun spots and redness of cheeks).  Upon removal, it removed easily leaving behind no residue or clogged pores.  The only con is the price, as it is not as budget friendly as the typical super market foundations. I would definitely recommend this to a friend, and an now interested in trying other Lancu00f4me products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I a received this complimentary product from Buzzagent & Lancu00f4me in exchange for my honest review. I recently tried the Teint Idole Ultra 24H Foundation, and it became a favorite. It has great coverage without feeling heavy on the face. It has a very thin consistency which makes it easy to apply in ultra thin layers.  I would definitely buy this again and highly recommend it to friends and family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is so nice! I've been using it for about 3 weeks now and I've gotten so many compliments on my skin looking so great and even. The coverage I would say it's medium to full. I do my foundation with a sponge which makes the coverage more of a medium which I love because I can build the coverage to my liking. It did oxidized a bit so do keep that in mind. But I would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my review. I found the Teint Idole Ultra Wear foundation to be long lasting and high coverage on my oily skin. The consistency is thin, and it gives a matte finish that doesnu2019t look cakey on me. It also didnu2019t highlight any texture too much. Thereu2019s a large shade range for medium/tan skin tones, and I didnu2019t notice any oxidization with shade 320C. I also appreciate the packaging, the bottle is nice glass and it has a pump that dispenses a good amount..

I love this foundation. Itu2019s perfect for days where I feel I need a little more coverage. I would say itu2019s not buildable because really this is all you need. Good product & not cakey as long as you apply moisturizer or primer prior

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have some pretty fickle skin due to rosacea.  As a result, I have some rosacea and acne scarring that I am always trying to cover up with a full coverage, long wear foundation that doesnu2019t cake and actually lasts the entire day. Prior to this I was using Tarte Amazonian clay and Clinique, but the tarte seemed to cake on and the Clinique didnu2019t last all day. I recently tried this Lancu00f4me long wear and itu2019s perfect. It applied well with a brush or a sponge. It lasts all day without making me oily looking. It covers well without looking  caked on. And the best part is it doesnu2019t break me out. This is my new favorite foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thin. Leaves a little too much shine for my taste. You can layer but then youu2019ll feel like you have a mask on.

reviews.review_title: Light, buildable coverage, does not dry out skin.

reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation for about 3 weeks. It is great, the coverage is buildable, and the shade was a perfect match. It is not heavy at all, and my skin looks soft all day long. I got this product for free in exchange for a review, but I would definitely buy.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 310N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: A must-have longwear foundation, new favorite

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little hesitant to try this because I like a more natural coverage and Iu2019ve always felt like Lancu00f4me products are heavy. On days that I want less coverage, I will mix it with some face cream and tap it on; I can also use it as a spot concealer if needed. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The 225N Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation has a creamy blend able texture that glides on flawlessly.  Drys fast. Lasted all day long. I have combination skin and the matte foundation worked great. I will continue to use this foundation. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using it a couple times i can see i love this foundation! I have combo skin and it kept me from getting oily and it lasted all day the coverage was also really nice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never wear foundation but this one is literally my favorite Iu2019ve tried so far. Itu2019s very light weight but buildable and breathable. The color match was very easy to pick and comes with a good amount of shades! Will definitely be letting people know about this and purchasing again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. Goes on smooth and flawless with looking caked on. Last most of the day without having to refresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I usually donu2019t wear foundation because I feel like itu2019s too heavy. I donu2019t like the way it makes my face feel like Iu2019m wearing a thick mask that makes me feel claustrophobic.  Also, Iu2019ve ever found a shade that truly matched my skin tone. Iu2019m Asian but Iu2019m neither dark nor pale. I donu2019t have a strong yellow undertone but itu2019s not blue either.   I was shocked when I tried Lancu00f4meu2019s TIU MATTE In 305N. Just looking at the bottle, I assumed that it would be wayyy too dark. Once I put it in my face,  I was pleasantly surprised! The foundation disappeared so quickly and seamlessly that I couldnu2019t even tell where I applied the foundation on the first place. The fact that this foundation has SPF is a bonus. Itu2019s breathable. It covers the redness and it stays and itu2019s light and most importantly it makes me feel prettyu2026.-er!!

reviews.review_title: A New Staple on My Vanity!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am 50 years old and struggling with perimenopausal skin issues; redness, breakouts, sweating and dry patches. Iu2019ve found this foundation to apply very nicely, not sticking to my problem areas. Iu2019m able to achieve a sufficient level of coverage with only one application and donu2019t find that I need subsequent layers. When I sweat, I pat my skin with minimal to no transfer which is such a relief. I donu2019t detect any overwhelming fragrance from this foundation, either; another big plus! The matte finish is more of a natural matte than one that looks chalky or too dry. I typically do not follow up with powder, but Iu2019m confident you could without it looking dry. I live in the humid state of Florida, and my wear with this foundation given my skin issues and the humid environment has been fantastic. I usually only have makeup on 6-8 hours when I wear it but Iu2019m confident this would last longer if and I when I need it to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you Lancu00f4me for the free 345N Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation. I have used this foundation for various events and I have loved it. I love that you canu2019t see my pimples. It lasted all day. I love knowing it works as sunscreen. I love the pump dispenser. I would definitely recommend!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 340W - For medium skin with warm/golden undertones

I did also notice my face would get itchy around my check. Not quite sure what it couldu2019ve been though. Possibly the sunscreen in it. So just be sure youu2019re double cleansing really well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I am normal to dry on the perimeter of me face with an oily t zone, after about 8+ hours of wear (no setting spray) I did notice it was sinking into lines and fading around my nostrils.   Overall I think this is a nice foundation and can be easily modified for longer wear with the use of a setting/finishing spray and adequate prep/primer.

My preferred way to use it is still mixed with a little bit of a tinted moisturizer to just give it a little more of a natural look, but again, that's because of my personal skin issues. I think if you usually prefer a matte formula that you would really enjoy this. And a huge added plus for me with my sensitive skin, no irritating fragrance!!!

I think that that is critical for wrinkle prevention, and having that included in my foundation is so convenient.  CON: The only con I noticed, an reason I gave it only 4 stars is that at the end of the night when I went to go remove my makeup, I noticed it some cracking and lines in the area under my eyes. It seems it did not hold up as I was expecting it too. I did use a primer before hand and also used a setting spray after applying.  Overall, I would recommend this product for shorter durations rather than longer ones. I would not use this for a photosoot for example. I would certainly use it for every day short period usage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thanks Lancome for sent me this free sample through the BzzAgent sampling program. I am very amazed at how good it is and how beautiful it makes me feel because of how my skin looks. The inflatable one will be the new favorite in my makeup bag.

reviews.review_title: A LITTLE GOES A LONG WAY!

BUY THIS

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free to try through Bzz Agent to give my honest review.  My HONEST thought are I was pleasantly surprised by this foundation. It has buildable coverage but I will say I am not convinced it's 24 hr wear. I feel like compared to Estee Lauder Double wear it doesn't quite match on the longivity of the application. But it is still a nice foundation that I would consider rebuying. It does not feel cakey nor does it break me out. A little also goes a long way. I will say it is not quite hydrating so if you have a more dry skin it may sit more on that than help. Overall I was very happy with it and will continue to use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I probably shouldu2019ve called her in when I picked the color, as it wasnu2019t the best u201cshade matchu201d, but other than that I think it was pretty good!  Notes from my partner on how it went: she said make sure you have a good primer because it doesnu2019t cover texture well. It really is long wear. When itu2019s on, itu2019s on. Very full coverage, probably best for oily skin. (Posting from gfs Sephora account)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love how light weight this foundation is on my face.

I also really like the matte finish and felt that it held up well throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Long wear!!!!! love the coverage with this foundation

reviews.review_title: I would give it a try!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin

After using this product, I was really impressed at how I only need a little amount to get full coverage. I feel like with other brands I need a lot to get the full coverage and this one I didnu2019t. I really liked the matte finish and felt like it lasted really well. I did think the make up felt a bit heavier that what I am used to but I was still very happy with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This Lancu00f4me Tient Idole Ultra Wear is a beautiful foundation! The coverage is definitely fuller than I am used to (typically a tinted moisturizer girly) but it really does provide a solid finish. I usually use a beauty blender to apply my foundation, but I found that a brush works much better with this. The only complaint I have is that it definitely clings to the few dry patches I have. It looks lovely over the oilier areas! I think that the shade I received is just a tad too light for my current skin tone at end of summer, but will likely blend better in a couple of months. The packaging is sleek and very high end.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Estee Lauder continues to be a leader in the makeup industry with their tinted Matte foundation! It is a matte finish so it is perfect for my oily probe skin! It also has 25spf which is a plus on a foundation. I have large pores and this blends really well into my skin using a sponge or even my fingers. It has a buildable coverage which I love! ud83dudc95 Definitely recommend to someone looking for matte coverage with sun protection.

reviews.review_title: Smooth and comfortable for all day wear
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this product in exchange for my honest review. I have used this brand before, and I have had good results and experiences with their line. This foundation is medium coverage, and does not feel heavy on my face. It has a smooth matte finish and lasts all day. The color was a great match. I would purchase this product, most definitely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was really curious about this foundation, because I had heard from a friend that they really loved it. When it arrived I noticed that there was an additional label stuck on the bottle. It's meant to replace the original expiration date. I don't think this was a good move, especially without any explanation to potential customers that the product was going to be sent to. So I decided to try it on my hand first to see if there were any adverse effects. The color was perfect, but I intentionally applied it to dry skin to see how the foundation would hold up. It made the dry textured skin appear more textured, so the drying combination skinned need to be hyper aware of this. I love that it blends beautifully, and has a buildable coverage. It's lightweight and that's ideal for me. I started to look for more lightweight formulas as I've gotten older, wanting the no-makeup makeup look. The color was a perfect match, but I noticed that there weren't a ton of options available. It doesn't oxidize, but when it begins to dry down the color darkens and neutralizes just a bit. The texture feels really nice to the touch and didn't transfer easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has become part of my daily makeup routine. I love that it doesnu2019t crease and I donu2019t get as spiky as I usually do with other products after 12 hours. It blends in flawlessly and has a matte finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is fantastic! Thin consistency, yet good coverage which is my favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this actually! I received this product in exchange for honest review. It is one of the best true foundation products Iu2019ve tried in years. I primarily have been using a tinted spf and this was a great option for me to try since it does have spf and sometimes I want a little more coverage. Itu2019s lightweight and not a drying matte. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is just too good! I received the shade 215C which might be a little yellow for my complexion but blends in like a dream. Pressing the foundation with the brush into face keeps me from using too much and also allows me to build it up if needed. I am also impressed with the coverage. A tiny bit handles redness concerns and adding more will cover blemishes. As for longevity, I have worn this several times in a humid Florida climate and at the end of the day there's no visible separation or other issues. As with anything matte though I will always recommend a good skincare prep. Overall I would definitely recommend and plan to purchase more when I run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation in 125W (for fair to light skin with warm/yellow undertones), and overall, it has a nice texture. It feels great on my cheeks, blending smoothly without any issues. However, my nose area is always tricky, and this foundation didnu2019t quite work thereu2014it settled into my pores and made the whole area look flaky. To be fair, almost no foundation works well with my nose!  I think I probably need to hydrate better beforehand, especially around my nose. Since my primer is water-based, I skipped it the first time using the foundation, and it felt a bit too dry for me. Next time, Iu2019ll try it with a silicone-based primer to see if that helps with the dryness and flakiness.  On a positive note, the color match is spot on for my Northeast Asian skin tone, which I appreciated. Iu2019ll experiment with the primer and better hydration, but so far, itu2019s a solid foundation with potential if you prep your skin well!  Disclaimer: I received this product for free, but this is my honest review.

That being said, I tend to go for a less is more approach in my daily makeup wearing routine.
