reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was ok. I do not think that the shade was a little dark for me so it was difficult to even use. It did feel kind of heavy on the face which I donu2019t really like. I think that it was an ok product but there  are better ones to try.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 235N - For light to medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful lightweight medium coverage foundation! It is build able and it feels like you aren't wearing anything! Is now a staple in my makeup bag!

reviews.review_title: A foundation that is severely overlooked
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Over the past 8-10 years I've been trying luxury/higher price point full coverage foundations.  Marc Jacobs, Nars, Estee Lauder, etc.  I don't wear full coverage foundations like this daily, typically I opt for lightweight, buildable skin tints such as Glossier on the day to day.  But when I'm going out and want something that will last me all day and into the evening, I switch over to full coverage foundations.  This foundation by Lancome is the only one I've tried so far that does not look cakey at all on my skin and also does such a great job with coverage that I feel like I don't need to use any concealer.  Within the makeup influencer communities on Youtube and Tiktok, I feel like this foundation is greatly overlooked.  I don't see myself going back to the Nars foundation after trying this one out.

reviews.review_title: Mix with moisturizer, achieve dewy skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Buildable coverage and long wear make this foundation a winner. I'm not a fan of the matte finish, it's more of a powdery finish, and if say that's not great for aging skin. I'll stick to dewy finish. I was able to achieve a more subtle finish by mixing the foundation with my facial moisturizer. Another thing to note is that this shade is listed as a light to medium shade. It favors light. I gave it 4 stars because I do believe it is a high quality product with amazing claims. It just wasn't for my skin conditions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my stars! This gives me exactly what I what want in a foundation. It lasts all day, gives flawless coverage and doesnu2019t sit in my lines. Love love love it,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this foundation. The color match was great, it was a great consistency (not too thick and not too watery) it went on and absorbed in my skin well (I used a brush to apply) and it stayed on all day (I set it with powder) I really liked this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this foundation is amazing, goes on smooth and matches my skin tone perfectly for a flawless finish. for sure will be my new go to foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am highly obsessed with the results I have had from this product.  The foundation goes on extremely smooth and the color is perfectly matched to my skin and undertones. From a trusted brand I cannot recommend this product more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation give the perfect, flawless, airbrushed sort of finish that completely removes redness, dark circles, areas of pigmentation. It had a subtle glow, an expensive luminescence, yet the finish was velvety-matte.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine on no makeup makeup days
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is top quality. Looks like something youu2019d buy from Sephora! It does not clog your pores. Itu2019s full coverage- it really does cover everything. Itu2019s matte but leaves skin looking glowy and healthy at the same time. Great price! Works well with a brush, beauty blender or your fingers. Itu2019s buildable too- does not ever look cakey. Gives your skin a flawless finish when paired with the pressed powder from this line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a long-lasting and very full coverage foundation, yet it feels like you're wearing nothing. It is so light-weight and it lets my skin breathe. It feels less like a foundation and more like a moisturizer. I love that the coverage is buildable, but whether you prefer the lighter coverage or full on coverage, it still looks so natural and you still get that blurred, airbrushed effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using Lancu00f4me teint idole foundation for a week. I really do love the finish and it goes on smoothly over my skin care routine. I havenu2019t had no issues with fading or pilling. I do like the coverage. It is full coverage, but it is a buildable coverage. It does not feel heavy on my skin and experience no adverse reactions. I did receive sample but all opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. The application process is simple. A little bit goes a long way. The texture is great and it lasts all day long. It does not get Cakey like most foundations do. Over all my new favorite foundation.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful , Light weight Foundation.Give it a try!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product over the past two weeks I am impressed. I loved the warm/golden undertones and the natural glow this foundation gives me. The coverage was smoothing, covered my dark spots, lasted the whole day (in the Florida sunshine and heat ) and looked amazing on my skin. Key points that I love about this foundation; the matte look, that it is long wearing, breathable, lightweight and waterproof. I only gave 4 stars because I feel this color ; 335W is a tad dark. However, it is a beautiful color. Definitely, give this foundation a try. I feel you will not be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The foundation provides full coverage, and I love how it instantly smooths out my skin without feeling heavy. It hides imperfections, blemishes, and hyperpigmentation with ease. A little goes a long way, so you only need a small amount to get an even finish. It holds up against long days, humidity, and oiliness while giving my skin a flawless, polished finish. If youu2019re looking for a long-lasting foundation that still feels lightweight, this is a fantastic choice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I honestly am so picky with wearing foundations, but this one is my new favorite. It is very light weight and doesnu2019t feel too heavy caked on. It blends in nicely and stayed on all night through my shift. It does a great job covering up my blemishes. It has a dewy finish making my face look hydrated. I would recommend trying this product out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Never tried Lancu00f4me foundation before but have heard great things about the brand. It definitely lives up to its expectations. My makeup looked flawless and lasted all day when paired up with primer. It had that nice matte look and matched my skin pretty well. My pores were very well hidden.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was EVERYTHING. I work as an ER nurse and need something that has buildable coverage but also lightweight and lasts all day. This definitely checked all the boxes !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear foundation. The foundation gives a natural-looking medium coverage but dries very fast, so you need to blend quickly.  It oxidized quite a lot.  On the plus side, it didn't cause any skin reactions. Overall, it could be a good choice if you can find a shade that accounts for the oxidation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: - It blends like a dream. I applied it only with my fingers and didnu2019t need a brush or a sponge. Itu2019s spreads and blends it very evenly.  - Itu2019s extremely lightweight feeling. Canu2019t speak for visual coverage because I like a light/medium coverage so I didnu2019t try building it up. But after I applied it I completely forgot I was testing the product and accidentally went to bed without washing it off :/ - Itu2019s practically self setting. I donu2019t need to set this product with powder.  -Love thatu2019s thereu2019s sunscreen in it.  Cons: - I got the shade 355N and itu2019s too grey for me.  -Very silicone-y feeling when applying. probably why it blends so easily and it might just be the sunscreen component that makes it feel that way but I donu2019t particularly enjoy it.  - I have dry skin in the winter and I canu2019t see myself wearing this everyday because thereu2019s 0 moisture in it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used this product for a few weeks now. Iu2019m really loving the buildable coverage this foundation has. I will say the color was slightly off for me but I made it work. I enjoyed the way it felt on my skin but I did get some flaky bits around my nose even with primer and setting spray after a full day. I would otherwise recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in love with this, you can build the coverage, it is easy to handle, good coverage, feels light, good skin tones options, I used during a whole day and my make up looks amazing at night, for sure I will chose it again

reviews.review_title: A must try for neutral skin tones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been searching for AGES for a foundation that doesnu2019t turn orange once applied. I am neutral -olive toned and itu2019s so difficult to find a match that doesnt make me look orange. This is the winner!! 225 N to be exact.  If you struggle with the same thing I HIGHLY recommend trying this. The price point is well worth it. I will never use a different foundation. It applies evenly and doesnu2019t dry out my skin either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used the matching concealer before but never tried Lancome foundation. It has good coverage without feeling too heavy, especially as someone who normally wears BB cream. I was pleasantly surprised how long this lasted with only loose powder on top- no setting spray. I wore it all day at work and my skin still looked nice and even when I got home. I will be using this one until it's empty for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my review. Lancome TIU Matte in color 305N was great. I loved how it felt on my skin and blended very well. The shade matched very well. I would definitely recommend this foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my go to foundation the past couple weeks. I love the way it makes my skin look! The finish is perfect. It doesnu2019t look or feel heavy. It is buildable coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used this foundation a couple of times over the past few weeks. Itu2019s lightweight and buildable. This shade is perfect for my summer skin tone. Iu2019ll be purchasing another one for the winter months

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the consistency of the foundation. The fact that itu2019s really long lasting like it claims to be, makes it too tier. The coverage it provides is buildable. When I first applied it, it didnu2019t look like it matched my complexion. With a little time and blending with my other products, it looks fine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. It spreads pretty easily without leaving streaks. It is very light but still provides great coverage. It has SPF so that is definitely a plus. On the pricier side but worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The 305N Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation blew me away with its smooth, lightweight formula and incredible coverage u2013 I was genuinely shocked at how flawless it made my skin look. Itu2019s comfortable enough for all-day wear without feeling heavy or cakey. After this experience, I canu2019t wait to explore the rest of the products in the Teint Idole line!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far one of favorite foundations now! This is a long wear foundation it lasted 16 hours on my face and looked just as flawless as when I applied it! And it is the perfect match for my skin!!! And I have breakouts from some foundations and not one single breakout from this foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage is great. It does oxidize so it isnu2019t exactly the initial color when you apply it but the coverage is full. It is a bit heavy on the skin but if youu2019re looking for good coverage I would say itu2019s a good option to use for events and things.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: That is one of the greatest foundations I have tried, love the texture and how it feels, the only down side that it bakes in super dry places. Recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have been using product for the past week and I am happy with it. I would wear all day early morning till night and minimal issues. My face does  get oily so I would have to blot and put some powder not to have to much shine but foundation held up well. Only noticed a small bit of breakage around the creases of my nose but it was well into the day when noticed. Under my eyes it worked great. I used primer and applied with a brush and it worked well easy to apply. Would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation in shade 335W, and I must say, it has become a staple in my makeup routine!  Finish & Coverage: The foundation offers a beautiful natural matte finish that doesnu2019t look flat or cakey. It provides excellent buildable coverage, effortlessly evening out my skin tone while still allowing my natural skin to shine through. I love that I can wear it light for day looks or build it up for more coverage during the evenings.  Longevity: One of the standout features of this foundation is its staying power. It lasts all day without fading or settling into fine lines, even in humid conditions. Iu2019ve gone through long days and still looked fresh by evening, which is a huge plus for me.  Texture: The texture is lightweight and smooth, making it easy to blend. Whether I apply it with a brush or a sponge, it glides on effortlessly and doesn't feel heavy on the skin.  Shade Match: Shade 335W is a perfect match for my warm undertones. It doesnu2019t oxidize throughout the day, which is often a concern for me with other foundations. The range of shades available is impressive, catering to various skin tones.  Skin Compatibility: I have combination skin, and Iu2019ve experienced no breakouts or irritation while using this foundation. It has a lovely oil-control feature without being overly drying.  Overall Impression: The Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation in 335W is a fantastic investment for anyone looking for a reliable, long-lasting foundation that delivers on coverage and finish. Itu2019s suitable for both everyday wear and special occasions. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently started using this foundation and I have found that my skin is a bit sensitive right now with the weather changing. however, this foundation has a very smooth and even coverage which I appreciated since it hid my blemishes. I used this foundation with my daily primer and found that it held up well, however for longer days, I found that it worked best if it was set with some powder. I really enjoyed using this foundation and found that the coverage is buildable so i will use it in my routine for everyday but also some glam looks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It does exactly as states. I applied it in the morning before work and I didn't have to touch up much at all going out at night! I live in Houston and even with humidity it held up well. Didn't feel caked on at all it is light and breathable. Great for someone trying to cover up acne with not a heavy feeling. It left my skin glowing and skin looking smooth. It didn't break out any of my oily skin and hydrated more than anything. I would highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo skin and i loved this foundation. It doesn't dry out my face nor does it leave a greasy look. I love how its got almost a medium coverage but its also buildable. I use about two small pumps and its more then enough coverage for my face. The shade is just a tad lighter but i know it will work better in the winter for me since i tend to tan in the summer. I love this foundation and will def consider buying it in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: While this goes on very smoothly, I felt like it was very drying on my face and started to look cakey after just a short while of having it on. I do like that a little goes a long way and that the coverage level is buildable. It isn't my favorite foundation but it isn't the worst. I will likely continue using my sample but wouldn't buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can say that this product is good, unlike others I have tried, it doesn't break on your face, it has good hold, it fell perfectly on my skin and I was surprised at how perfect the 240W shade was for my skin tone. It is very light, not greasy and has a sun protection factor, it's great!!! Beneficial ingredients for your skin like hyaluronic acid, moringa extract and vitamin C. Good coverage and long lasting. So I would buy it and recommend it to friends and family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage was good but it felt and looked kinda cakey. It only lasted me 6hrs so it wasnu2019t ultra strong like it said. I have used other foundation from them and liked it so I was surprised that this one wasnu2019t good like the other ones I tried. I would not recommend and would not buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First, the shade range of this foundation is amazing.  Iu2019ve recently realized I have olive undertones and I was able to find the perfect shade.  This foundation is a medium coverage, which I like. Itu2019s matte, which has its place, but you can glow it up with different products underneath if you like.  Itu2019s easy to apply and fairly long-lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as part of a promotional program through Bzzagent, and I must say I am loving it! One of the things that I really appreciate about this product is that it is almost a perfect match to my natural skin color. I love that I don't have any sort of makeup line as a result. It has a medium to full coverage that I have found to be buildable depending on what look you are trying to achieve. I used a beauty blender to apply and I think that it has a really nice finish with that as opposed to applying with my fingers. The only reason that I gave it 4 stars is because in my experience, the longevity of the wear isn't as long as I was hoping for. It is not as sweat proof around my forehead as I was hoping for. Honestly, if you are looking for an all in 1 foundation that has sunscreen, this is a fantastic product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Lancu00f4me product and this is no different! The application is super easy and a little goes a long way. Iu2019m oily so you will definitely need a good primer and setting powder if you are too but my skin also felt like it could breathe while wearing this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product, the shade is too dark for me. So I have been using it as a liquid bronzer. If it had been my shade, it would have been perfect. Because the formula is amazing and full coverage

reviews.review_title: Long-Lasting Natural Coverage for Everyday Wear!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use 330N Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation for my daily makeup. It gives good coverage and makes my skin look smooth and even. It stays on my face all day, even when I sweat. I like how it covers my dark spots and makes my skin look natural.  The texture is light and creamy, not heavy on my skin. It blends easily and feels soft. There is no strong smell, which is good because my skin is sensitive to fragrance. I feel confident when I wear it because my face looks fresh all day.  I highly recommend this foundation for people with combination skin. It works well for those who want medium to full coverage that lasts a long time. It is also good for people who want a natural look without feeling too much makeup on their face. Thank you to BzzAgent and Lancu00f4me for providing this complimentary product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Lancu00f4me teint idole foundation! My mom has used this for years and I use the concealer which I love! This did not disappoint! Itu2019s expensive but also one of the top foundations that lasts long. It pairs really nice with the concealer too. I would highly recommend this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Was pleasantly surprised by this foundation! It felt like a serum foundation but still gave good coverage without feeling heavy or looking like I was wearing a lot of makeup. A very soft matte natural finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation last all day. Evens out my skin tone without feeling cakey. Looks like my natural skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation in the shade 305N and Iu2019m absolutely in love with it! The coverage is flawless but still feels lightweight on my skin. This foundation gives my makeup a natural matte finish that lasts all day without looking cakey and the shade matches my skin tone perfectly. It blends easily and stays all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I went to an outdoor party this weekend in 90* weather and not only did this makeup stay but it had a matte finish which I love because I have naturally oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This went on smooth and lasted all day! It is a medium, buildable coverage. Overall, I really liked it, would like to mix with a warmer shade for the perfect color match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I must say I am in love with the Trent Idols Ultra Wear Foundation. I leaves a smooth matte finish while covering my wrinkles. My skin is very oily and this foundation was able to keep my oily skin at bay. The Trent Idols Ultra Wear Foundation was easy to apply and blend, this is a staple in my makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do enjoy this product, I am just more a light to medium coverage person instead of a full coverage. It does cover well and lasts all day though which are positives about this foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. It leaves my skin and makeup looking flawless without feeling so heavy. It also doesnu2019t crack or sink into my pores and lines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for the past couple weeks I can say Iu2019m completely satisfied! It gives off just the right amount of coverage and matches my skin tone almost to a T. It blends easily as well. I recommend trying it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Lancu00f4me foundation is so light and blendable and looks completely natural. It also lasts long, it lasted through a ten hour day for me and most foundations donu2019t last that long on my combination type skin.
I absolutely love this ultra wear matte foundation by Lancu00f4me. It lasts all day and gives such a flawless finish with great coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for about a month now itu2019s a wonderful formula. The golden undertone of this foundation was a wonderful fit for me. I have worn this to a few outdoor concerts in the heat it stood up beautifully. I was eating and dancing and it didnu2019t move much around my mouth which is my trouble area in regarding longevity. I would suggest this foundation if you like a lightweight but full coverage formula. I received this product for review for my honest review from Bzzagent .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It goes on so smooth. This was a sample and the color was a little off, but I still wore all day just to test it and I have no complaints. I have oily skin and after 7 hours of wear I still didnu2019t have to pat my face to absorb oil

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this foundation in exchange for a review and  Iu2019ve been using it for a few days now and I love it! Lightweight and great coverage, would definitely buy again! 100% recommended

reviews.review_title: Write a review for Lancome Paris Teint Idole Ultra
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try the Lancu00f4me Paris Teint Idole Ultra Wear 24H Foundation, as I had been searching for a product that delivers a natural, dewy finish while effectively covering blemishes and providing sun protection. The 510N shade was a perfect match for my African-American complexion, which can be challenging to find, so that was a pleasant surprise.The foundation has a silky texture and blends seamlessly over my serums and moisturizers. I put it to the ultimate test during a vacation to Florida theme parks and was impressed with how well it held up against the heat, humidity, and even after water rides. The product truly lives up to its claims of being long-lasting and resilient.I love how buildable this foundation is; I can achieve maximum coverage under my eyes with a brush, and then use a damp beauty sponge for a smooth, medium coverage across the rest of my face. It doesnu2019t flake or settle into fine lines, and the finish is so natural that no one could tell I was wearing makeup. Overall, I appreciate the versatility of this foundationu2014itu2019s now a staple in my makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is so nice and light buildable medium coverage. I love the satin finish. It's like skin but better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for a few weeks I love it.  Typically I stick to a tinted moisturizer for day to day wear to avoid the heavy, caked on feel most foundations cause.   The light, fresh feel of this product has me wearing it daily.  I love how smooth it goes on and the natural glow it leaves my skin with.  The buildable coverage is also a huge plus on days when more is needed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the 24-Hour Wear Breathable Makeup Foundation, and Iu2019m genuinely impressed!   This foundation delivers on its promise of all-day wear. I applied it early in the morning before work, and by the end of the day, it still looked fresh. Even in high humidity and during a workout, it held up incredibly well without becoming patchy. I can confidently say that it can easily go the full 24 hours if needed. What sets this foundation apart from others is its lightweight, breathable feel. My skin didnu2019t feel clogged or suffocated at all, which is often a problem with long-wear foundations. It almost feels like a second skin, allowing my complexion to breathe while still providing full coverage. This is great for everyday use, especially for people with sensitive or acne-prone skin like mine. It offers medium-to-full coverage, which is buildable. Whether youu2019re going for a natural, light look or full glam, it does the job without feeling heavy. The finish is a lovely satin-matte, balancing between a natural glow and a shine-free look. It blurs imperfections, covers redness, and leaves your skin looking smooth and flawless. I have combination skin, and this foundation worked wonders for me. My oily T-zone didnu2019t break through during the day, and my dry patches around the cheeks remained hydrated without any cakiness. From my experience, it seems suitable for both dry and oily skin types. This 24-hour breathable foundation is a game-changer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this foundation I've noticed that it is buildable and when layered and blended properly will give you the coverage you need I really like this foundation its my go to and receive, I've actually been in the sun so I would possibly get a shade or two darker.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Lancu00f4me has created a long lasting product with diverse pigments. My skin tone varies through the season so it was nice to be able to have it in different shades that color match.   We live a very active lifestyle and my day begins at 5am so itu2019s nice to rely on a product that will stay put.  Giving 4 stars instead of 5 because I prefer a thicker coverage at times but I would still recommend to anyone.

Iu2019m dinging this one star because it has chemical sunscreen in it, and I avoid chemical sunscreen because itu2019s absorbed into your bloodstream. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: A beautiful formula and impressive shade range
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Trent Idols Ultra Wear Foundation, and I have to say, it exceeded my expectations, especially on dark skin.  Firstly, Iu2019m 56yo with skin that acts like it doesnu2019t know that itu2019s menopausal. I have very few wrinkles and my skin is oil/combo and foundations made for more u201cmatureu201d skin break me out.    The shade range is impressive and quite inclusive . The color I received to try was 510N which was a bit more natural than I would selected but, it still blended seamlessly with my complexion, which can often be a challenge as Iu2019m neutral/warm.  The undertones are well thought out, catering to all tones so thereu2019s a good chance youu2019ll find a shade and undertone that works for you. Typically, foundation with SPF added does not bode well on melanated  complexions and can come off looking grey. That was not the case with this formula as it wore beautifully. I wore it on a long 12 hour workday and the formula really held up throughout the day.  It is lightweight , didnu2019t look like a mask and blends like a second skin, which is always my concern with full-coverage foundations. My oiliness did break through after about 4 hours, but nothing a blotting sheet couldnu2019t handle.   Would I buy this again, most definitely. The beautiful wear, added SPF, and extensive shade ranges and undertones make this a solid choice without having to jump at every new foundation release.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the 320C Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation by Lancu00f4me, and I must say, it has quickly become a favorite in my makeup routine.  Firstly, the shade 320C is a perfect match for my skin tone, providing a beautiful, natural finish that blends seamlessly. The consistency of the foundation is smooth and lightweight, making it easy to apply. Whether using a brush or a beauty sponge, it glides on effortlessly without feeling heavy or cakey.  One of the standout features of this foundation is its long-wear formula. It claims to last for up to 24 hours, and I was pleasantly surprised to find that it held up remarkably well throughout the day, even in warmer weather. There was minimal fading or settling into fine lines, which is a huge plus.  Another benefit is its buildable coverage. I found it easy to achieve a sheer, natural look for a daytime outing, but it also layers beautifully for a more full-coverage finish when needed. Plus, it has a nice matte finish that helps control shine without looking flat or dull.  Overall, the 320C Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation offers excellent coverage, longevity, and a stunning finish. If youu2019re looking for a reliable foundation that can take you from day to night, I highly recommend giving this one a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a buildable, medium-to-full coverage foundation. Very skin-like and dries to a powdery finish. Matte natural finish. Extremely long-wearing and smudge resistant. Youu2019ll definitely want to double cleanse. Where it falls flat for me is the color range. I tend to be neutral. I have some light redness. The 130C was too pink and emphasized the redness. The 135 neutral tone seemed more of a match; however, it was a tad too dark. I am somewhere in between these shades. I went to the Lancu00f4me counter, and it was difficult to get a good match. I highly recommend this foundation if you are looking for something long-wearing. The coverage is gorgeous. I received this product free in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_text: Teint Idole Ultra Wear is a long-wearing, matte foundation with medium to full coverage. I wear 450W, a warm, yellow-toned shade, and itu2019s a great color match. (Granted, the primers I use may not be compatible with this foundation.) From my experience, Ultra Wear is not waterproof, but the tear streaks and transfer after a crying session were minimal. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was in the market for a new foundation with SPF to use during the colder weather and am glad I got to try the Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation by Lancu00f4me. It goes on matte but it is lightweight and doesnu2019t transfer to other surfaces like some of the other liquid foundation that Iu2019ve tried. It also has great coverage so smooths out my blemishes without looking cakey. This foundation lasts throughout the day, resisting fading unlike a bb cream.   Application is smooth, and it blends easily, so you use a brush or a sponge, or even your hands. I do have dry skin so do use a moisturizer prior to applying so not sure if itu2019ll feel dry without. Iu2019m Asian and this matches great with my skin tone.   Overall, this is a great foundation when you want to have a flawless look without looking like you had a lot of makeup on.

I think it would be an amazing product for normal to dry skin, but for those with oily skin like mine, it may not hold up as well over time without frequent touch-ups.

I already had the care and glow version  of this in 120N, and compared to that, this is definitely more matte and I found the color slight more yellow (itu2019s at the top of my arm in the pic, with care and glow in 120N below). This wore VERY well throughout long days. I knocked off one star because blending was a bit difficult for me. Even primer and a beauty blender, it seemed to set fast and not want to budge. A buffing brush was helpful in smoothing out edges, but was an extra step Iu2019d rather not take.

reviews.review_text: Lancu00f4me does not disappoint with this foundation!! I LOVE it! I often struggle to find a foundation that both absorbs and blends well...well this one does! I use a brush to dab it in and it covers well then absorbs well without being dry. It last all day and I would only spot reapply if I was going out later.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful foundation if you want a full coverage look. The formula itself does not feel heavy but a little goes a long way for covering spots. I like this foundation because even though itu2019s on the matte side, it doesnu2019t cling to dry spots. I I tend to reach for this one when I need something that will hold up for a few hours. It has great long wearing power even in the Florida heat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried this Lancome foundation, and overall, I was thoroughly impressed. The formula glides on smoothly, offering a flawless finish that feels lightweight on the skin. The coverage is buildable, allowing me to achieve everything from a natural look to a more polished appearance for special occasions. One downside I encountered was that I picked a shade that ended up being a few tones too dark for my skin. While the shade range is extensive and caters to various undertones, itu2019s essential to be sure of your shade before purchasing. Despite the color mismatch, the foundation wore beautifully after mixing it. The foundation quality is great, just be sure of your shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im super excited for these base packaging is beautiful  I got the perfect shade that for me never happened ud83dude05 that ease but im really in love with it comparing it to my others  comes to one of my favorites  definitely must have and worth it 100% my favorite thing that can use it as a sunscreen too u2764ufe0f

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 355N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: when i initially swatched the foundation on my hand i was impressed; the fluidity, coverage, and blendability gave me high hopes. Unfortunately, after testing the product on my actual face my opinion varied.  letu2019s begin with the shade range; disappointing and falsely advertised. immediately when i applied it to my face i found the shade to be grey, but after testing another color, it did get a little better. this is concerning as i had to go much darker than originally intended, meaning the darkest shades are likely not dark enough. the first foundation shade was another concern, leading me to believe that the undertones of this foundation are off/grey, which specifically stood out o me as a black woman.  The foundation texture was silky and beautiful; it blended with much ease, but it personally made me look cakey at first. the coverage is not truly matte or entirely buildable, more so lightweight with a satin finish; i found i could only get a medium coverage after layering. this foundation definitely was natural looking and felt weightless on the skin; when initially applied, i looked like i had little product on my face and it felt very breathable, but as i finished my routine i found myself looking more cakey with the foundation pilling around the forehead area.  the wear on this foundation is the best thing it has to offer; as i went through my day it settled more into my skin and looked significantly better, losing the initial textured appearance. This foundation lasted through hours of wear and had minimal to no transfer throughout the day; i took a long nap in this foundation and woke up without any transfer and my my face was flawless. i was also able to wipe mascara off of my face without disturbing the foundation in any way. as someone with watery eyes, i had tears run down my face that left no impression on the foundation.  overall, the foundation was okay; nothing life changing. at this price point, you can find better at the drugstore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a brown girl, it's hard to find the perfect shade match for myself because most foundations don't have the right undertone for me. 345N was perfection! It is a true neutral shade. Not too warm / orange or too cool. The Coverage is amazing and buildable if one layer doesn't do what you need it to do. With my regular skin prep / primer routine I think my skin looked beautiful with this foundation. It evened everything out. It did not emphasize any dry patches or enlarge my pores. It didn't look too cakey. And it lasted my 8 hour work day looking great. I finished my look with powder and I think that helped keep my shininess levels down. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin type is combined, oily and normal.  For me this foundation work so so good, if you wanna get a velvet finish and your makeup look so good youu2019re looking for the correct foundation.   Have a perfect coverage 10/10, and make my makeup look so professional (also i have a pretty good skincare routine), i used for four hours and I donu2019t have to retouch it with powder or anything

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy using the Lancome Teint Idole Ultra Wear foundation.  It sits on my skin nicely and doesn't enhance any imperfections on my skin.  It blends seamlessly and helps to give my face a blurring effect.  This foundation is long lasting and the finish is beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very good coverage and wear time. It didnu2019t oxidize that much if at all on me. I used to wear this back in high school and I lost touch with it and Iu2019m not even sure how! This is amazing foundation easily one of favorites. The color was a great match!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product actually has an amazing silky like texture that doesnu2019t leave a high shine. Goes on smooth and covers up some small blemishes. It also is billable like two applications if you wanted more full coverage. I used to brush and then also a sponge to touch up a couple areas. Thank you so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The cream layer is thin, smooth and blends with the skin so the skin looks very natural. It adheres well so it lasts long, does not make the face shiny and has moderate coverage so it can cover pores and dark spots, tiny pimples and small scars on the face. I like it because it looks natural and does not irritate my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very good and long lasting. The finish is really nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this foundation to try for my honest review.  I have tried a few of the Lancu00f4me foundations. I really like this one. The coverage is great. I have red, uneven skin tone and it covers it up, I included a pic with foundation on half my face. I also am 40 so I have a few fine lines and wrinkles and it doesnu2019t settle into them. My skin is combination, with an oily T-zone. Iu2019m also a sweaty girl and it stays put! I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 355N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not big on foundation, but I gave this a try. The color is a perfect match for my skin and a little bit goes a long way. Itu2019s very light and evens out my skin tone better than I imagined. Will definitely be purchasing when bottle runs out

reviews.review_title: New Go To Base for Glams!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Lancome long wear matte foundation has quickly become a new favorite of mine. This foundation went on like a dream however not clinging on to those pesky dry areas instead of feeling cooling and skin care like. I also found the foundation tended to wear very well with me being able to use it for outdoor events and it lasting all day in Chicago heat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product gives great coverage but still manages to look natural . It lasts all day. The only downside for me was the scent .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for the past few weeks, my skin has been feeling hydrated. I love the coverage and the fact that it feels and looks like I'm not wearing any makeup. Great coverage, would definitely purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for my skin color, light and airy.  No need to worry about sunscreen as it is already in there.  I loved the light cover and flawless look .  It is buiildable .  Stayed in and looked natural

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is medium coverage, longwear, and lightweight.

reviews.review_title: Not good for older skin. Great for oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not a fan of this foundation. It made my skin feel dry and itchy.  It settled into my fine lines and deep pores making me look older.   This is not a good product for people with wrinkly skin. It will make you look older.  I prefer my skin with no foundation if this was my only option.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the medium, buildable coverage of this foundation combined with the SPF coverage! It really looks great on the skin and Iu2019ve found itu2019s best applied with. Kabuki brush.

reviews.review_title: Great from day to night look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this is a full Coverage and really sinks into my skin- I have enjoyed wearing this during the day without needing to reapply it to for night time. This is a Matt finish so itu2019s more sophisticated in my mind

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried MANY foundations. Always looking for good coverage without the caked on look. This fits the bill completely!  I love that you can vary the coverage based on your needs. Itu2019s easy to put a light amount on for  everyday, but buildable for an evening out. Lastly, Lancu00f4me's ability to color match using their online system is incredible. They recommended the exact color I needed. Thank to Lancu00f4me for letting me try this product in exchange for an honest review!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this foundation for the last couple of weeks, I can say itu2019s a good one for my dry skin (once I find the right shade). I like how natural it leaves my skin looking - itu2019s not too matte or dewy and it doesnu2019t seem to oxidize (which others from this brand have done).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is wonderful. It covers my uneven skin tone without being heavy. I love the complete coverage with a light formula. It has spf without being too greasy like many other foundations can be. The color match was correct. This may be my new foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Talk about finding a new obsession. My skin looks absolutely stunning when wearing this foundation. Literally flawless; I canu2019t get enough of it. Iu2019ve been using this product for weeks now. The foundation sits so well with all my other favorite products. The bottle is gorgeous! The shade range is huge; finding your perfect match wonu2019t be hard. Iu2019ve noticed itu2019s waterproof as well. I've gotten a good 9 hours of wear. I donu2019t have to set my makeup at all. This foundation is perfect for the ones who love a long-wearing matte makeup look. I wasnu2019t disappointed at all. I already know this will be a repurchase over and over again. Lancu00f4me, I would give this foundation a 10/10. Iu2019m so in love with this product. The price is high, but youu2019ll be getting something worth your money. A true staple in my makeup routine already.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really loved the formula of this product and how it felt and looked on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I been using this foundation for over a week and itu2019s great. Itu2019s full coverage which I love because I have redness on my cheeks and acne marks and this foundation covers that up so well. This is also a matte foundation but it doesnu2019t feel or look like it to me. I have combo skin and at the end of the day my t zone is hardly oily. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear SPF 25 foundation, and I am absolutely in love! The formula is lightweight yet provides incredible coverage that lasts all day without feeling heavy on my skin. It blends so easily and gives a beautiful, natural finish. I appreciate the added SPF for daily protection without the need for a separate sunscreen. The shade 215C is an excellent match for my light/pinky complexion. Overall, this foundation has been a great new addition to my makeup routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thanks to Lancome, I was able to try this foundation for free and review it. I absolutely love this foundation! It covered my areas of concern very well and actually seemed to help keep moisture in my skin without any gross flaking. Applying it was very easy and a little bit goes a long way! Even more impressive was that I did not have to reapply throughout the day! Definitely plan to buy this again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually stick to bb or cc creams but I decided to give this a try because of the SPF 25. First off, the color was a perfect match for me - this Foundation is so lightweight and feels like extra skin care. Even though it felt light on my skin, the coverage was great. For anyone looking for medium coverage, it is easy to build up and still looked smooth. I'm so happy with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very lightweight for the medium to full coverage it provides. Really gives a nice sunkissed glow while also being a great match to my skin tone. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 355N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect match! Doesnu2019t oxidize, medium to full coverage. Doesnu2019t feel heavy or look cakey. Looks like my skin, just better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really good quality and the shade is perfect, I really love that you can work with the level you want of coverage.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 225N - For light skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancu00f4meu2019s foundation is a standout choice for those seeking a flawless complexion. It provides excellent coverage while remaining lightweight on the skin, blending seamlessly to create a natural finish that lasts all day. With a wide range of shades available, it caters to diverse skin tones. Additionally, it hydrates the skin without clogging pores, making it suitable for various skin types. Overall, Lancu00f4meu2019s foundation effortlessly enhances your beauty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Lancu00f4me Teint Idole 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation free from Lancu00f4me and BzzAgent in return for my honest review.       After using this foundation for the past couple of weeks I can say that I am impressed with how long lasting this foundation is. I love the matte finish. It is full coverage and it is buildable. I love that it contains skin care ingredients such as hylaronic acid. I like the added benefits that you get besides the great coverage. I think it has helped my skin to look fresh. I also love that it contains a sunscreen with an SPF of 25. All in all this is a great foundation if you are looking for breathable, wearable, long lasting, foundation. The added skincare benefits are icing on the cake.

reviews.review_title: A must have for oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been looking for some foundation to help with my combination skin and this was it. This foundation is very lightweight and does not leave your skin dry. It gave my face that smooth texture that I was looking for and the way that it stays on my skin all day with no problems is a plus. Another plus is that it has Sun screen in it, so youu2019re protected from the sun. I rate this product a 10/10. I have been back to but more already.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for about 2 weeks. I use it over my moisturizer and sunscreen. This is lightweight and buildable. One pump goes a long way. One pump helps me cover my whole face with a light coverage. I can see this bottle lasting me a long time. It is smooth and sheer and moisturizing. There is no fragrance to it which I like. With this foundation I don't need concealer as much either. It is great for people that like to have light coverage and buildable coverage. Especially for daily wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m absolutely loving this foundation for my combo skin at the moment. Itu2019s very hydrating, but lays matte without getting too dry or crusty. Itu2019s very easy to apply with a brush or a beauty blender, and this really does cover everything amazing! Staple in my routine now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this foundation has the right amount of coverage with a matte finish, however your skin will not look dry, it will just look better and healthier. it is buildable but a little goes a long way

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review and I'm so happy that I got the opportunity to experience this brand of makeup. The Teint Idole Matte Foundation is perfect for my combo oily skin and gives me the best natural no makeup look. Love how this makeup tends to give me a smoother textured look to my skin and it works awesome at blurring small blemishes on my face. I have tried other formulas by drugstore brands and this one by Lancome has them all beat!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The foundation is long lasting and a nice finish. I think have might have used wrong primer because it seemed like foundation pilled. Never had that happen with hyro grip primer. So i wont use primer to see if it makes a difference

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this foundation for a few weeks. Iu2019ve noticed a nice glow and itu2019s long lasting. Goes on smoothly and looks natural.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 335W - For medium skin with warm/golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow this foundation exceeded my expectations, I wore it to a baby shower and it stayed on all day. By the end of the night it still looked beautiful. It was lightweight, didnu2019t feel heavy on my skin, very comfortable for an all day wear. It applied beautifully, buttery smooth, just with a thin layer it had great coverage. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 310N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only foundation that I love because it suits my skin type and skin tone and gives a smooth texture and is easily absorbed by the skin and does not make the skin look too much and it is beautiful and attractive and makes the skin moisturized, beautiful and attractive and hides all the flaws and gives excellent coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So, I tried this new Lancu00f4me foundation and let me tell you, it's bomb.   I have sensitive brown skin, and this thing is a dream. It doesn't feel heavy at all, and it covers up my hyperpigmentation like a champ. Plus, it doesn't look cakey or anything.   The shade match is pretty spot on too. I've been wearing it all day and it stays put, even in this Texas heat.   If you're looking for a good foundation for sensitive skin, you should definitely try this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free Lancome Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation to test and review.  This foundation exceeded my expectations.  Normally, I tend to be heavy-handed when applying foundation to hide blemishes, but I quickly learned that a little goes a long way.  It provided great coverage while still feeling lightweight.  It even held up better during and after a 2+ mile run than any other foundation I have used.  Having SPF to protect my skin was a bonus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked how smooth this foundation was when applying and that it has sunscreen in it, but it did not make me greasy at all! It did tend to settle into wrinkles so using a primer was necessary for the best look. Overall, a very comfortable foundation to wear!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 510N - For deep skin with neutral/deep peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have a pretty thorough skincare routine so any time I have to add makeup to the mix I'm careful. Even though I have oily skin & use vitamin c, moisturizer and sunblock but adding this foundation did not make me greasy. I do also dust over with an oil control powder but all in all this was great performance for most of the day. Only had to reapply powder once to tame the shine. Great color match (a little too perfect it made my face completely even) so you will have to re-add dimension with concealer/blush/highlighter if you don't want a flat look. Only reason I did not give 5 stars is that I haven't used it in really hot weather, but then again very few can stand up to the heat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first I thought I had the wrong shade (too light) but realized the color adjusted after application. It's smooth and just melts into my skin, not leaving it dry like other products. I love it for daily use because it's not too heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear gives amazing full coverage, blends perfectly into my skin, and lasts all day. Usually not a matte foundation fan, but I love this one. It's more like a satin matte, perfect for combination skin. A bit pricey, but totally worth it for the quality. Highly recommend for your next beauty splurge!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Usually I'm nervous buying a new foundation not knowing if the color match would be perfect but I was pleasantly surprised how well it matched with my skin tone. I love how light it feels and how it doesn't leave me feeling cakey or greasy. The formula is buildable and last all day. My skin looks more even, smooth, and hydrated. This is definitely my new favorite foundation and I would definitely recommend giving it a try!

reviews.review_title: Teint Indeed, yet coverage is there! 320C
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Application goes on nice and blends well. Itu2019s breathable, but yet coverage can be layered without looking caked on . I only gave it 4 starts bc the color I choose was way too peachy undertones.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 420W - For medium-deep skin with warm/golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is absolutely divine. I struggle with combination skin + hormonal acne and this blends perfectly. It is buildable and does not look cakey on the skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 215C - For light skin with cool/pinky undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My skin but better! I have yet to be let down by a Lancome product, and this is no exception. Itu2019s breathable, lightweight, and the color match is fairly spot on with perfect undertones. The shade I got is just a little bit too dark for me, but it doesnu2019t oxidize so I mix it with another one thatu2019s a little too light. It does not cling to the dry patches on my skin. They arenu2019t noticeable with this foundation. I do feel like I have to set this a little more than I do other products, it tends to slide around my face a little bit. But halfway through the day, I just take a beauty blender and put it all back into place. Once I lock my shade down, this will be my new holy Grail foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lightweight and medium coverage not dewy either but very accurate to the skin color

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this product to review for Lancu00f4me, but I would absolutely pay for this, because itu2019s perfect. It feels and looks like my skin but so much better. Great, all day wear, and can be touched up easily if needed. I went to a music festival this past weekend, and only needed a little under eye refresh and powder on my T zone. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This shade was a little lighter than expected, but it will make a great concealer and glides on beautifully!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this foundation. Itu2019s a perfect matte coverage. I find myself reaching for it quite often! I will definitely be keeping this in my makeup routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect on my skin I am medium skin neutral/peachy tone. This one perfectly blends on my face and neck. Tried for an evening outing I did get complimented finally found my perfect match foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product. I live in Florida and a SPF foundation is now a necessity. I think the color blended great on me. I was very surprised by the texture as itu2019s not a thick creamy sunscreen consistency like I am used to. The packaging is elegant and made of thick glass, and feels expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best foundations Iu2019ve ever tried. Leaves my skin looking flawless and doesnu2019t leave me looking dry or patchy. Such a flawless finish and coverage that be used everyday or even buildable to wear at events. Must have for real.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am officially in love with all of the products from the Teint Idole line by Lancu00f4me! I've tried the Idu00f4le Tint Liquid Eyeshadow & Eyeliner in Sunburst - absolutely loved the consistency of it and how beautifully the golden shade sparkled against my brown eyes & skin. I own the Teint Idole Ultra Wear All Over Concealer - love it so much, I convinced 2 other family members to buy it. And now, I've finally had the chance to try this Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation (for free - in exchange for my honest review)! It's no surprise at all that this product quickly made its way into my daily makeup routine, replacing another brand of liquid foundation I've used faithfully since the summer of 2019. u2728ufe0f  Pros: - Medium, buildable coverage. Paired with the matching concealer, (or even without it) this foundation does an amazing job of covering up any dark spots or blemishes you may have. - Weightless feeling on the skin. No matter how much coverage you apply, you won't end up with that caked on look. It goes on so smoothly and is as light as a feather. - Beautiful, uniform matte finish (without being dry) thanks to the added sunscreen, morgina, vitamin E, and hyaluronic acid. - Over 40+ different shades available. You will certainly find your perfect match just like I did - mine is shade #510N. Lancu00f4me, you rock for being so inclusive!!  Cons: -I tried hard, but couldn't think of one.  I would and do 100% recommend this foundation, as well as the other products within the Teint Idole line. It's a must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a full size sample from BzzAgent to try and review...I like that it is used as a sunscreen and a foundation...The fact that it lasts all day is great and it doesn't feel like im wearing a lot of makeup..I will purchase this particular product in the future because it worked so well with my skin..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Goes on evenly, blends beautifully no weird cast or separation like many other foundations with skin care formulas that Iu2019ve tried. Iu2019m happy with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tent to love Lancu00f4meu2019s foundations and this is no exception.  In fact, this is their best one yet. It is smooth with a gentle, natural finish and blends right into my skin tone.  It lasts all day and I never look greasy.  Amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome sent me this free sample through the BzzAgent sampling program. This foundation is super sheer and non-drying. I love how it contains SPF and I wear it as my daily foundation. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Flawless Matte Finish that Lasts All Day!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been on the hunt for the perfect matte foundation, and the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Matte in the shade Medium has truly impressed me! This foundation provides excellent full coverage without feeling heavy or cakey on the skin, which is perfect for my combination skin type.  Pros:  Long-lasting wear: I wore it for a full 12-hour day, and it held up beautifully without any touch-ups. No shine, no fading! Matte but not drying: It gives a soft matte finish that doesn't look flat or dry, which is a common issue Iu2019ve had with other matte foundations. My skin still feels breathable. Buildable coverage: A little goes a long way! I can easily build it from medium to full coverage depending on the occasion, but it never looks cakey. Great for oily/combination skin: I have combination skin, and this foundation keeps my T-zone shine-free while still feeling comfortable on the rest of my face. Wide range of shades: The shade Medium is a perfect match for my skin tone with neutral undertones. Cons:  Price: Itu2019s a bit on the higher side, but honestly, you get what you pay for in terms of quality and longevity. If you're looking for a foundation that gives you a flawless matte finish and lasts all day, this one is worth every penny. Highly recommend! ud83dudc84u2728

The color was a perfect match for me and it went on smoothly and felt pretty nice on the one patch test I did, but I removed it immediately and it left me skin redu2026as Iu2019m sensitive so I cannot comment on how long it lasts etc. They need to update the package and website and ingredient list to show something has SPF because I would have been pretty upset if I bought thisu2026 and I would have had a bad time if I didnu2019t read everything closely.

reviews.review_title: Stunning finish but check shade carefully
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation applies beautifully and gives a smooth, flawless finish. The coverage is full but not cakey, which is a huge plus for me! My skin looks even and polished without feeling heavy.  The texture is lightweight, and it feels breathable on the skin (which I really appreciate) especially considering the full coverage. I also love how it settles into a matte finish (though I did notice some shine on my T-zone by the end of the day) It's not overly greasy, but I did have to blot a little, so Iu2019d recommend it for those with combination or oily skin to keep that in mind.  The only downside was the shade I pickedu2014250Wu2014 it unfortunately pulled a little more yellow/orange than I expected. I typically lean towards neutral or slightly warm tones, but this shade didnu2019t quite match my skinu2019s undertone as Iu2019d hoped. It was a bit too warm, but it still worked in a pinch when blended carefully.  Despite the slight shine in my T-zone and the mismatch in the shade, I do think this foundation delivers a stunning finish thatu2019s hard to beat, especially for those looking for long-lasting, full coverage with a flawless appearance. It definitely deserves a spot in my makeup rotation, but I might try a different shade next time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

Previously I used a serum based foundation that kept my skin dewy and moisturized throughout the day-this foundation was much more dry and I definitely felt the need to moisturize a little more before bed.
