reviews.review_title: Flawless All-Day Wear: Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation in shade 540C is a game changer for deep skin tones with cool/rich red undertones. The coverage is flawless and long-lasting, staying intact throughout the day without needing touch-ups. It provides a smooth, matte finish without looking cakey or drying out my skin. I love how lightweight it feels while still delivering full coverage. Finding the right match for deeper skin tones can be a challenge, but Lancu00f4me nailed it with this shade. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Lancu00f4me has the best out there!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sure! Hereu2019s a casual review of the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation:  ---  **Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation Review**  Hey there, beauty lovers! Letu2019s dive into one of my recent favorites: the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation. If youu2019re on the hunt for a foundation that can keep up with your busy lifestyle while giving you that flawless finish, this one might just be your new best friend.  First off, letu2019s talk about the packaging. It comes in a sleek glass bottle with a pump, which is always a win for me. The pump makes it super easy to dispense just the right amount of product without any mess. Plus, it feels pretty luxe sitting on your vanity!  Now, onto the formula. This foundation has a lightweight feel but provides full coverage, which is a hard combo to find! It glides on smoothly and blends effortlessly into the skin, making it easy to achieve that airbrushed look. Iu2019ve tried it with different primers and moisturizers, and it just plays well with everything.   The finish? Absolute matte perfection! It gives you that soft, velvety look without being flat or dull. I have combination skin, and I often struggle with areas getting shiny throughout the day, but this foundation really holds up. Iu2019ve worn it for long hoursu2014think a full workday or a night outu2014and it stayed put without needing to touch up too much.   One of the standout features is its impressive longevity. The u201c24Hu201d claim definitely holds up in my experience. Whether I was running errands or hitting the dance floor, it didnu2019t fade or oxidize. It also feels comfortable on the skin, so you wonu2019t feel like youu2019re wearing a mask.  Now, letu2019s chat about the shade range. Lancu00f4me really nailed it here; they offer a wide variety of shades to suit different skin tones. I appreciated how easy it was to find my match, which isnu2019t always the case with other brands.  This is a must have!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 345N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has such good coverage without feeling heavy at all! I like that it's not too matte either, very natural finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: u201cIu2019ve been using the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Concealer for about a week now, and it has completely transformed my makeup routine! The texture is lightweight yet provides full coverage without feeling cakey or heavy on my skin. It blends seamlessly, covering up dark circles and blemishes while still looking natural. What I love the most is how long-lasting it isu2014stays flawless all day without creasing or fading. Plus, itu2019s hydrating enough that it doesn't settle into fine lines, making it perfect for all-day wear. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a reliable, full-coverage concealer that feels amazing on the skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not a big fan of matte foundations due to the fact that it made my skin feel congested and I wanted to remove it immediately. I'm not mad at this foundation. I've worn this foundation for a week so here are my thoughts. Starting with the packaging, which I love. The glass is heavy & though I don't plan on dropping this to test its durability, it looks like it would survive an accidental drop on the floor (just don't do it!) It comes in a pump (after you remove the cap) which I appreciate. I only used one pump of the foundation, which it wasn't watery, it was slightly thicker, but not like a cream. It covered all of my face and some of my neck. At first I used my fingers and the foundation spread smoothly. It covered most of my redness, more so than one of my current foundations, but texture will always be there for me. Then I used a damp sponge to blend lightly. This is more of a medium to full coverage for me, even with one pump. It matched my skin tone and I didn't see any oxidation after it settled. It doesn't accentuate any fine lines & it didn't settle in my pores too much. I didn't use any powder as it was matte on my moisturized skin. After testing it on cold and hot/humid days, it did stay on even on hot humid days, but my face ends up a bit shiny at the end of the day. I will say that it didn't oxidize at the end of the day but on certain days, it did make my skin feel slightly tight, even with moisturized skin. If you have dry skin, you may not love this. Overall, this is a good product for normal, oily, or combo skin. Sensitive skin folks should test it first. I have sensitive skin, and it didn't bother me as much (only on days when it was cold it felt itchy but not bad). Would I buy it again? No, but I do recommend for medium to full coverage. I like light to medium coverage. I do tend to feel the foundation on my skin at the end of the day though, which I'm not liking. Overall, this foundation is nice on hot humid days because it does last all day.

reviews.review_title: Switching back to foundation after trying this!
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest opinion, and it really lives up to its claims. I have been using a tinted moisturizer plus concealer in place of foundation for a few years since I couldn't find a foundation like this. I am 44 and my skin has different needs than when I was younger, so I felt like foundation was too thick and drying for my skin, and blocked my pores. This product changed my mind. It checks all the boxes for me, it's very light and breathable but still provides natural looking coverage, and it lasts all day, even covering my dark under eye circles. I wore it daily for a week to make sure my skin didn't react to it, and I have had no issues. No dry patches, breakouts or redness. It doesn't dry out my skin, and doesn't look cakey when I apply bronzer or blush over it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was recently gifted the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation in shade 125W, and after a few weeks of use it has become a staple in my routine. From my first, I was impressed with the formula. Itu2019s incredibly lightweight but provides full coverage, without feeling heavy or cakey. It was easy to blend into my skin with a buffing brush, and beauty blender, didn't love the finish w my finger application.   Even in so cal summer heat  it didnu2019t break apart or settle into fine lines. It's also very buildable, which is perfect for those days when I want a lighter look or need more coverage.  Overall, Iu2019m thrilled with the performance of this foundation and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for long-lasting, full coverage with a comfortable, natural finish. I didn't notice much about the skin care in this, but hopefully it time I do. Regardless, I will repurchase this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like Lancu00f4me products in general so I was excited to try this foundation. What I loved about this was how gorgeous, natural and skin-like it looked. It has a very thin consistency which makes it easy to apply in ultra thin layers. Thin layers allow you to control the level of coverage and for a daytime look, I enjoy a natural, light to medium coverage. You couldnu2019t tell that I was wearing any foundation at all aside from how even my skin tone looked. Itu2019s supposed to be a matte finish but I think it looked radiant with almost a satin-like finish for me. As someone who is dry and not oily that may be a concern for my oily friends.  The other thing I really liked was that it has sunscreen in it but doesnu2019t have that overwhelming sunscreen chemical scent that you find in a lot of foundations with sunscreen. It was much more pleasant experience and wear for me because of the mild scent which went away after only a few minutes.  Lastly it blended very beautifully with cream products and didnu2019t lift during any application of powders. Overall, itu2019s a winner for me especially as an every day, natural-looking almost u201cno makeupu201d makeup foundation.

I do have dimple lines that any foundation settles into over time, and this foundation isnu2019t exempt. Nothing a bit of setting powder canu2019t fix though! I havenu2019t broken out since using it, and I have very sensitive skin - so thatu2019s MAJOR for me. The packaging is sleek and easy to fit into any bag for on the go. reviews.review_text: After using Lancome Teint Idole Ultra for the past few weeks, I find I am loving this product! Application is easy and the formula is luxurious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easy buildable coverage. This product leaves my skin looking like mine just more finished without me feeling like I have a heavy mask on. I was even able to use it instead of having to add under eye concealer which for me with darker under eyes is impressive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed with this foundation! It is the perfect shade and blends so easily. I like to blend it with my moisturizer. It has really nice coverage and stays all day! Highly recommend.

reviews.review_title: I wanted to love this but my skin was a bit shiny!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this product is great for some skin types, I have oily/combo skin and it left some shine beyond a dewy appearance. The coverage is great though, it looks great with setting powder (reapplied a few times). The shade is super forgiving, itu2019s very hard to find a good match for match for me and this one actually was! There are some that I would recommend this to and others I would not.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this foundation. The color is perfect, i love how it feels like im not wearing anything on my skin, it literally feels like i just put on a serum. It blends so beautifully, and it looks so perfect and natural. Plus the best part, is it lasts all day long! Without setting spray. I forgot setting spray a couple times and still 12 hours later my foundation still looked as amazing as it looked when i applied it. I highly recommend, especially if your looking for a natural look that lasts all day and doesn't settle into fine lines, this is like magic in a bottle. I wont ever use a different foundation again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this foundation daily for about a week and Iu2019ve enjoyed it so far. My biggest praise will be the SPF! It lasts all day and I rarely touch up my makeup throughout the day.

reviews.review_title: Definitely a keeper in my makeup bag
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is lightweight, covers my darks spots good and doesnu2019t end up cakey on my maturing skin. I have a hard time finding a foundation to cover my dark spots without feeling heavy and like a have tons of makeup on my face and this one is a win for me. It leaves my face feeling hydrated and covers good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is amazing and the coverage is great! I used it without any concealer and it did a great job at minimizing the dark spots and acne scars I have on my face. It is really lightweight and doesnu2019t feel like I applied anything, plus the coverage lasted all day! I would definitely buy this product again and highly recommend for you to try it out!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 095W - for fair skin with warm/yellow undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the 095W Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation, and overall, I have mixed feelings about it. As someone with combination skin living in a humid climate, I found that it performed quite well during the hotter days when my skin was more oily. The foundation provides excellent coverage and has a matte finish that helps control oil, which is a definite plus. Compared to other foundations I've tried, the Teint Idole Ultra Wear stands out for its long-lasting formula and ability to withstand humidity. It kept my skin looking fresh while I was at home. However, Iu2019ve also experienced separation and clinging to dry patches when I traveled to a drier climate. This inconsistency makes it less versatile than some other foundations I've used . One of the main benefits is its impressive coverage and durability, making it ideal for summer days. The packaging is also convenient and travel-friendly. Additionally, it has a good range of shades, ensuring that most skin tones can find a suitable match. While I appreciate its performance in humid conditions, Iu2019m not sure I would repurchase it as my go-to foundation. The issues I encountered in drier environments make me hesitant, as I prefer a foundation that can perform consistently. I would recommend the Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation to friends or family with oily skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 105W - For fair skin with warm/yellow undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this for free in exchange for my honest review. I have fair, oily/combo skin. This foundation sat very nicely on my skin. I wouldnu2019t say it is mattifying, but my skin had a nice natural sheen. By the end of the day my skin is usually excessively oily without blotting. While this foundation did not prevent my skin from becoming oily, it was not as oily as with other foundations. I prefer a light application of foundation but this is easily buildable for more full coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used the concealer and wasn't sure how I would feel about the foundation. This shade is a bit too light, and I will be getting a different shade, but I really like it for when I need full coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation was slightly too light in color but that was easily fixed by saie cream bronzer. I have to say this is definitely my new favorite foundation. The coverage was exceptional and looked totally natural. I applied a thin layer but this can easily build up to a full coverage foundation without looking cakey. After wearing it for a full day it still looked great with no creasing or transferring.

reviews.review_title: The perfect everyday foundation that lasts all day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this foundation every day for the past week, and Iu2019m really impressed. It blends effortlessly into the skin and feels lightweight, not cakey or dry at all. It reminds me of my favorite tinted moisturizer, but with a matte finish, which I actually prefer. What sets this foundation apart is how buildable it is, allowing me to adjust the coverage as needed. And the best part? It lasts all day at work without needing any touch-ups, which is a huge win for me!

reviews.review_title: A must have for oily acne prone skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the opportunity to try out the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation. I must say, I was highly impressed with its performance, especially on my oily skin. One of the first things that stood out to me was that it did not cause any breakouts, which has been an issue with other foundations containing SPF in the past. The foundation provides a smooth, medium coverage that feels incredibly lightweight on the skin. It's so light, in fact, that just one pump is sufficient to cover my entire face without the need for additional layers, giving a natural look without feeling overly heavy.  Unlike other full-coverage foundations, like the Estee Lauder Double Wear, which tends to feel quite weighty and uncomfortable after a few hours, the Teint Idole Ultra Wear sets to a soft matte finish that feels remarkably weightless and pleasant on the skin. I particularly appreciate its color match, natural finish, and lightweight feel, making it a standout product.  Moreover, it held up exceptionally well throughout the day, even on my oily skin, without requiring frequent touch-ups. This long-wearing capability is a significant plus, especially for those with oily skin or anyone struggling to find their perfect shade. I highly recommend the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation to anyone seeking a comfortable, natural-looking, and long-lasting foundation.

reviews.review_title: Flawless skin, could use better SPF coverage
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Creamy, easy to use foundation that leaves your skin hydrated and looking flawless. Does not pill, and can be worn over your skincare without looking cakey. Did not give five stars as the SPF less than 30 feels performative, especially since that does not provide adequate sun protection. Make sure youu2019re putting on sunscreen before applying!  Received free from BzzAgent in exchange for a review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Overall a good foundation with SPF 30 sunblock. The 205C was a little light for my skin tone, but I am sure once fall and winter roll around it should be just fine. Would recommend this product to anyone who like added sunblock in their foundation.

reviews.review_title: Flawless, Matte Finish That Lasts All Day!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so grateful Lancome sent me a complimentary Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation through the BzzAgent sampling program. The shade 335W is perfect, providing warm, matte coverage without feeling heavy or cakey, blending seamlessly into my skin for a flawless, natural finish. It's buildable, allowing for a light, everyday look or full glam when needed. Living in Florida, it holds up all day without creasing or fading, even in this humidity. Itu2019s especially great for oily, breakout-prone skin like mine, as it stays matte, controls shine, and doesn't clog pores. Overall, Teint Idole Ultra Wear has become a staple in my routine, and I highly recommend it for anyone seeking natural-looking, long-lasting coverage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product an exchange to write a review. This foundation is amazing it last all day, I didnu2019t have to touch it up during my work day! The color match was spot on and the wear very comfortable. I will be telling all my friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is worth the hype! It applies evenly and didnu2019t feel too heavy or thick on my skin. Definitely a more medium to full coverage, and leans matte, although gives a touch of luminosity. Didnu2019t budge and lasts through the day. Overall impressed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 10s across the board! I absolutely love this foundation!!! Itu2019s coverage is amazing! I love the fact that I can keep this foundation on all day with no problems. Donu2019t hesitate to buy this foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for the last few weeks, I am loving it! It blends so nice, and lasts all day. Itu2019s the perfect amount of coverage, to still look natural. A new staple in my makeup bag!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this foundation for about a week now and I really like it. Its lightweight, full coverage, not oily and doesnt dry out my skin and its long lasting. The only reason I give this 4 stars is because it will transfer if you rub your face against against your clothing. Idk if its 24H long wear but I did have to go through a lot of makeup wipes to remove most of it.  I recieved this product free in exchange for my review.

reviews.review_title: A must-have in my make-up routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product every day for over a week I am loving the results! It actually last alll day regardless of what I am doing. It is very lightweight but has amazing coverage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a 51 year old female with dry skin. I have a hard time finding foundation that doesn't feel dry and settle in my fine lines. This foundation not only provided flawless coverage but also felt incredibly lightweight on my skin. What sets this foundation apart is its serum-like texture, which made it easy to apply and blend seamlessly. It gave my skin a radiant, natural-looking glow that lasted throughout the day. Overall, the new Teint Idole Ultra Wear reformulated Foundation is a game-changer for those looking for a foundation that not only covers but also nourishes the skin with new ingredients such as hyaluronic acid and vitamin E. This foundation it's become a staple in my makeup routine, and I highly recommend it to anyone seeking a flawless, dewy complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how light this is.  The color was a perfect match.  I don't usually wear foundation because it is to heavy for me, but this is perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it so much! Itu2019s long lasting, doesnu2019t feel heavy on the face, looks very natural but it has great coverage, doesnu2019t look cakey!! Also love the fact that it has sunscreen. Best foundation I have tried so far. I received this product for free in exchange of my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this foundation for a night out and this foundation stuck to my face the whole night. Even had trouble taking it off but omg I love it! Itu2019s so lightweight but really good buildup coverage i definitely would recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This Lancome teint idole foundation matched my skin pretty close. I tried the 245C and was pretty close to my shade. Foundation lasted on my skin and did not need to touch up while I was at work. The foundation seems pretty buildable for cover. I will definitely be purchasing this foundation. I recommend this makeup to anyone who is looking to try a new foundation. Teint idole has no scent, the dispenser is glass and has a pump to dispense foundation. This foundation is great if you want to go for a more natural look. Its as if Im not wearing makeup but with great coverage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Truly love this foundation. In y 30u2019s will some redness and wrinkles around the eyes. This give me a nice natural base.  I got the 225N, I could have gone one shade darker, but it actually works out as it blends in really well and after I use blush, bronzer etc. it ends up looking nice! I apply with a beauty blender, itu2019s easy to build up to my preferred coverage. I love the way this foundation feels on my skin - not heavy or cakey. It doesnu2019t feel like a matte foundationu2014 feels very hydrating. Just re-read the claims/product descriptions and realizing this lives up to all of them. Itu2019s my new favourite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like that this foundation has a thinner consistency, but still provides great coverage. First photo shows a single light layer, second shows it built up a bit more. I have quite a bit of pigmentation and sun damage and it does a pretty good job of covering and evening it out. It also helps blur large pores without settling in them. Staying power is also great, I started to get a bit shiny after 8 hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Lancome Teint Idole is a great foundation. It's full coverage but still buildable, so I can start with a relatively light layer across my whole face and then add more where needed. The 130C is a perfect match for my skin tone. It doesn't cake or apply unevenly, even on areas of my face where I might have some texture. I also like how this foundation has a bit of SPF in it to give the skin on my face a little extra protection. For the most part it lasts the whole day for me. There are certain areas where I can tell it's thinned out a little bit, but overall it still maintains good coverage after a full day.

reviews.review_title: Great foundation that melts into the skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review/opinion. This is a great foundation with great shade range. The color I chose 340W works great for my Asian olive skin. This is a medium buildable foundation but I didnu2019t build it up to full coverage. I like my foundation on the lighter side and this just melts into the skin. I didnu2019t have any irritation from using this so itu2019s great for sensitive skin. It washes off great with an oil cleanser leaving no residue. There is no strong fragrance smell for those of you who do not like fragrance or perfume. Overall I would recommend this foundation!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 245C - For light to medium skin with cool/rosy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation provides amazing coverage throughout the day. Also, a little goes a long way. I use barely one pump and that provides ample coverage. This bottle will last me a long time. The formula feels light, yet still evens out my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation is really impressive, I must say! I recently tested it. I was immediately struck by how well it blends into my skin, offering great coverage without drawing attention away from my beautiful complexion. The ability of this foundation to look like skin is what really makes it stand out, even though the matte finish is ideal for those of us who prefer a shine-free look. It creates a flawless yet genuine look by balancing out my tone and highlighting my natural texture.Impressively, the oil control prevents shine without irritating my skin. It's been a mainstay in my beauty regimen, and I heartily endorse it to anyone looking for a trustworthy, daily foundation that complements rather than covers up

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this foundation through a box campaign and I could not be more delighted. It gives so much hydration to my skin while also giving great buildable coverage. I am a lunch and playground aide at my kids elementary school and spend at minimum an hour and fifteen minutes out in the sun everyday. I love that this foundation is an SPF 25 which is a very good amount of SPF for a foundation. Itu2019s literally a perfect match to my very fair skin. This is absolutely positively the perfect foundation for me and it is now the only one I will buy going forward.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: With the new season a new foundation! I have use the concealer and love it so when I saw the chance to try the foundation and I am glad i did! Its so light and feels great on my skin long lasting and a very buildable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this foundation. Iu2019ve been using Estee Lauder for years but I think after using this I just may make the switch. I love how soft and velvety this foundation is and how smoothly it goes on my face. It lasts all day and feels like I am wearing nothing! Will definitely buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for a few days I noticed it doesnu2019t clog up my pores and it is very buildable, light and you get a lot of bang for your buck

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you BzzAgent and Lancome giving an opportunity to have an experience with this product in exchange for a honest review.  First, I would say the package and the bottle look fancy and heavy quality.  Second, the color at first I was afraid of that too brighter than my skin tone, however after it absorbs has a perfect match with my skin tone.  The only things that I donu2019t like is it make my skin look dry, so I would need an moisturize cream before apply this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Its great. feels natural and light better than other products

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely loving this foundation! I have combo skin (oily t-zone and dry elsewhere) and foundation has always been a love/hate relationship for me. Sometimes, my foundation looks amazing, and the next day it makes my already large pores more enhanced and will become oily/greasy within 20 minutes. I don't use primer and have been using the same skincare products the last few months. My skin is just super problematic lol. Sometimes matte foundations makes my skin look dry as it is overly matte. This foundation provides a soft/satin matte finish and swear it still gives my skin that hydration it needs without becoming greasy. Better yet.....I can achieve the same beautiful finish every day which makes it easy to put on in the mornings when rushing around getting ready for work. I still do get some shine that peaks around the 4 hour mark, but it looks more of a glow rather than grease. I also have acne-prone skin at the young age of 40 and haven't had any problems with breakouts! It does have a slight perfume scent but dissipates quickly. I was fortunate enough to receive this product from BzzAgent and provide honest reviews.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for a little more than a week and I love it!  Great coverage and long lasting without feeling heavy or greasy.  I currently use L'Oreal True Match, but this will become my daily foundation.  (received product as a trial)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this foundation for the 1st time, I'm impressed. It is buildable and doesn't look thick ar all. It's very creamy and applies well with a brush or sponge. The matte finish keeps the shine off my face all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is my holy grail! Blending is seamless and little bit covers a lot. I have been using this to work for a week now, and I can tell you that even after my long hectic day, my face looks fresh. Itu2019s very lightweight and looks like natural skin. Also has SPF in it with a mild fragrance which I love u2764ufe0f Highly recommend it guys!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation was very buildable and went on smoothly on my skin.  The shade was a great match to my skin tone.  It was very easy to apply and looked great on as it made my skin glow.  I loved that a little went a long way.  This is now my favorite foundation to use and is my holy grail.  I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a great foundation to use.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 320C - For medium skin with cool/rosy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It looks so beautiful and natural and gets along well with all of my other skincare and makeup products. The only negative is that it didn't seem to hold up in my oiliest areas, but I assume building up the coverage would fix that.

reviews.review_title: I will buy this again and again!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the opportunity fom BzzAgent to try this foundation and I am shocked at how lightweight it is! Despite it not being heavy on my face, it has great coverage. An added bonus is that it has SPF in it so it will protect from sun damage! I definitely recommend for skin of all ages.

reviews.review_title: Healthy and Natural look and feel.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tinted Idole Ultra feels good on my skin.  It looks a little light going on but then seems to adapt to my skin.  I love  that it looks and feels like my natural skin.  It is not heavy or I don't look like I am wearing makeup but my skin looks even.   I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm very picky about foundation because I like my skin to breathe. This foundation provides that for me while also providing a medium coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited Lancome sent me this item free to review! I have mature combination skin, so I love it has SPF and a few skincare ingredients. It is a matte so it can crease in fine lines and dry patches. If skin prep is done it wears better. It did last all day, although it can rub off on clothing. Best part is it doesn't smell like sunscreen! Overall I really like it as it is lightweight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear shade 250W. I have combination skin and this was a nice foundation that felt light and not drying and not greasy. It was the perfect feel, truly breathable. It stayed on all day. It had a sunscreen of SPF 25 which is important to me. I guessed at the color from online pic and it was just a tad off. Should of went one shade lighter or no peachy for light to med or just light. Next time I will go in for perfect match, but still wearable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Good foundation, medium cover, need use with primer only, have Color 305N

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! Now if you have super dry skin this may not be the one for you. But my combo/oily skin loves it! It lasts at least 10 hours on me, could last longer. The shade range is pretty good. It's no surprise that Lancom products are very high quality!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra foundation has been a dream to wear! It offers full coverage while feeling lightweight, leaving my skin with a smooth, natural matte finish. I wore it several times, including two long nights at a friendu2019s wedding, and it stayed intact without any touch-ups, even through hours of dancing. It did crease a little by the end of the night, but not enough to bother me. For everyday wear, I prefer a light layer for a sheer, natural look. The 335W shade blends seamlessly with my warm/golden undertones, making it a perfect match.

reviews.review_title: Sunscreen is a plus and great coverage!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation! The coverage is medium and buildable but I donu2019t think youu2019ll need to because the first application is enough! Stayed put after a 10 hour workday and it even held up to Florida heat & humidity!  Sunscreen is an added plus.  I have mildly sensitive skin and this did not irritate me at all.  No scent, love the pump applicator.  I donu2019t think Iu2019ll go back to my previous brand of foundation :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome kindly gave me the Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation in shade 330N for free so that I could review it. I've really struggled finding a natural matte-finish base product for my acne-prone skin and this is it. This is a lightweight skin tint can be built up to medium coverage. It great for oily skin and I didn't even use any powder to set it. The bottle is beautiful and has a easy pump that dispenses product out great. This is definitely a new favorite of mine.

reviews.review_title: My first luxury foundation did not disappoint!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in LOVE  with the foundation and I am so grateful to have tried this via bzzagent. The applicator (pump) is great. I can control how much product I need and trust me, you won't need alot! It blended effortlessly into my skin. It was a perfect match. The coverage is controllable and you can build however much you need. It covered my imperfections very well, leaves a matte finish on skin and controls oily skin (at least mine) perfectly.  Now I can't make the claim It will last 24 hours because who keeps makeup on their face that long? Lol. But I will say after 9+ hours of wear, my skin still looked flawless. It washed off well with my oil cleanser and I didn't have any breakouts after a week of using. Highly recommend this luxury foundation. You won't be disappointed.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 335W - For medium skin with warm/golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very excited to be able to try this Lancu00f4me matte foundation and see great results. Easy to apply but a bit tricky to match without going to the store. Long wear product which is nice and goes on so smooth. Overall happy with makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is amazing! It's extremely lightweight but provides excellent coverage and long wear time. I am loving the matte finish!

reviews.review_title: An excellent buildable skin like foundation.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is great for everyday wear, but it's so effortlessly buildable for a full coverage look. It sets more matte but not too matte to where it looks dry. Regardless of amount of coverage, it's consistently breathable. I would buy it and recommend it to others for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this for a few weeks. I love that it hides fine lines and doesn't look caked on. It's a really smooth finish. It matches my skin well and looks great for hours

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is one of the few formulas that is a true neutral shade and does not oxidize orange. It melts into skin seamlessly and has a velvety feel, but dries and blends into a semi matte finish. This lasts all day and I feel like my skin looks better after I remove it.

reviews.review_title: Try it out! You wonu2019t retreat
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This brand has been the best Iu2019ve ever bought. The foundation is creamy and smooth. Also, itu2019s included sunscreen so you donu2019t have to worry if you need to use a lot of skincare products before. It gives you a real tone. I would recommend it 100%

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been trying out this foundation for weeks and I LOVE IT! The finish on it is beautiful, not too glowy and not too matte. It truly is a skin-like finish. A little goes a long way with this foundation. One-pump of foundation was enough to cover my whole face, no concealer needed. It feels super light not the skin. If you have drier skin like me, make sure to prep your skin well so that it sits even better. The color is really beautiful and I like their shade range. It was pretty easy to find a shade that matched me. It covers everything that you need it to without being patchy and still letting some skin shine through. It is super buildable if you want a more full coverage finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Since I've been using this foundation I've been getting a lot of compliment about my skin! It lasts a longer longer than my usual foundation, smells great and blends in great with my complexion. I also don't get a greasy feel from it like I do other foundations. Strongly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like this foundation from Lancu00f4me. Itu2019s very lightweight and easy to apply. I love that it has sunscreen as well. Itu2019s buildable so I like that cause I can go for light coverage during the day and heavier coverage when I go out in the night. I like the pump application as well.The only downside is that itu2019s a little watery so be careful when applying. Other than that itu2019s amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome sent me this free sample through the BzzAgent sampling program. My product has sunscreen in, which I really enjoy. I know it's not enough on it's own but any extra protection can't hurt. The foundation itself is nice and light weight with good coverage. It dries down quickly but doesn't feel drying. Easy to apply, including quickly with my fingers when I'm a rush l.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this foundation. I have somewhat oily skin so the matte finish really helps. I worked all day & still received compliments at the end of my shift. It didnu2019t seem to oxidize so I was still the same color as when I applied in the morning.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 335W - For medium skin with warm/golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this foundation. Very lightweight and build able

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for a couple of weeks I can tell you I'm loving it. It so light and it made a perfect match to my skin. Please try it you won't regret buying it.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my makeup routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this foundation. It goes on smooth, feels like second skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 555 - For deep skin with cool/rich red undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love that itu2019s long wear and heat proof. I like it  when my foundation is buildable and this gives that without using too much product.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 250W - For light to medium skin with warm/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Having used this product for a couple days out I can say it lasts well throughout the day. It feels light when applying and gives a nice even finish. It isnu2019t the fullest coverage so I did find myself adding a bit of concealer to the redder spots on my face but overall a nice foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Lancu00f4me foundation, and Iu2019m impressed! The shade matched my skin perfectly, which is always a challenge for me. It provides light coverage that feels completely weightless, and itu2019s so comfortable to wear that I forget I have it on. Highly recommend if youu2019re looking for a natural finish without feeling heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for a week now , it is absolutely amazing ! Itu2019s so soft on my skin , my face looks amazing after applying it! Please try it , you will not be sorry for sure

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this product for a week straight now and I love this foundation. Itu2019s light weight and has buildable coverage. The shade I picked was an exact match and it doesnu2019t irritate my sensitive skin. It lasts all day on my oily skin. Would definitely get a second bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is nice! It is light and breathable and has really good coverage. Lots of colors to choose from and mine looks amazing on. Itu2019s like Iu2019m not even wearing foundation which is a huge plus for me. I donu2019t like feeling as if Iu2019m wearing a mask when I wear foundation.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 215C - For light skin with cool/pinky undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had heard good things about this foundation so tried it out. Iu2019m very happy with it and will purchase again. Itu2019s a good consistency and looked great on my combination skin. It lasted well through the day as well, even in the North Carolina humidity.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 305N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was hoping I wouldn't like this foundation as much as I did, mainly bc it's so expensive. But of course I loved it. It matches my skin tone perfectly & wears beautifully throughout the day. Not too oily & not too dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m so glad I got the opportunity to try this. Iu2019m going through menopause and Iu2019ve been looking for a foundation that doesnu2019t make my face too hot. This is it! I used toner, moisturizer, this and cream highlighter and it feels just right. I almost forgot I was wearing foundation! Thanks, this is my new go-to.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 345N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this Lancome foundation! It's very light on the skin, breathable, and easily blendable. I also like how spreadable the foundation is, so I don't have to use as much product to cover my face. I don't necessarily think the foundation lasts 24 hours as it claims to be. By the end of the day, the foundation was pretty much coming off of my face, but that could be because my face gets pretty oily at the end of the day, however, I do set with powder and setting spray.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using the 310N Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation for a little while now, and Iu2019m really happy with the results. The coverage is excellentu2014just enough to even out my skin tone without feeling heavy or cakey. It lasts all day without needing touch-ups, even in warmer weather, and the matte finish gives my skin a smooth, natural look. I also like that it doesnu2019t settle into fine lines or dry out my skin. Overall, itu2019s been a great foundation for long wear, and I love how it keeps my skin looking fresh throughout the day.

reviews.review_title: Love the finish on this foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After trying this product and wearing it for a while, I am impressed with the way it lasted on my skin. I do believe a different undertone besides the rich red would have looked better on my skin. I do love the product overall I just need the correct tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this foundation. It was light and feathery on my skin so it didn't feel heavy like I was really wearing makeup. It blended pretty well with my skin tone which is a big plus for me. It's quite thin so it will run if you aren't careful. I personally like this as I know it won't be a heavy product. I would definitely buy this product and recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For someone that doesnu2019t tend to wear foundations for every day, I was pleasantly surprised how light this felt on the skin! It offers great coverage and also can be buildable. Stayed on all day and helped minimize oil production in the T zone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pleasantly surprised by the long term coverage without a heavy foundation. Nicely covers imperfections without settling in creases.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am seriously in love with this foundation. Literally melts into your skin without being cakey or shiny. Great coverage but still feels light. Lasts all day without getting flakey or melting off.  I have super sensitive skin and I had absolutely no reaction to this foundation and it feels great on my skin. My skin doesnu2019t feel suffocating or dried out.  I really cannot say enough good things about it. Give it a go, you wonu2019t regret it.

reviews.review_title: A new staple in my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time trying Lancu00f4me foundation and I am impressed. Itu2019s a nice liquid consistency that isnu2019t too thick and leaves your skin looking youthful with its breathable formula. Itu2019s long lasting and I feel like it would be a good foundation choice even in the warmer months. Unfortunately, the shade pulled too peachy pink but thatu2019s a downfall of choosing shades online. I am absolutely going to repurchase in store in my correct shade!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation, and Iu2019m thoroughly impressed. The formula is lightweight yet provides excellent coverage, effectively evening out my skin tone without feeling heavy.  What I love most is its long-lasting power. It truly lives up to its 24-hour claim, staying matte and fresh throughout the day without any touch-ups needed. The foundation also resists transfer and sweat, making it ideal for busy days.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 305N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using the 305N Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation for some time now, and overall, I really like it. The formula is thin and lightweight, which feels comfortable on the skin, but it still provides great coverage. I was pleasantly surprised by how well it evens out my complexion without feeling heavy or cakey.  One of the standout features for me is its staying power. Even after a long day, it holds up well and doesnu2019t require much touch-up, which is a big plus. It gives a natural, smooth finish and blends easily with my skin tone.  Iu2019d recommend this foundation to anyone looking for something that feels light but offers full coverage. Itu2019s definitely become a go-to in my makeup routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this Lancu00f4me 24hr breathable foundation. It also has a broad spectrum SPF of 25 which is great. It applies nicely and has a good coverage. I put the foundation on over my tattoo to show of type of coverage it can do. This is with two layers that blend out really well. Itu2019s more of a matte finish which generally dries out my skin. This with good skin prep does not which is awesome. Itu2019s definitely breathable and does last all day like the claim. All in all I really like this and will be gkeeping this in rotation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this formula! Feels like weight, blends seamless, doesn't break me out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very breatheable formula, I have combination skin so I tend to search for formulas that feel like nothing is on my skin and this is definitely it! It does oxidize a little so keep in mind when shade matching! Light fragrance, but great for long wear!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really did like this foundation and there was a good shade range to choose from. Iu2019d recommend it

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 215C - For light skin with cool/pinky undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love how this feels on my skin! The application was pretty much flawless and helped cover up my greasy spots I wore it to work and I'm a housekeeper and it stayed in place all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had really wanted to love this foundation!  I'm always worried about shade match because I'm very pale, but the 090 shade was perfect!  It is a very thin liquid and feels very lightweight on the skin. Unfortunately, this sunk into my pores and looked awful, even with different pore filling primers :(  It always went on looking very thin and not makeupy but by the end of the day it always looked so heavy and cakey, without me ever adding anything throughout the day. It never looked dry on my combination skin but it just never looked good. I give it 2 stars for the shade and how thin and lightweight it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a new foundation and this one turned out to be exactly what I have been looking for. Having a matte finish with a foundation is important to me and this definitely fits that requirement for me. It goes on smoothly and blends well. The Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation is build able so you can have a light coverage or more if needed. It blends beautifully for contouring and highlighting. I don't have a problem with it transferring to my clothing. A little bit goes a long way as well and it washes off easy enough. Overall, I'm very satisfied with this foundation. I was sent a bottle of foundation to use for my honest review of the product and I do mean I'm honest.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item for free in exchange for my honest review. I was a little skeptical bc of choosing a color that through the internet but I was really surprised to see it was a great color match. I am so happy bc I fell in love with this foundation. I have tried this for a week with different methods of application (ex. Setting spray/no spray, setting powder/no powder, prior skin care routine and none) so I could gauge the difference and longevity of the wear. Feels very thin when applying but has great buildable coverage without feeling cakey. Stays matte through the day which is amazing in the southern heat. Absolutely love and have found an upgrade to my current foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This provides really great coverage and has great hydration which kept it from looking thick or cakey. It was tough to match my color with the online color key. I went a shade too dark, otherwise it would have been a perfect foundation for me. I def recommend if you can get the right color match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using the product for a week and it is worth it. It firs and feels perfect. It is long lasting and doesnu2019t feel so heavy but has the right amouny of coverage

reviews.review_title: Great matte full coverage foundation with SPF
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice matte coverage foundation. Itu2019s oil free but a hydrating matte formula. Feels good and soothing on skin and it lasts all day even in a humid climate. It really stays on and doesnu2019t  smude, transfer, or wear off. amuse, transfer

After using this foundation for approximately 2 weeks, I can say that it will be my must have! The 130C fit my skin tone perfectly. The application for me was with a dapple type brush, it applies flawlessly. It offers me great coverage without feeling heavy and I love the appearance even after I go to work, it's got great all day wear without needing to touch up. Thank you Lancome for a great foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this foundation all day long, and at the end of the day it still looked good, it has a matte finish which is personally what I like and look for most in a foundation, it is a very buildable and light foundation at the same time, would I buy it? Yes of course, and Lancome is an excellent brand, I am very happy with it, I recommend it to my friends and sister since they always ask me for makeup recommendations.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It it's the perfect coverage. I love a mostly sheer/light coverage foundation for my normal makeup routine and this one is perfect. I typically use chanel water tint and this is a little more coverage than  that. My only negative remark is it doesn't go on as creamy and smooth as the water tint but with a ton of moisturizer its not too bad. Once on your skin it blends in so good with your skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has great coverage and goes on super easy and it is very blendable. I do like the look and the range of colors available. My only gripe about the foundation is, later in the day I feel like it sets into my fine lines and I don't like that. Also I've had to reblend a bit during the day when I get a little oily. It does last me all day if I take time to fix.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation applies really nicely and is easily buildable. The color is nice but I did notice it oxidized a little on my skin. Didnu2019t make me breakout and didnu2019t weigh too heavy on my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is so lightweight and leaves my face feeling soft with a nice matte powdery finish.

reviews.review_title: Very easy to use! Very comfortable to wear!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this product. It is very easy to apply and it provides full coverage. I wore it the whole day and felt very comfortable. It hydrates well. Highly recommended for all occasions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this foundation in exchange for a review. The foundation itself is lightweight, and goes on very smooth with a great amount of coverage. It does not leave your face cakey and I have not had any issues with breakouts since using this product. I highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fair skin and chose shade 105W, which matches my skin quite well. I really liked how this foundation felt on my skin. The formula feels creamy and left my skin hydrated, while maintaining a nice matte finish. My skin is pretty sensitive and prone to breakouts, especially on my chin, but this foundation didnu2019t cause any reaction which makes it a winner imo. I have a lot a freckles which I like to keep visible, and a bit of redness around my nose and chin which I like to cover, and I felt this foundation did a good job at doing both. I also used a Lancu00f4me concealer to help diminish problem spots further, and the two products worked well together. Overall this is probably in my top three favorite foundations.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised. This formula seemed quite thin and I was doubtful of its ability to build. My color is 305N. After giving it a try I realized I love it. It gives a light natural look and I was able to use just a touch more in areas I need more coverage. No cakeyness and blends beautifully.  I received this as a free gift.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finish is absolutely natural. Easy to find a perfect shade. Long lasting and feels good at dry and combination skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 355N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the formula of this product but Iu2019m rating it only 4 stars because it wasnu2019t quite a perfect color match for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m really enjoying this foundation! I have normal/combo skin with an oily t-zone, and this foundation doesnu2019t make my skin super oily or shiny. It has a beautiful satin finish and sets well with loose powder. I find that it blurs my pores also. The shade I received (225N) does oxidize a little bit, but it ends up matching my light neutral complexion perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is beautiful. I am so pleasantly surprised with the updates Lancu00f4me has done with the formula and understand why it had such a following before. I usually wear skin tints, but was looking for something that would provide more coverage and have a different finish. This truly does wear so light it doesnu2019t feel like foundation on the skin and it is easy to build for desired coverage level. I have combo skin and was worried it would be patchy on drier areas, but it wore beautifully even at a baseball game sitting in direct sunlight for an hour. I love that itu2019s fragrance free and buildable, but my favorite is they have truly improved the shade selection for more olive skin tones like mine. I noticed immediately it compared to past experiences with the brand where I just could not fit the right undertones. So glad I got to get reintroduced to this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the Lancu00f4me foundation for a while now and my makeup is always flawless. Long lasting even in Florida humidity. I can layer other products and doesnu2019t look cakey. Creamy formula makes it easy to apply. Great value and lasts a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. The packaging has a luxurious look to it. The foundation comes out thin and kind of runny and yet a little goes a long way. My skin looked flawless and smooth with the first application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this foundation.  I have never tried Lancu00f4me for foundation before but this is going to be a staple.  The coverage is amazing and it goes on with ease.  It blends nicely and I can build upon it.  I didnu2019t think the right color based off the bottle but after using it I was surprised to see it match perfectly.  It does shake well before using.  I forget sometimes and I have not noticed a difference when I remember or forget.  It lasts all day.  I have worn it to my daughteru2019s softball game where it lasted through 3 games in the heat.  I definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shade is a little light for me but I made it work. It goes on very smooth and has great coverage, but does feel a little oily after a bit and does not do well with dark circles under your eyes. I will still use it, in conjunction with a dark circle coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved the Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation! It has a lightweight feel that doesnu2019t weigh down my skin, yet the coverage is excellentu2014just the right amount to even out my complexion without looking cakey. The texture is smooth and blends easily, leaving a natural matte finish that lasts all day. I was impressed with how well it held up, even through long days, and I didnu2019t need to touch up. Iu2019ll definitely be repurchasing this foundation!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 235N - For light to medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation definitely lasts nearly all day. I do find that for my skin it is a little drying. It may not be the best option for others with dry skin. Overall, this is a nice foundation, it has phenomenal coverage and isnu2019t too heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Looks so natural and goes on smoothly. Makes my eyes look more blue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this from Bzzagent to try and review. I have to say that after trying so many foundations on my own and not liking any of them this one is at the top of my list of being the best. I have never found a foundation I have ever liked. It goes on so easily.  I love how it blends into my skin and looks natural. I can wear it all day with no issues of my skin feeling dry or oily. I will definitely be committed to purchasing this for now on in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is worth every penny! I am always critical of producys with a heavy price tag because i feel like i can find similar performance for less but I was wrong with this one. This foundation is smooth and goes on flawlessly. Despite being matte, it is not drying but very soft and cushiony on skin. I am so impressed by the results: my skin tone is even and little imperfections are blurred with my skin still looking natural and not mask like. SPF during the day is crucial so that is an added plus! Overall, i would definitely recommend this foundation forbpily and combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little darker shade than used to but ok foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this foundation, I love wearing it to work everyday! I like to apply a thin layer with a beauty blender and it evens out about 80% of my skin tone. It makes my skin look smooth and doesnu2019t break down at the end of the day. The finish is natural for me, it doesnu2019t look too dewy or too matte.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product in my makeup routine for a wedding, and I had flawless coverage for the entire evening! The tint matched my skin tone perfectly, and the texture blended with my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! I love how smooth and silky this goes on. I apply it using a foundation brush and my skin looks flawless. I will be purchasing a lighter shade for the winter months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wouldu2019ve never thought Iu2019d actually like this foundation compared to my all the time one. But the way it sits is nice and it goes on very smoothly as well. This foundation is beneficial for me because of the way it covers and lasts as long as it does. Iu2019d buy this again if I ran out of it just because of the long last wear. Iu2019d definitely recommend this to friends and family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation for a little over a week. I love that this has buildable coverage. It's lightweight and doesn't feel heavy on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hides imperfections and evens out skin tone.However, It can highlight dry patches.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have always used lancome foundation and after using teint Idole Ultra 24 hour I can say I will continue! It leaves my skin silky and covers my scars with out it looking cakey. I love how smooth and creamy the foundation is and it really does last all night!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product has a lovely texture - it's very silky and smooth, and it provides really nice buildable coverage. I'd recommend it for anyone looking for seamless coverage that can last for several hours. There are lots of shades available - my only recommendation would be to make sure you get the right shade for you, as there are so many variations. This will allow you to find the perfect shade for your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using and reviewing this products for a week I noticed a positive change in my overall makeup application. This product goes on so smooth and when matched with the Lancu00f4me primer is absolutely beautiful. I will be buying this with my own money in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Thanks to Lancu00f4me I have received the teint idole ultra 24H long wear matte foundation in exchange for my honest opinion. I love that this product has spf and does not have a sunscreen sent. It does not leave your face looking shiny and has a medium coverage. I wore this on a hot day and did not sweat it off. Great for no make up look. I think this product is best on oily skin. I would recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice and smooth.  Love the sunscreen as well

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 305N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation delivers impressive long-lasting coverage without feeling heavy on the skin. It provides a matte finish that controls shine throughout the day, making it ideal for oily or combination skin types. The formula is buildable, blending smoothly for a natural look while effectively covering imperfections. One downside is that it can emphasize dry patches, so prepping the skin with moisturizer is essential. Overall, itu2019s a reliable foundation for all-day wear with a comfortable, flawless finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

I found the best way to apply it was using my hands, with a sponge it settled onto my skin in a weird pill like way but it didnu2019t do that when I used my fingers. Itu2019s long lasting and looks great on skin.

reviews.review_title: Silky lightweight foundation for a natural look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

This foundation has spf in it, so one less step in the morning for an effortless, natural look! I will be buying this when I run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

The formula was smooth and it gave second skin texture, again wrong shade so that all I could give

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Normal skin

Iu2019ve worn it on hot days, and it didnu2019t melt or fade. Thereu2019s a great range of shades, so it was easy to find one that matched my skin tone perfectly. If you need something lightweight that still offers good coverage and lasts all dayu2014even in the heatu2014this foundation is a solid choice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing melted like butter into my skin and shade was a perfect match

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

But I was very impressed with the look & feel on my skin! My only problem is it contains a ingredient that I'm not very comfortable with! I don't know why? You will need highlighter if your looking for a dewy look! Also put on moisturizer underneath if you have combo skin like me..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin

The color match was a bit off for me, but nothing a little bronzer wasnu2019t able to fiz!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this by BzzAgent for my review; I was a bit hesitant as most long wearing foundation is drying for my skin. This however wore very well throughout the day and the shade match was decent. At first it looked a bit dark but when buffed in it looked much more natural. The shade I chose 335W would be closest to MAC 25-30 for reference. I also wear Fenty blur stick in shade 7, Tom Ford Natural.  While I could wear it I still think it best suited for younger/more combination to oily complexions. There was a bit of transfer when wearing a face mask (I work with young children) so keep that in mind. Otherwise than that itu2019s a solid product and I would recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It blends really easily and has a creamy texture that feels nice on the skin. The matte finish on the bottle gives it a premium feel, and itu2019s a bonus that it includes SPF 25 for extra sun protection. The coverage is impressive and helps even out the skin tone well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free 555C Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation to review this product. The 555c Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation goes on flawlessly with great buildable coverage. I applied it with a clean face, no primer, concealer, or anything else to see how it: 1) covered blemishes and 2) would make my super sensitive skin react. The foundation exceeded my expectations in both areas. I was able to cover blemishes on my nose bridge (from my glasses) and no  irritations/hives/itching. I picked a shade that was warmer than I'd usually wear, however, after setting the foundation with powder, I was happy with the look. I would recommend this foundation to friends and family.  A little goes a long way when applied with a brush v. beauty blender. Very good foundation in comparison to M.A.C Studio Fix. Give it a try...just match the color at SEPHORA 1st.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 335W - For medium skin with warm/golden undertones

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product itu2019s super easy to apply and hydrating, I have very sensitive skin and it leaves my skin feeling great if not better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin

It has a great coverage and is long lasting. I would most likely have to use a lighter color as the winter progresses and my skin tone becomes fairer. I would also love to try their dewy finish as well. Overall it is a good matte foundation and I would definitely buy it again and try other colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
