reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with combination skin, finding a foundation that lasts all day without turning oily or dry has always been a challenge. But after trying the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation in 355N, I finally feel like Iu2019ve found the perfect balance.Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear in 355N is a reliable, long-lasting foundation that checks all the boxes for meu2014coverage, comfort, and staying power. Itu2019s perfect for people with combination or oily skin who need a foundation that lasts through the day without looking greasy or dry so I made sure to let all my friends and family know how great I think this is. I highly recommend it for anyone looking for a high-performance foundation that looks and feels natural. I did receive this item for free in exchange for my honest review.  Would I repurchase it? Absolutely. Itu2019s worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product from Lancu00f4me! Has up to 24 hours of wear and contains spf 25. Teint Idole Ultra wear provides great coverage and feels lightweight. This foundation lasts all day and hardly any transfer. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is AMAZING! It's made with really good quality ingredients and glides on the skin so smoothly! It is something I would definitely buy over and over again. If you're looking for a good concealer, this is the one for you! I absolutely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product over the past few weeks, I can say I am in love with it! It blends perfectly with your skin, the formula feels soft and light. Itu2019s easy to apply, it gives your skin a soft look. I would definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: Unfortunately not a good foundation for me!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the foundation several different ways and I'm just not a fan.  My skin is combination with some drier spots, I'm 54 and have light wrinkles.  The color was spot on, great match (done online no less!).  I start with moisturizer and then sunscreen and wait about 20 min to put on foundation.  Pros: love the pump, very easy to dispense, only need 2 pumps to cover the whole face, good coverage and it is buildable, no fragrance Cons: it did not wear evenly, by the end of the day I had caking and areas around my nose that had worn off, could definitely tell I was wearing a foundation (which is fine if it is even and beautiful!)  I used a foundation brush first which seemed to go on well but did not wear evenly.  The next couple of times I used a beauty blender and that was much better.  Still didn't wear well.  I also set a couple of times with Laura Mercier loose powder and that didn't really help.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

I did like the finish, it was smooth on my skin, but I did find an issue that would prevent me from using it again. I believe I colormatched correctly, but the foundation left a slight white cast that made my full face look ashy. I wonder if it's the sunscreen ingredients. My photo is one large pump (product comes out fast) that I put on my full face. I didn't attach the full face photo because it looked lightweight clown like. I'd give it 3.5 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using it for several days and I fall more in love with it every day. I recommend for daily use since it is easy to build in layers and its finish is wonderful. My skin does not feel dry at all, the tone goes perfectly with my skin and it is something that is difficult for me to find. In general I couldn't be more satisfied, I will buy 2 more because it is already my favorite.

reviews.review_title: Perfect Match and All-Day Wear for Busy Moms!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As a busy mom, I needed a foundation thatu2019s quick and easy to apply, and Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear in shade 355N has been perfect for that! I use a beauty blender, and it takes 60 seconds or less to blend it in seamlessly. Add another 60 seconds for eyeliner and mascara, and Iu2019m out the door.  At first, I thought the shade might be too light, but Iu2019m amazed at how well it matches my skin tone. Being Latina with a diverse background, itu2019s always tough to find the right shade, but this one really gets it. It feels light and soft on my skin, like Iu2019m not wearing makeup at all.  What I love most is how long it lasts. I put it on in the morning, run errands, hit the gym, and it still holds up all day through work and evening activities. Itu2019s truly sweat-proof and performs way better than other foundations Iu2019ve tried. I love it!

reviews.review_title: Worth it if you can find your shade
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

I found my shade based on the chart and it made my face look ashy. With that being said, I would recommend this foundation if you can find your shade.

reviews.review_text: Teint Idole Ultra Wear is a great choice if you're looking for a buildable, breathable full coverage foundation that lasts all day. It has a smooth, natural matte finish and is perfect for long wear since it's waterproof, sweat-proof, and transfer-resistant. However, I wish it was a bit more hydrating on my skin, as it seems to work best for oily skin types. Overall, it's a fantastic option if you prefer a matte look and need something that holds up through the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Teint Idole Ultra Wear is a great choice if you're looking for a buildable, breathable full coverage foundation that lasts all day. It has a smooth, natural matte finish and is perfect for long wear since it's waterproof, sweat-proof, and transfer-resistant. However, I wish it was a bit more hydrating on my skin, as it seems to work best for oily skin types. Overall, it's a fantastic option if you prefer a matte look and need something that holds up through the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

This foundation has excellent coverage and its buildable. It doesn't make my pores look bigger or accentuates them. It stays fresh looking for hours at least 9 hours which is the longest time I wear makeup. I received this as gift but my review is 100% my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Normal skin

The only concern I have is that it does enhance some skin texture so definitely prep your skin beforehand. I received the product in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

It was my first time trying the foundation and I believe I'ma get this foundation again for sure reasons are it's super super lightweight you forget u have foundation on. It gives you great coverage but it's not a heavy foundation. It's a must.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I prefer this foundation when getting ready in the morning. Itu2019s a very versatile foundation for a few reasons- it is more liquidy and has a neutral tint. Being more liquid makes it easier to build up from medium to full coverage! The tint is important especially for me as a brown woman- I have very neutral undertones. It doesnu2019t have a thick goopy feel and leave your makeup feeling and looking heavy. This shade 310 N is a little light for me but I find that if I mix it with a drop or two of another darker foundation, itu2019s perfect. It mixed well. It doubles as a sunscreen too although I do still use a sunscreen underneath. Overall if youu2019re looking for a skin like finish that doesnu2019t feel heavy i recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome is a great brand and they offer a great wearable matte foundation that has sunscreen in it. The packaging is elegant and I love the glass bottle. I liked the pump dispense top. The formula is lightweight, but I will say it does come out of the bottle fast. Also as my skin is aging I am noticing that I may need to switch to a more dewy finish rather than a matte drier formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wow. I am really impressed with this foundation. As someone who prefers more of a light/medium coverage or tinted moisturizer look, I still love how wearable this is for everyday. It glides onto my skin so effortlessly and with just one pump I get a really natural looking finish. It definitely feels buildable but I wouldn't personally use it to get full coverage. The photo is of me with about 1.5 pumps on my face. I'm also impressed with how it stays throughout the day and still maintains that glowy, natural look. I really love for my makeup to also have skincare in it so this just hits all the boxes with the hyaluronic acid.  I was initially worried that the color I picked (330N) would be too grey for me but it seems pretty perfect. Overall I'm super impressed with this product and would recommend to anyone looking for a glowy, natural-looking, buildable foundation!

reviews.review_title: Ideal for oily to combination skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancu00f4me's Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation in 400W provides full coverage with a matte finish, perfect for medium to tan skin with warm undertones. The formula is lightweight, long-lasting (up to 24 hours), and controls shine, making it ideal for oily or combination skin. Itu2019s non-comedogenic, so it wonu2019t clog pores, which helps prevent breakouts. One of the best features is its barely noticeable smell, which is great because I donu2019t like when makeup has a strong scent. I wore it on a hot Texas day, and it stayed really well, with no need for touch-ups, even in the heat. I loved the smooth, flawless finish, but the 400W shade was a bit darker than I expected. For those who prefer a polished, long-lasting look, it's a great investment, though itu2019s on the pricier side. Be sure to prep your skin well if you have any dry areas, as it can feel a bit drying. Overall, itu2019s a reliable choice for full coverage and durability in challenging conditions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation, and it exceeded my expectations in every way. As someone with a holistic approach to living, I appreciate high-quality products that perform well without compromising on skin health, and this foundation delivered on all fronts.  Firstly, the coverage is phenomenal. It provides a flawless, full-coverage finish that still looks natural. The formula is lightweight and breathable, which is crucial for everyday wear, especially in Florida's humid climate. I found that it didn't clog my pores or cause any breakouts, which is a huge plus for my sensitive skin.  What impressed me the most was its staying power. This foundation truly lives up to its ultra wear claim. It lasted all day without fading or requiring touch-ups, even during a busy day that included preparing for a hurricane. The matte finish kept shine at bay, and I appreciated not having to worry about my makeup melting off in the heat.  Additionally, the shade range is extensive, making it easier to find a perfect match for my skin tone. The formula also blends seamlessly, creating an even, smooth complexion.  Overall, Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation is a top-notch product. It's perfect for anyone looking for reliable, long-lasting coverage that maintains a natural look. Whether you're spending a day at the beach, working in a non-profit office, or enjoying a night out, this foundation has you covered. Highly recommended!  Disclaimer: I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 3.5/5. Not bad but itu2019s a little bit too matte for my liking. Great coverage and feels nice on the skin but sadly doesnu2019t work well for my combo skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful coverage!  I've used this foundation for about a week now and itu2019s a beautiful product. Itu2019s very natural and has great coverage. The lightweight formula blends effortlessly and lasts all day. Even though this foundation is a little pricier than I normally pay, I am definitely buying it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 100W - For fair skin with warm/yellow undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite part of this foundation is that it felt like you didn't have anything on. The natural finish added to the natural look which is very in right now. My skin is on the drier side, so I do sometimes mix a little bit of moisturizer to help it go on smoothly.

reviews.review_title: Make sure to correctly color match
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with acne, prone skin and redness, I do like the coverage this foundation offers. If you apply just a few small drops, it goes on very lightly without heavy, but itu2019s definitely buildable, which is nice for when I need more coverage and want to look full glam. The biggest problem I have with the foundation is the color seems to oxidize, and it turned a bit darker with an orange under hue once it settled on my skin. So even though the color looked correct once it was pumped onto my hand or in the pictures, it definitely changed as it sat on your skin so I would make sure to correctly color match before purchasing.

reviews.review_title: Teint Idole Ultra Wear Skinu2019s New BFF with SPF
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation with SPF 25 is an impressive long-wear foundation that lives up to its promises. Its natural matte finish provides a polished, flawless look without feeling cakey or heavy on the skin. The formula is lightweight and breathable, making it comfortable for all-day wear, even in humid or active conditions.  One of the standout features is its longevityu2014it stays put for up to 24 hours, controlling shine and providing excellent coverage without requiring frequent touch-ups. The inclusion of SPF 25 is a nice bonus, offering daily sun protection. Its medium to full coverage is buildable, seamlessly covering imperfections, redness, or uneven skin tone while still looking natural. The only potential drawback is that for those with dry skin, it might accentuate dry patches if not paired with a good moisturizer or hydrating primer. Overall, itu2019s an excellent choice for those seeking a long-lasting, high-coverage foundation that still looks natural and fresh.

reviews.review_title: Good, but not worth the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have mixed feelings about foundation. I tried applying it multiple ways (with my hands, a brush, a dry sponge, and a wet sponge) and by far the best was with a wet sponge. The other ways left it fairly visible on my skin. With any method, it did last all day and didnu2019t need to be powdered to keep fairly matte. I just feel like for the price, you should be able to apply it however you want and it looks amazing every time. I feel like this foundation should probably cost half of what it does.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good foundation if your looking for a medium finish with a natural look. It is not matte or dewey which I like. It is lightweight and stayed on well. I paired it with the matching concealer and it looked great. It blends out well and did not oxidize on my skin. Over all I would recommend Lancome Teint Idole Ultra Wear foundation as an everyday wearable foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for the past week, my make up routine has drastically improved. You really only need this foundation and youu2019re good to go. You donu2019t even really need concealer. It also has SPF in it so this reduces the time of applying another SPF before I apply my foundation. It really does last all day and is spear proof. The only thing I would change about the formula is it being a little chalky. Make sure to get your right shade because it will make you look a little pale and chalky if itu2019s too light for your skin tone. Other than this I think itu2019s a great go to. Thank you Lancu00f4me for the sample to try out!

reviews.review_title: Long lasting, natural matte, evens skin tone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is able to even out my skin tone really well. It doesn't blend out as easily as I hoped so it was patchy the first couple of times I used it but a damp beauty blender helps even it out. It stays on my skin all day and is definitely a natural matte finish. Would recommend!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 235N - For light to medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has really nice texture, great coverage and looks very natural.  It blends well and lasts throughout the day.  Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love how it looks on my skin, itu2019s beautiful and makes my skin look so dewey and perfect but also matte into it. Itu2019s an amazing long lasting product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE!! Itu2019s billable and the perfect coverage 10/10

reviews.review_title: A must have for everyday makeup
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used this product for a week now, and I really like it it has no scent which is great cause I donu2019t like when my foundations have a scent. It also have great coverage and it feels so light on my skin and itu2019s totally buildable which I like too! Itu2019s my go to now

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I find it hard to find good skincare/base products to use that doesnu2019t break me out or apply uneven and this one is excellent! I donu2019t have any problems applying because of the smooth/blendable consistency. The coverage is buildable and you can easily control the amount of product you want to use. Beautiful packaging, flawless makeup finishes. 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a standout foundation known for its long-lasting coverage and lightweight feel. It provides a natural matte finish while effectively concealing imperfections. The formula is comfortable on the skin, making it suitable for all day wear. I like it.
Color match was perfect and it applied smoothly. However I did expect it to be a little bit more matte, I noticed my skin getting oily around the nose. Love that it has SPF!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is amazing. I can not go back to any other. I love how it wears and looks natural to my complexion. Itu2019s not drying like some matte foundations. Itu2019s long wearing I have no complaints

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation. Leave my face flawless and goes on smoothly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for about a week and a half, I can honestly say that I love the feel of it on my face. It feels like youu2019re not wearing anything. I love the smooth finish and longevity of this foundation. The best everyday foundation. I most definitely recommended it to a few of my friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the product. I believe it shows up very natural on skin which i truly enjoy. Not too cakey neither. Definitely will be one of my go to for everyday wear

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 560 - For deep skin with cool/rich red undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shade I got was a little too dark but I love the formula!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first glance, I loved this product. The bottle feels so luxurious and the product is beautiful on. It gives a polished look and last all day long. The color was a little off for my skin but overall was happy. Then, a couple hours into wearing, my face started to burn. Iu2019m not usually too sensitive to things. However, this product did not agree well with my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Finding the perfect foundation shade match for my skintone can be a challenge but I was super excited that this shade was a near perfect match! I also love that it provides sun protection since I live in sunny SC and wear facial sunscreen everyday regardless of weather forecast. The coverage is just right. Not too heavy and does not settle into fine lines or wrinkles on my mature skin. Coverage lasts all day without a need for touch ups. It seems to balance my skin wellu2026does not get shiny throughout the day nor does it dry out my skin. I will definitely repurchase in the future and have already recommended to a few friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was immediately impressed with the silky texture of this foundation. I always skin prep with moisturizer, sunscreen, and primer. Coupled with my skin prep this foundation wore beautifully of my oily/combo acne prone skin. It went on smooth and easily blended with a medium/full coverage that feels easily build able. It felt light and breathable and seemed to melt into my skin, without settling into my fine lines. Very my skin but better. It wore with a somewhat dewey finish with becoming oily or breaking up. It lasted all day without any noticeable movement or transfer. I was incredibly impressed with this Lancome foundation and I will buy it over and over again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smooth finish and the longevity of this product. I used it on a day of running around and had a gathering later and it survived and no need to touch up. Buildable and love the fact it went well with my skin to and under tones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this foundation for over a week and love it. It has great coverage, buildable and lasts all day. I have worn this foundation to work out and itu2019s breathable and also does not transfer after sweating! I have been able to wear all day without re applying. I also have very sensitive skin and this has not caused any breakouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really enjoy the look and feel of this foundation. Saves me a step by not having to apply sunscreen prior. Great color, easy blend

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 090N - for fair skin with neutral/pinky undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this for a few weeks now. I really like it. I have pretty dry skin and I like the fact that it doesn't show texture the way that alot of other foundations do on me. It hasn't clogged my pores either. It goes on very natural. But at the same time is very buildable. I am able to wear it all day, and it looks just as good at the end of the day. No separation,  oxidation. No nothing. Honestly I would have 5 stars but I don't love the faint smell. But it'd not enough to make want to stop using it. I really love this foundation

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 130C - For fair to light skin with cool/pinky undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this foundation for a little over a week and overall, I really like it. The color match was surprisingly great considering I chose the color online. I love that it has buildable coverage. It's definitely not too heavy and I can even show off my freckles unless I want to build upon the coverage. I can't believe just how long this foundation has held up. I've tested it out for a full day and even worn it to bed to see how it holds up for 24 hours of wear. When I woke up with the makeup still on, my skin was still covered and the foundation held up. I have to say that I also have been able to go for hours without needing to touch up with powder, which is honestly fairly shocking for me because I definitely have issues with oily skin and shine in my T-zone. It's not uncommon for me to need to touch up with powder only an hour after first applying some makeup, but I've been able to go for over 4 hours without feeling like I was very shiny with this foundation. My biggest issue is that I think it's just too thin and runny. I applied this product using a foundation brush and then again with a sponge, and I found it to be quite liquidy and just seeped down into the brush and sponge. I know it's supposed to be a thin and breathable foundation, but I just found it to be a touch too thin and prefer foundations that are a little thicker and hold up with a little more consistency on a brush or sponge as I'm applying the product. I felt like I had to go back and add a little more to my brush just to get the right coverage because it was too thin. Overall, I think this is a great foundation that absolutely holds up for long-term wear with just the right level of coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I decided to test this foundation for all day use, I applied it on at 9 am and the application was so smooth and I have combination skin and it covered all my redness! This foundation isnu2019t cakey or heavy at all! Itu2019s buildable, and against the Texas heat and humidity plus being a mom always on the go, it withstood everything and didnu2019t even crease or come off at all! I definitely recommend this foundation if you need amazing coverage with a great feeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this foundation for a while, and it has quickly become my go-to. It provides light to medium coverage without feeling heavy, and it blends seamlessly into the skin. The finish is natural, not too matte or too dewy, which works great for everyday wear. I also love that it lasts all day without needing touch-ups. Overall, itu2019s a reliable foundation that feels comfortable on the skin and gives a flawless look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So this foundation is something special for a few reasons ok maybe more then a few reasons lol!!! Ok 1 it's super lightweight  2. It's full coverage  3. it make my skin look smooth 4. It makes my pores disappear! Wow!! 5. It's not dry looking!!  6. Last all day! 7. Lots of colors to choose from  Give it a try you won't be sorry! I'm very excited to keep using this foundation! I would absolutely recommend this to everyone, but keep in mind depending on your skin type please make sure you prepare your skin before you apply your makeup, I hate to read bad reviews when people don't take the time to apply properly .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is top tier. I'm obsessed with this new formula, it provides long-lasting, buildable coverage with a natural matte finish. The lightweight formula blends effortlessly and feels comfortable throughout the day.

reviews.review_title: Exactly what you good for in a foundation.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! I'm not normally a liquid foundation user, but when I was sent this product (for free, in exchange for my honest review), I was absolutely delighted with the blendability, lack of oxidization, and light feeling of this product. Definitely a new standard in my makeup kit!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this foundation for a week now and i love the finish product. It looks cery natural, it has great coverage, a little bit goes a long way. It is thin, doesn't feel heavy and is stackable. I have combination skin, more on the oily side but the product is still great and didn't make me feel more oily as others do. Definitely recommended ud83dudc4cud83cudffb

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After trying this product for the last couple of weeks, I do think it is a great foundation. It is the most lightweight foundation I have ever tried, it truly feels like you are wearing nothing. Another thing I loved about the foundation was the amount of shades that they had. It can be hard to find a foundation that isn't super yellow or pink and they have the perfect shades for this. The one downside of this foundation it might not be great for dry skin. It is slightly matte and tends to cling to my dry spots. Besides that, I really do love the foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like how this foundation looks on my face. The pump application makes it easy to apply to my face using a sponge or brush. I like how it blends really easy. I found this foundation looks better on my skin than my previous brand. It stays on well and looks great under my makeup. It doesn't leave a too shiny application look. A plus that it has sunscreen in it and is a breathable foundation. The bottle is easy to carry in your makeup bag or purse. I will definitely buy this item, maybe in a tad darker shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent foundation! Great quality and great coverage. Itu2019s easy to apply and also love that itu2019s added sun protection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This glides on effortlessly, and feels velvety smooth on. The skin tone match is excellent. I am impressed with how long lasting it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this foundation.  It is very blendable and breathable.  I love that this has sunscreen in it. This lasted all day and looked great. It does not feel oily either. This is full coverage too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is my new best friend!  It does on sheer, is not oily at all and lasts all day!  The color is amazing and has a little peachy tint to it, which I love.  It is a little matte, so I mix it with some moisturizer for a more dewy look.  So happy to try it, cannot wait to buy it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Lancu00f4me foundation as a gift from BzzAgent to review, and all I can say is that I really wish I had given it a try sooner. I love how this foundation is lightweight and has a matte finish. It offers continuous, long-lasting coverage. I would consider this more of a buildable coverage foundation. Overall, I feel like this foundation is amazing for oily combo skin just because it sets down to a really nice matte finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m going to start saying that Iu2019m very attached and faithful to my make up brands. I tend to use powder foundation and this is first time since a long time ago that I tried liquid foundation. I received free sample from the brand and I thought Iu2019ll give it a try! Lancome is definitely different level in quality, I loved consistency of the liquid, it very easily blended to my skin looking very natural and hydrated. It gave me full coverage on all little imperfections that I have on my face and lasted all day. I love this brand it might be my new marriage:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great long wearing product, it covers up really good and leaves a dewy juicy texture it looks so good, I did received this product as a gift in exchange for my review, it is good but I donu2019t know if worth the price point

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my review. This foundation did a good job hiding my red blotchy skin. Since it is a matte finish it wasn't the best for my dry textured skin. I liked this foundation and I hope to find a good primer or technique that will allow me to use this on dry aging skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: just as the headline says. its the perfect amount of coverage and not dry like most matte foundations are on my dry-normal skin. i dont feel like im caking foundation on like i do with most spf foundations.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After trying many foundations, I have finally found my u201choly grailu201d! Lancu00f4me Teint Idole was a perfect match and leaves my skin looking flawless and hydrated. It doesnu2019t settle in my pores or fine lines and the rest of my makeup sets down perfectly on top of it. It is king wearing and that is a bonus for me! I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Used this product for a week so far and love it! Has spf 25 and feels very lightweight. Extremely breathable and looks very skinlike. It wears great, it doesnu2019t break up or get patchy throughout the day. I usually put some blush and bronzer over it and they also blend in great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is definitely a new fave! It absolutely stays on all day. Itu2019s buildable also. I like a light to medium coverage and itu2019s perfect, although it could be full coverage as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really do love this foundation! Itu2019s like a second skin, I donu2019t even feel it on my face. The shade is absolutely a perfect match as well. (Iu2019m super fair so of you are this shade would be great for you too!) Another added bonus is that this foundation has spf in it. It overall is super easy to blend and truly has a flawless finish!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for the past few weeks, I have learned to love this. I love how it's buildable. It's not very cakey, and it's not very oily. I had no problems applying this with my makeup sponge and I think this company makes good makeup anyway, and I highly recommend this to anybody who does not like a very cakey face and you like to be able to build up your foundation to your liking. I did receive this product for free for tested purposes, and I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation went on smoothly and made my skin look filtered. I applied with a dense brush & found that it wore well throughout the day, in places I didnu2019t touch. It is buildable and doesnu2019t cling to dry patches. I would also say the shade I got is classified as u201ccoolu201d but it looks more neutral.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this foundation!! Living in a city with a constant changing weather makes it hard to wear full coverage foundation because it leaves marks/stains on my clothes but this one is an absolute dream! never splurged on a higher end foundation before but I have been converted! This Lancome foundation is an absolute dream!!! You need just a little and spread so easy, it is light on your face and appears so smooth on the skin - it looks like you have filter on!!! The best part is it doesn't leave my skin shiny or looking oily. I am in love with this product and will most definitely be my go-to product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am not typically a foundation girly, but i really liked how this felt on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this foundation, the coverage was medium but very buildable and the shade matched my skin great which is really hard to do! (I haven't found a good concealer match yet) The texture is great and velvety and I love the matte finish it gives my skin without it looking cakey, thick, or dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very high-quality foundation. It blends seamlessly into the skin and really provides a nice finish with no shine without looking dry and cakey. I love the bottle and how easy it is to use the pump. It does not have a nasty overwhelming smell either. I always get a little oily on my nose, but this actually still stayed there.

reviews.review_title: Donu2019t have enough words for my love for this!

reviews.review_text: FANTASTIC!! I have ZERO complaints. Coverage is clean and smooth. Superior coverage. Will be buying more once Iu2019m out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best foundation I have ever tried.  I applied it using a brush and it melted into my skin.  It makes your skin look like your best skin ever, not like you're wearing foundation.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 235N - For light to medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been loving this Lancome Teint Idole Foundation! The coverage is medium buildable. It doesn't oxidize on my skin! It looks just as good after I apply it as it does at the end of the day! I definitely recommend this if your looking for a good foundation that won't oxidize! I received this as a free sample for my honest opinion!

reviews.review_title: Left my skin looking and feeling flawless!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this foundation. Left my skin feeling flawless and light. It didnu2019t give me that heavy weighed down feeling like some foundations Iu2019ve used in the past. It was absolutely amazing. Iu2019m 37 and have some texture in my skin as Iu2019ve started to show some signs of aging but it didnu2019t settle into my fine lines. Absolutely loved this. Buy this!! You wonu2019t regret it. Worth every cent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is a revelation for anyone seeking that perfect blend of coverage and natural glow. The texture of Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation is breathable but full coverage, which is a dream come true for my sensitive skin. It glides on effortlessly and blends into my skin with such ease that it feels like a second skin. The coverage is impeccableu2014just a small amount is enough to cover imperfections and even out my skin tone, yet it feels utterly weightless. They also did a fantastic job with the shade range. With a wide variety of tones, it was easy to find a perfect match for my skin tone, something I've often struggled with in other brands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Product is honestly buildable. Not for my specific skin type but I do like it and will use for my mother!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

The coverage is good. I would not wear this daily but would wear it for going out in the evening. It is long lasting as described.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hate foundation in general and always struggle to find one I like.  I have never found one I like actually, until this!  It is so thin and provides great coverage.  It feels and looks very natural.  It looks like I just have beautiful skin and am not wearing makeup.  The price is not my favorite but I'm hoping it lasts long enough that the price will be worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would love to give this 5 stars because of its blend ability whether itu2019s with fingers, a sponge or brush it is flawlessu2026 also it goes on smooth with full coverage and it can also be build able without caking up; but I do not have my right color. The shade I received is too dark and it also oxidizes a little darker than the initial color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the finish of this foundation & I find it sits well on dry spots! Truly is a buildable coverage that lasts all day. I can also say it is indeed transfer free, which is super sick & cool

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 420W - For medium-deep skin with warm/golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm very late to the party and I've only been using this foundation for a few weeks but it's absolutely beautiful. I can wear this without a primer and it still looks great. I use my regular moisturizer underneath with a mattifying moisturizer in my tzone (super oily). I have no issues with it lasting all day and you can't even tell I'm wearing foundation. It doesn't settle in my fine lines and it gives me the most amazing finish!

reviews.review_title: Best of both worlds, color with sunscreen
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome sent me this free sample through the BzzAgent sampling program. As I have gotten older, I noticed more brown spots and or sun damage on my face. So I not only need to use sunscreen daily, but also light coverage to blur the existing damage. I do not like the feel of heavy make up and have a busy life that is both inside and outside which can be very hard on skin. I love that TUI has medium coverage and sunscreen, the best of both worlds. It looks very natural, blurs the dark spots and mattes unflattering shine. Color blends perfectly with my skin, so I get the no make up flawless look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m shocked at how lightweight this is but still gives a good tint! I really thought this was going to be heavier but itu2019s so light for every day. I may be converted to this from my usual routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation provided great, long-lasting coverage. Color was a great match to my skin tone.

reviews.review_title: Covers all blemishes in your life
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Full coverage is putting it lightly. You could have an abscess the size of a watermelon on your cheek, but all that inflammation will be covered up no problem with this product. One pump fully covered my face and it spread easily. I would never use this as a layering foundation, but the coverage is phenomenal (obvs.) and creates a very clean, even surface to go in with everything else you use.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 215C - For light skin with cool/pinky undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a creamy foundation with full coverage. Not heavy at all! I'm a bit oily and this worked great and lasted all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product to test out and give an honest review. I am wearing the shade 205 C. I am 40 years old and it's hard to find a foundation right for my skin. This one was not too matte or not too dewy. What I live about this product is that it has SPF in it and is one less product I have to put on in the morning. What I also love is that yes it does show my natural texture, but does not look cakey. I also love that this is hydrating and long lasting. I've worn it all day at the office and all night for dinner and dancing and it still stayed put.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've never splurged on a higher end foundation before but I have been converted! This Lancome foundation is an absolute dream!!! I was a little worried that the box labels it as a sunscreen, but that was fleeting. Not only is it incredibly light on your face, but the texture is SO smooth!!!!! It glides onto your skin so easily and the coverage level is just perfect! Doesn't leave me shiny or looking oily, and doesn't give a caked on look either. I am in love with this product and will most definitely be ordering it again when this bottle is through.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Nice coverage and the shade is also nice. I can wear it alone or add to it for a full face beat. My skin is not oily looking or caked looking after I put it on after a long while. It also applies well and is easy to wash off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed the wear of this foundation. It lasted all day with no breakup and didnt leave me oily. I'd say its a medium buildable coverage and on my skin its more soft matte. I would buy again but in another color because it was to dark and too red.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancu00f4me through bzzagent kindly gave me this foundation for free so that I could review it. Honestly I would actually purchase it on my own, it has buildable coverage without making you cakey and it lasts all day long. Itu2019s the best foundation Iu2019ve used in a long time. Itu2019s been my go to since I got it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time using this foundation and I really liked it. I like that itu2019s easy to blend and itu2019s very light on the face. I have really oily skin and felt it helped my face not be so shiny. My only negative would be there is a slight scent but I only noticed it when I first applied and after that didnu2019t notice it the rest of the day. This will be In my rotation of daily foundations to wear!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a Marte foundation. Saying this, if you have dry Skin like mine you should moisturize your face a lot before. It has a good coverage and it is one of the only ones that stayed in my face all day. If you have oily skin, itu2019s perfect

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a combo, acne-prone skin, gal.. I really love this! I'm pretty picky about foundation because I don't want to be too dewy or too matte, and this is the perfect balance with a natural finish. It leans more on the matte side, but not cakey or drying at all. I like that this gives really nice medium coverage, that looks super natural and lasts! LOVE that it has SPF in it as well.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 510N - For deep skin with neutral/deep peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this foundation for a few weeks, I see why so many people rave about it. Itu2019s so smooth and easy to apply to your skin. No creasing, weird smells, or dryness from this foundation. The color match was great as well and I love how they have so many different shades. Definitely try it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is incredibly silky and long lasting. Buildable and provides the best natural non cakey looking coverage.Blends so perfectly.

reviews.review_title: Full coverage but lightweight and comfortable
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have a light-medium, olive skin tone with very cool undertones. I got the shade 215C, and the shade match is pretty good but still runs a bit orange on me. (This is a typical problem I have with most complexion products.) If you are olive like me, I think the neutral tones might be better (i.e. less orange).  The foundation applies easily with my fingers or a brush and sets down without streaking. This lasts for 10+ hours on my oily skin, and is quite comfortable on my skin. The finish is a natural matte (not a flat matte) and it looks nice, although I do prefer something a little more luminous.   Really appreciate that this is fragrance free since my skin is so sensitive!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this foundation. I am a very oily person when it comes to wearing makeup. Although it didnt solve it 100%, it was way less than what I usually get with my go to foundation. It has no strong scent. The shade match is also 9/10. The coverage is always buildable which i love.  Another thing is that this foundation did not come off at all. Usually with the heat and sweat my foundation starts getting tacky and comes off around my nose and lip area. Well not this one!! I definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lightweight foundation is amazing especially in this Georgia heat where itu2019s still wants to be hot or cool in the same day. Highly recommend this to friends and family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first thing I noticed is how it looks like it's sitting on top of the skin while applying. After a while of wearing it does set in and look more melted into the skin but it's not ideal that it doesn't look super great right after applying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear is an excellent foundation! I could say for me, it is a perfect skin match and great coverage. I have Asian color skin which between fair and medium and I had 250W. I love that the shade blend seamlessly into my skin, providing a natural look. I received many compliments from coworkers. I wear it all day and I can see the full coverage effectively conceals imperfections, and most of all without feeling heavy or cakey. Its long-lasting formula stays flawless for up to 24 hours with a finish that works for my skin type. This foundation is ideal if you want great coverage and a breathable, smooth complexion all day.

reviews.review_title: Perfect Everyday Foundation with Long-Lasting Cove
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Lancu00f4me 305N Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation for a few weeks now, and it's quickly become my go-to. The formula provides full coverage without feeling heavy or cakey, and it lasts all dayu2014no need for touch-ups, even with my combination skin. The shade 305N blends perfectly with my complexion and gives a natural, matte finish that still looks fresh hours later. I also love how it feels lightweight and breathable. If you're looking for a reliable foundation that holds up through long days, this one is a winner!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 560 - For deep skin with cool/rich red undertones
reviews.review_text: I like it. It covers nice and smooth, not heavy very breathable not cakey. Do recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this foundation! Perfect shade match. Lightweight and great coverage. Itu2019s definitely one of my new favorite's.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and it did not leave my skin greasy after 10 hours. It honestly feels like a second skin and not a heavy product sitting on top of my skin. The color matched me perfectly and it is also buildable, which I like for the evening. I did not use powder or setting spray to set it and this foundation didn't move! I highly recommend it for a natural look on combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear foundation is the best I have tried so far! What I love about it is that you can build the coverage you desire and the best part is that it also has sunscreen! Leaves my skin looking super smooth and not cakey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently discovered the best foundation I've ever used, and I can't recommend it enough! This foundation offers a perfect blend of coverage and natural finish, making my skin look flawless without feeling heavy. The formula is lightweight and blends seamlessly, giving me a fresh, radiant glow all day long.  If youu2019re looking for a reliable foundation that delivers on both quality and performance, this is the one to try!

reviews.review_title: Great full coverage, but a little drying
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review.   This is my first time trying Lancome Foundation, and overall, I'm impressed.  I prefer to use a blender to apply it. You need to use very little to achieve full coverage. Because of this, I need to start with a really small amount.   I ordered the 225N, which I felt was a little tiny bit too peachy for me, but it still blended in well.  When I looked at the range, I was pleasantly surprised to see such a wide range of shades and would recommend getting samples or going into the store to get a perfect match.   As a note, I do think it's a little drying, most likely due to the matte effect of it. This wasn't too important for me, but it might be something to consider if you have dry skin. For me, it works best if I'm using a hydrating moisturizer before make-up.   Overall, I like that itu2019s super lightweight, and when it dries it doesn't feel heavy on your skin. It lasted throughout the work day and caused me no issues or touch-ups.

reviews.review_title: Excellent light weight and non greasy foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really good foundation.   I used it 3 days this week and it feels light-weight, non greasy, and blendable. The coverage was fantastic and it just sort of melted into my skin. I did moisturize well before using this so that definitely helped. It has good lasting power, although I washed it off after 10 hours so I canu2019t attest to the 24 hour lasting period :-)   With most foundations, my pet peeve is that the foundation settled into and emphasizes fine lines and wrinkles. I did not notice this with Teint Idole, but I do moisturize really well before using a matte foundation.   I received this foundation as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
