Wear tested it for max of about 12 hours and it held up well. I have combination skin with my most oily area being my t zone and minimal touch ups were needed. Didnu2019t notice it caking or settling into lines. It applied well with a beauty blender and my other products applied well on top of foundation. Will definitely continue to use this product and recommend to others.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 105W - For fair skin with warm/yellow undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very good foundation. Lasting up to 6 hours on my face. Its medium cover with warm undertone which will be fit for almost Asian. Highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for an honest review.  I thought this foundation was very pretty and looked nice on. It definitely has staying power and I was able to get a whole day of wear out of it and it still looked nice at the end of the day. There was a little settling around my nose and my smile lines but that is normal for me. It is for sure a solid matte foundation with medium coverage that you can build up to full coverage if you want. For me, it was a little too dry looking in the current cool weather that weu2019re having but I think that this will definitely be a great foundation in the summer when itu2019s hot and humid!  But overall I really like the foundation and thought it looked really nice all day.  It will definitely be an addition into my foundation rotation.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 330N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product!  It takes a minute if youu2019re not use to a thinner consistency but itu2019s buildable coverage.  I was wearing Too faced Born this way Healthy glow but I love this much more!!  My skin looked really good w a healthy glow.  It says matte finish but I think it had a natural finish on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After receiving this foundation in the mail, Iu2019ve worn it every day for the past week and my skin look flawless. It is very easy to apply. I have applied it with a brush and a beauty blender. I believe I like the beauty blender better as it just settles into my skin nicely. They finish is matte/satin but not too drying. I wore this for 8-12 hours each day. I think I will reach for this foundation often.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancu00f4meu2019s Teint Idole Ultra 24H is a standout for long-lasting, full coverage with a lightweight feel. It offered a smooth, matte finish that controlled the oil pn my face and held up for hours without caking or settling into lines. The wide shade range caters to various skin tones, making it easy to find a perfect match. Ideal for oily or combination skin, it stayed put throughout the day, providing a natural yet flawless look! Perfect for those wanting long-lasting coverage with a comfortable, breathable formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The photos do not do enough justice. It made my skin look radiant. Skin felt smooth and breathable. This photo is on my skin without any primer or other makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this and tried a few different ways to make it work but it just isn't for me. I live in a dry environment and my skin can be a little on the dry side, but even with great moisturizers and moisturizing primer the foundation just made my skin look powdery. I am very fair skinned and have had this issue with other foundations, especially when there is a sunscreen in it. Lighter shades just always seem to be thicker or dryer or something. The color was spot on though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was thoroughly impressed with this foundation. Itu2019s lightweight and blends seamlessly into my skin, which I prefer. It also has SPF, which is a great bonus. The matte finish isnu2019t too harsh, so I donu2019t look like a corpse. Interestingly, Iu2019ve noticed that I donu2019t need to set it with powder at times. I highly recommend it and look forward to wearing it more often.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 345N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is not a bad foundation and lasted for the day. The shade was slightly light however itu2019ll be the perfect winter shade. It is a matte finish , so I would definitely recommend hydrating the skin beforehand . My preferred method of application was the beauty blender . I found that it looked less cakey that way compared to using a brush. If you want a foundation that has SPF & matte finish , you might like this one. For reference I use Mario shade 14O the Lacombe foundation is 345N

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 235N - For light to medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is great! I have oily skin and it made my skin look radiant. Itu2019s not too matte but also not luminous, it makes me skin look radiant and just right. The color match was also perfect! I got the shade 235N and itu2019s my perfect fall/winter color.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 130C - For fair to light skin with cool/pinky undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this product for a couple weeks now and am happy with the color matching my skin tone. I like the medium coverage it offers. The addition of sunscreen in the product is a bonus. It applies easily and does last all day. In comparison to my current favorite I like this as a good backup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation goes on so smoothly. It looks absolutely flawless! The color matches my skin tone perfectly. I will be switching permanently to this brand of makeup! I received this product as a free sample in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for a few day, I can confidently say this product will be in my rotation. The foundation sits wonderfully on my skin and I barely notice it throughout the day (sometimes a foundation will feel to heavy, not the case here). Works really well with other products too so highly recommend for those on the fence or feeling unsure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and I sweat a lot throughout the day so it's a challenge finding a foundation that stands up to the test. This did. I used 1 pump and it was the perfect amount for my face. It's creamy and the coverage is buildable. I work a 11hr day and this foundation looked just as good at the end of the day. Beautiful matte finish with plenty of coverage. Picture below is showing half of my face with and without the foundation.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 225N - For light skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation for free for my honest opinion. I'm 36, I have combination skin leaning towards oily, and have some fine lines. I tested the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation alongside my usual daytime skincare routine, which includes vitamin C, moisturizer, and sunscreenu2014because, realistically, thatu2019s what I apply daily before my makeup. The foundation claims to have a matte finish, but with my skincare underneath, the result was more of a natural, healthy finish, which I didnu2019t mind. Day 1: On the first day, I didnu2019t set the foundation with any powder. Initially, it looked flawless, and I was pleased to find the shade matched me perfectly. However, around the 6-hour mark, I started noticing it settling into my smile lines, with oil breaking throughu2014particularly in my T-zone. By the 8-hour check-in, my face had become very oily, and the foundation was starting to smudge and break down. Day 2: On the second day, I decided to set it with powder and finish with a setting spray. The makeup looked beautiful again at first, and I was optimistic. At the 8-hour mark, the foundation had settled into my smile lines but much less than on Day 1. There was also less breaking around my nose, though it still wasnu2019t perfect. Final Thoughts: Despite Lancu00f4meu2019s claim of a 24-hour wear, I found that it struggled to hold up throughout my typical workday (7 AM - 5 PM). By the end of the day, the oiliness was too much, and the foundation started to wear off, particularly around my T-zone. Honestly, the finish and wearability are comparable to a drugstore foundation that Iu2019ve been usingu2014and for the price, Iu2019d rather stick with the drugstore option. However, the right powder and setting spray will aid in the longevity if you still want to make this foundation work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am shocked how much I love this foundation. As someone who has very few brands that carry an exact match to her skin and someone who works in a salon with harsh lighting, I am super selective on my foundation products. This coverage is great, yet looks natural. Not too matte or dewy. Just a perfect in between. Iu2019m so happy to find my new foundation. I was using the Giorgio Armani luminous silk foundation and now will be a faithful user of this. Much better price point as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the foundation. It goes on smoothly and covers really well. It also lasts until I wash it off. I will definitely repurchase when I run out. Very minimal fragrance. It also looks very natural, almost like Iu2019m not even wearing makeup at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this is the first Lancome foundation I have tried and it did not disappoint! The coverage is buildable and covers redness without looking too heavy. I believe it could work well for any skin type, but since my skin is on the dry side, I do need to use a moisturizing primer or it doesn't blend as well. It has a nice natural matte finish, not too dry or powdery looking and doesn't emphasize dry areas. Overall, I really like this foundation and will continue using it when I wear a full make-up look. The only negative is the formula seems to be a little thicker and harder to spread than some other foundations I have tried, but that could be due to my dry skin or my application technique.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Where has this product been on my life? I have never used any Lancome products but I am a true fan now! Iu2019ve been using this for a little over a week & my skin Has never looked this amazing with makeup on it. I am 47 and it does not leave any creases around my eyes or my smile lines. It is light weight & looks flawless. Has a kind of a Matt finish and makes my skin look very healthy. I was not a fan of the u201cglowingu201d makeup, so Iu2019m glad I found a happy medium - one that just sits well on my face without a heavy makeup look. I tend to have sensitive skin and this does not make my skin itch or feel sticky, or heavy. It has survive hot Ga afternoon & did not melt! Washes off easy, has not broken my skin out at all! Iu2019ve uploaded a before and after photo.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 345N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula of this foundation is a beautiful thing. Application is smooth and the finish looks so natural. You wouldnu2019t be able to tell I have foundation on. It sits well on the skin too. In my pic, one side of my face has this product on.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 225N - For light skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't usually go for a full coverage matte foundation, but this one has changed my mind! It doesn't feel heavy at all on my skin and it gives a really beautiful natural look. Removed one star because I just wish Lancome was cruelty free. I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Lancome Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation for my honest review. This foundation is very lightweight and applies to the skin easily. A little goes a long way! Thanks to the easy to use pump applicator, you can control how much product you use. The matte formula has a very great coverage, is buildable, and easy to blend. That's is a great bonus with my oily and deep dark skin. Also, I didnt have a lot of oil to come through while wearing the foundation. It lasted throughout the day without any transfer, or it didn't cake. So, I will definitely be adding this foundation to my collection. I absolutely would say go buy it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has a really nice matte but light coverage! It didn't feel too greasy or heavy, and it gives a buildable coverage that lasts through the day. I also love that it has SPF in it.

reviews.review_title: Great Product, Just Slightly Off On Color
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Lancu00f4me graciously sent me the Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation in 235N for free so that I could test it out and review it. I have to say, I really like this product! The formula is lightweight yet seems to provides full coverage. It controlled shine without feeling heavy or cakey.  The only issue I had was with the shade u2013 it was a bit off for my skin tone (I would say the shade is more on the light side as opposed to medium. While the foundation itself is amazing, I recommend double-checking your shade before purchasing. That said, the finish and wear are incredible, and I'll definitely be repurchasing in the right color!

reviews.review_title: Will be using in my full coverage routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this foundation! It is very full coverage, while still being buildable. I would definitely add this to my normal foundation routine and recommend it to friends who are looking for a fuller, matte, but not drying formula. One of my cons would be, that I would recommend Lancu00f4me explore cleaner ingredients, which would increase their sales and open up their audience to a wider consumer audience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free in exchange for my honest review, The formula is amazing, It applies beautifull, my skin looks so good, nice smooth , I love the coverage of this foundation,  It do not  feels  heavy and do not look cakey. and smell good .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love love this foundation. I've tried so many brands and this one is my favorite of all. It feel lightweight but gives a great coverage. I definitely recommend this product to my family and friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the matt finish of this world loved lancome foundation. It adequately covered my dark spots with a light application. I'm so happy that it comes with added spf, that way I can skip sunscreen for evening events.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this make up for years.It goes on easily, looks very natural, and does not fade overtime. I use a beauty blender and it blends really well. It also feels and looks light even though itu2019s full coverage. It goes goes on without drying out your skin, settling into fine lines in your face, and it looks totally natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product to review. The packaging and bottle are beautiful . It is a pump applicator which I appreciate to make it easy to apply onto a brush. The top does unscrew so youu2019re able to get out every drop once the product gets down to low for the pump. I'm happy that this product includes spf 25 which takes out a step in my makeup routine. The smell is nice, very mild. I received the color 320c . I feel it is a little warmer than expected for cooler rosy skin tone. The coverage is full coverage, and states up to 24 hour wear. It is a little heavier than Iu2019m used to wearing. I use La roche-posay tinted mineral sunscreen and this is much more of a foundation than that. So if youu2019re looking for full coverage+sunscreen this would be a great option.  As I did the rest of my makeup it did seem to blend more into my skin better. I would approach with less is more and build if more is needed. Product states itu2019s also transfer resistant and Iu2019m seeing that to be true for the most part once it has dried it didnu2019t transfer.  Itu2019s a yes in my book.

reviews.review_title: Lightweight but can be dry out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It's very lightweight and easy to work on. Buildable with medium to high coverage. No smell. I have combination skin leaning more oily but I can see it can dry out if I don't moisturize well beforehand. It leaves a natural finish rather than matte if I don't use powder afterwards.

reviews.review_title: Flawless Finish That Lasts All Day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using the Teint Idole Ultra 24H Matte Foundation in shade 320C, and it has completely transformed my makeup routine. First off, the shade is perfect for my medium skin with cool undertonesu2014it blends seamlessly into my complexion without any weird ashy or orange tones.  The coverage is impressive. It's buildable from medium to full, covering blemishes and uneven spots without feeling heavy. Even better, it feels super lightweight on my skin, which is a rare combination for something this high coverage. The matte finish gives my face a beautiful, natural look that stays put for hoursu2014no need for touch-ups throughout the day!  Another huge plus is how long-lasting it is. Whether Iu2019m wearing it for a full workday or out for the evening, this foundation doesnu2019t budge. Even in humid weather, it holds up against sweat and oil without caking or separating. And the fact that itu2019s transfer-resistant means no more foundation marks on my clothes or phone!  On top of all that, it doesnu2019t dry out my skin like some matte foundations do. It strikes a perfect balanceu2014keeping oil in check without over-drying. I also love the added SPF protection, so I feel like Iu2019m taking care of my skin even when Iu2019m wearing makeup.  If youu2019re looking for a long-lasting, high-performing foundation that gives you a flawless, matte finish without weighing you down, Teint Idole Ultra 24H is the way to go. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! I wore it just alone and it was the perfect shade for my skin and had SPF in it! It did not feel cakey and so light weight. I received this as a complimentary product!

reviews.review_title: Finally, a foundation that handles Texas heat!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this foundation in 250W, and I have one word to sum up my thoughts: impressed. I'll be the first to admit I have really oily skin that doesnu2019t fare well in Texas heat. My skin is prone to breakouts, with some acne spots, and can be picky with new products. So, when I got the chance to review this foundation, I was worried my skin would break out. However, Iu2019m happy to report that wasnu2019t the case!  It had been a few months since I used liquid foundation because of the heat, but I decided to apply it before a late-night concert. Using a sponge, I noticed it took a couple of layers to cover my acne spots, but the foundation was buildable. While the first layer was a bit light, smoothing it out gave me the coverage I needed.  Now, remember how I mentioned I live in Texas? This foundation seemed to take that as a challenge! The foundation stayed in place after a concert, drinks, and walking in downtown humidity. I did sweat, but that didnu2019t affect its appearance. I didnu2019t need to reapply or add powder, and it didnu2019t look oily afterward. Shocked is an understatement.  Another big plus? My skin didnu2019t feel suffocated or dry. After about 30 minutes, it felt like I wasnu2019t wearing any makeup at all. Iu2019ve worn it a few more times, and my verdict remains the same: I may have finally found a foundation that works in this heat!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for a week and it is amazing! It lasts for a long time, stays on when you rub your face (like blowing my nose) it does not come off on the tissue. It feels light on my skin as a lot of foundation feels very heavy like its clogging my pores. It also has a very good smell. Some foundation has like a chemically smell  that makes me kind of cringe, but this has a good smell  that doesn't make me not want to use it. This will be my new daily foundation! I have oily skin and it does seem to keep matte also so I don't have to get the oil off of my face with oil blotters.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am really enjoying this foundation.  I received a sample in exchange for an honest review.  The formula is very thin and watery, but goes on very smooth with a brush.  It does dry down extremely fast so you have to work quickly.  Once on, it has a beautiful satin matte finish and minimizes skin texture quite well for being so thin.  I do find it highlights any dry areas and makes fine lines look worse so you must moisturize before applying.  It has really good longevity, lasts all day and doesnu2019t melt off easily even in my oily t-zone areas.  It has mild oil controlling properties in my oily areas.  I have combination skin and as long as I am moisturizer and use a setting powder in my oily prone areas this foundation looks quite good throughout the day. I love the range of colors, I have pale olive skin and 105W matches well without too much oxidation throughout the day.  I will repeat purchase this item and it is my new go to foundation for u201cdressier make upu201d looks as I just use tinted BB cream most days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing foundation, so lightweight and smooth. I love that it has SPF, and the matte finish isnu2019t drying at all. This will become one of my foundation staples for sure

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 345N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear foundation, and overall, there are a few things I really liked about it. The formula is super liquid, which makes it easy to work with. I tested it on different parts of my face using both a sponge and a brush, and I definitely preferred the finish with the sponge, it looked way more natural and even.  One downside is that the shade (345N) is about two shades lighter than my usual foundation, which is House Labs in shade 300, and that one matches my skin tone perfectly. Despite that, I wore the Lancu00f4me foundation all day and used it as more of an undertone, and it held up pretty well.  I do wish the color had been a better match for my skin tone, but I really liked how lightweight it felt. It didnu2019t feel heavy or cakey at all. Overall, itu2019s a solid option if youu2019re looking for a breathable, long-lasting foundation, just make sure you get the right

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: **I RECEIVED THIS PRODUCT FOR FREE IN EXCHANGE FOR MY HONEST REVIEW**  PACKAGING: the packaging is sleek and luxurious. The pump works well. No issues with packaging.  PRODUCT: the product is lightweight and breathable. It is full coverage without being cakey. I wore it for about 10 hours and did not have to touch up any. I tend to have combination skin with some dry patches. I didnu2019t notice it sticking to any of my dry patches.   CON: the only issue I have with this product is the SPF. Putting SPF in cosmetics is pointless because you do not apply enough to make a different. Because some people can not use chemical sunscreens (pregnant or nursing women specifically), I wish it would not be added to cosmetics.

reviews.review_title: Nostalgic but maybe best left in the past?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, Lancu00f4me is one of those classic brandsu2014like Estee Lauder, Elizabeth Arden, and Cliniqueu2014that takes me back 20 years, reminding me of my great aunts who adored makeup. Despite that nostalgic connection, itu2019s definitely NOT one of my go-to brands nowadays. I received this product in exchange for my honest review, so hereu2019s my experience:     u2022   The consistency is impressively light! I was pleasantly surprised. Itu2019s easy to build for more coverage or use sparingly for a subtle, smoothing effect.    u2022   As I remembered, it has a strong u201cperfume-likeu201d scent, which doesnu2019t feel particularly clean or natural.    u2022   It worked very well with my oily skin, keeping a natural matte finish even after all-day wear in the Miami heat.    u2022   I didnu2019t need to use any setting powder, which was a plus!    u2022   However, it didnu2019t play nicely with my cream blush when applied over it. The best method was applying the cream blush first, then lightly tapping the foundation on top. Powder blush worked much better.    u2022   While the finish looked great throughout the day, my skin felt drier than usual. I needed a finishing spray to add moisture and had to reapply it multiple times.  Overall, this foundation is definitely an improvement from the Lancu00f4me formulas Iu2019ve used in the pastu2014lighter and fresher. However, it didnu2019t feel as hydrating or natural as Iu2019m used to now. Itu2019s a solid choice for oily skin, but maybe a bit too effective in keeping the shine away!

reviews.review_title: Would get a again in different shade
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The foundation is nice with a medium to full coverage option. It has a matte finish to help control oily skin. Looks like It is easy to blend. I just wish I got a different shade

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you Lancu00f4me for letting me try this foundation as part of the BzzAgent program! I absolutely love it! Itu2019s very light but has decent coverage. Reminds me of a lighter glossier foundation. It does make my skin feel softer and looks more natural than other foundations Iu2019ve tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is very beautiful. It blends very well and provides a nice medium to full coverage. It didnu2019t oxidize and wore very well. The only con I could find is that it had more of a waxy feel and finish on the skin than what Iu2019m used to. Normally I wear either Dior Forever or Sweed Beauty. The Lancu00f4me foundation had many shades and while it looked good overall when I applied powder over parts it seemed like it didnu2019t dry down a lot and the powder kind of stuck to it. I found that less is more with powder over this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. I have it in the shade 320C, the old formulation would be 310C. This foundation is the most perfect shade for my olive skin undertone. If you have an olive undertone then I would highly suggest finding your shade with the C at the end for cool. I have never found such a spot on shade for my skin tone. Even though it says cool, there are hints yellow and not at all like the cool/rosy description listed for this shade. I have normal/dry skin, normally matte foundations do not work for me but this one is not drying at all and very comfortable to wear, because this is a natural matte with Hyaluronic Acid it looks so smooth on the skin and I feel like Iu2019m wearing something thatu2019s actually good for my skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 090N - for fair skin with neutral/pinky undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: prefer light to medium coverage. While this isn't light, it is buildable so it really works for me. I used Dior Star for years. I've spent the last year looking for a suitable replacement and I'm happy to sat this is it. Plus, I do not use much at once, so this bottle will last me nearly a year even with frequent wear. The color I chose is also a perfect match which is not easy to find when you are neutral and really pale

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a gorgeous foundation. It reminds me of a thinner Este Lauder Double Wear. The color I got is slightly too dark, but if I apply it to my neck it looks good. My mom loves it too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I already adore this brand, but this foundation has seriously taken the cake!! (Without the cakeyness.) The finish is so beautiful - it literally looks airbrushed. No matter what foundation I use, especially one with SPF, my skin is oily at the end of the day. Itu2019s just a given. NOT THIS ONE!! At the end of the day, I still had a natural finish! One of my favorite things about this product though is that it has SPF without the burn!! Every product Iu2019ve used with SPF burns my eyes or I swear I can taste it, I have never had the slightest issue with this stuff. Itu2019s buildable, blends like butter, couldnu2019t ask for better. I feel confident in my clean beauty era with this stuff!! (Photo to show consistency: not thick, not too runny either. Melts on the skin)

reviews.review_title: This foundation is a must have
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product my face looks flawless, and it lasted all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 1st time trying this brand foundation and i love it! 345N was a bit light for my skin tone (I'm between a med/tan) but nothing bronzer couldn't fix :)  Stays put from 7am to 7pm. Love that its matte and not drying on my skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 305N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product.  Looks so natural and is long lasting.  It is long lasting and Stuu2019s in all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I think this foundation is so amazing and covers up all of my blemishes seamlessly. The color is easy to build on without looking cakey and it blends in so easily. It stays on very well throughout the day and does not wear off.

reviews.review_title: Oily Combo Acne Prone Skin Approved!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This actually surprised me when I tried this and let me tell you I have oily combo skin. I had a full day of shooting and by the end of the day I was so shook that my skin was still looking so good. I only powdered my t-zone once and I was sweating cause of this heat wave, so impressed. I mean sunscreen is always a plus these days as well! It looks skin-like when you apply it with your fingers but if you want more coverage use a brush. The coverage is definitely buildable and has a gorgeous natural matte finish. Also, my bestie complimented me on how good my skin looked with this foundation on!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the product! Great smooth texture, amazing coverage using only a small amount. I had been searching for a product that would cover marks with natural feel, without looking dense. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 310N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super full coverage and makes my skin look flawless. Also is really durable and long lasting. Iu2019m a hairstylist and usually look like a drowned rat by the end of the day, but not with this!

reviews.review_title: A new addition to my makeup routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product, I have loved the instant matte look. I love that this foundation is non-cakey and also buildable. I have been searching for a nice foundation and Iu2019m glad I found this one by Lancu00f4me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product to try in exchange for my honest review. This was my first time trying Lancu00f4me foundation. This product did to disappoint. I love how this foundation was an exact match! I applied this foundation in the morning, and I was able to wear it all day with out any touch ups. This is a definite add to my makeup collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love how my skin looked after applying this!! Itu2019s not full coverage but itu2019s so perfect. Feels lightweight as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Started wearing this and my 90 year old Grandma said I looked gorgeous, more impressive, my slightly moody daughter also complimented me! Haha, jokes aside I am in love, goes on so easily, 25 SPF, perfect coverageu2014buildable if needed, lasts through sweating, running around in heels and a dress for 8 hours, and crying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been wearing this foundation for the past week & I am loving it. The smooth and light feel to this foundation made my skin look great for hours, even in the Florida heat! I work in dermatology and even my coworkers noticed a difference! I tried with 1 layer on day one and then slowly increased, seeing how well this foundation builds on itself. It truly still feels light and Iu2019m not feeling too bogged down! Packaging is beautiful and luxe. I absolutely love this foundation and will be purchasing in the future!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful coverage!!! I have super dry skin, so I tend to lean towards foundation that is luminous. I was nervous to try this, but with good skin prep it is beautiful! I used Charlotte Tilbury Magic Cream as my moisturizer and primer and the foundation was beautiful with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great shade match and I appreciate they have extended the selection for very fair options, however there seems to be a formula change from the last time I tried this foundation. I had trouble blending it and it although my skin is not dry, it left my feeling very dehydrated. I tried using extra skincare to help hydrate and I still was left struggling. My other issue is that this didnu2019t provide a lot of coverage and even when I tried building it, there were spots that never really felt as covered as others and it looked uneven. When I used this foundation a few years ago I was very happy with it so I am kind of shocked at how bad this was, and usually Lancome is relatively reliable but the quality in this is very questionable. Iu2019m hesitant to try other foundations from them because of this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this foundation is PERFECT! Itu2019s so lightweight but still packs a punch with the coverage. Itu2019s so nice to have your spf and your foundation in 1! Feels like iu2019m wearing nothing and still looking flawless!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After trying this product for a week, I got to say I loved it! I have rosacea and combination skin (greasy on T zone). This product does not leave my nose cakey not it crack throughout the day. I has SPF and does not feel greasy.  This product feels lightweight, smooth texture, buildable, covers my redness. I used to use 3N1 double wear and switched to 345n Lancome. Overall it makes me feel flawless!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Build able, smooth coverage that feels light on and lasted all day. The foundation was thinner in consistency than i expected, but otherwise went on easily, was a good color match, and evened out my skin tone without creating an artificial, heavy look. I'd recommend over drugstore and higher-end brands! (I recieved the product from BzzAgent in exchange for my honest review.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually tend to wear more inexpensive foundation.  I really enjoy this product! The texture is thinner than some foundations I have used, the coverage is fantastic and the finish is natural. The coverage lasted all day but I did notice some oiliness in my tzone by the end of the day. I found the color I chose to be accurate as described and an easy match to my skintone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this foundation. It feels light on my skin and provides a medium but buildable to full coverage. Color matches well and lasts all day. Definitely a matte finish, but isn't cakey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product for free to test it out, Iu2019m so happy I did! This foundation is great! Dont have a scent, easy to blend and build the coverage. Last all day long! If you need a new foundation you gotta check this one out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There is a reason this product is priced in the higher range. It is worth every penny. (but maybe you can get it on sale). It is velvety soft, sits on the skin well, blends well and last very long. Does not sweat off. I am thoroughly impressed!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 560 - For deep skin with cool/rich red undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product, I found that it works much better than the other matte foundations I have used before! Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m absolutely in love with the Teint Idole foundation by Lancu00f4me. I got an amazing full coverage using a blender sponge lightly damp. It goes on flawless and covers my pores and blemishes. The 250W tone was perfect for my light olive complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fundation provide long-lasting coverage, a smooth finish, and often include skincare benefits, making them ideal for achieving a flawless complexion. The textures are blendable and comfortable, leaving the skin looking natural and radiant without feeling heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Loveee the feel of this foundation!! I normally use BB creams, as foundations are usually too heavy and cakey, but not this foundation. This feels so lightweight and breathable. I was genuinely surprised on how silky smooth it laid on. It was computable to the feel of a BB cream BUT it has wayyyy more coverage and it doesnu2019t make the appearance of blemishes or texture pop. I like that itu2019s buildable and even though it has spf, it still went on great over my mineral spf. Would definitely recommend. Looks natural!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! The coverage is great and looks flawless. I love the fact that itu2019s matte for a non greasy look. It lasts the whole day for me which is great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an excellent buildable full coverage foundation. I applied using a damp beauty blender. It was not too drying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok I love this product! It goes on very easily and a little goes a long way. Itu2019s so easy to blend and looks very natural. I also really love the matte finish. Sometimes some look very cakey but this looks great!

reviews.review_title: Great Foundation, but not for me!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This color was a good match for my skin, and if I were in my 20's and 30's I would have LOVED this foundation. It does has great coverage, and really good variety of shades. It just feels a little to matte for me. I'm in my 40's and I have been leaning more into lighter coverage, and also moisturizing or dewy foundations.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 090N - for fair skin with neutral/pinky undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is my new favorite.  It goes on incredibly evenly and blends seamlessly.  The coverage is amazing for how light it feels on your skin. Stayed on all day even when I was outside in the heat and humidity.  Does not crease or fade.  Leaves a beautiful matte finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great buildable coverage. Would be great for oily skin and lasts all day long. I used with moisturizer with it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 097N - for fair skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is pretty nice for a matte foundation. The color match was practically perfect. It blends pretty easily and is buildable, Iu2019d say itu2019s light coverage. It does stick to dry patches just a tiny bit. I would definitely recommend it. My photo is the product on where you can see slight clinging to my drier patches. I did apply a hyaluronic acid moisturizing cream prior to the foundation.

reviews.review_title: Awesome foundation, looks flawless & lasts all day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried so many foundations but had a hard time finding one that would last all day and not look cakey on my face. When applied it goes on smooth. Blends beautifully and it is not oily. This foundation seriously lasts me ALL day! I usually have long days and don't have time to touch up but with this brand, I don't need to. The shade matches perfectly with my skin tone and looks very natural! Will definitely recommend this to any skin type (for reference, I have dry skin and this foundation works perfectly).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would give this a 3.5/5 on my own face. I was excited to try this product through Bzzagent, as I have never worn matte foundation before. Iu2019m in my late 30s with some stubborn fine lines and mild hyperpigmentation, and my skin skews normal to dry depending on the season.   This foundation comes in a beautiful bottle, is silky smooth, and has great coverage with staying power. However, I donu2019t wear primer except for formal occasions (I use a hydrating moisturizer before my natural or radiant finish foundations), so I donu2019t think this would be a good day-to-day option for me. But I would absolutely use this for a photographed event. So glad I tried it, as Iu2019ve heard rave reviews.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the consistency and the way it dries down. It covers my imperfections nicely and for having combination skin it did not make me greasier in my t zone area. I will say though I did not get the right color, but aside from the color not exactly matching I do really like the formula.

reviews.review_title: Nice coverage for dry, tretinoin-treated skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Overall I enjoy this foundation but not sure if I will make it my go-to moving forward. I use tretinoin and have skin that leans towards the drier side and requires thick barrier creams.  Pros:  - this foundation settles nicely into my skin and does not leave obvious cracks. I was impressed that this is the case since this is marketed to be towards the matte side. - I really enjoy the consistency of this foundation. It has great coverage but is not extremely thick. It spreads easily and does not leave my face feeling like Iu2019m wearing tons of makeup.  Cons: - I do believe that this foundation oxidized on me a little bit. While it was minimal compared to other foundations Iu2019ve tried, itu2019s worth mentioning. I do not like to wear setting powders, so you may be able to prevent that by setting the foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lately I have just been using tinted moisturizers or glow drops for light coverage. Caked foundation isnu2019t what I want to have. This foundation though is AMAZING! So lightweight and buildable. Amazing coverage and a little goes a long way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is absolutely beautiful! I have dry skin and it doesnu2019t look cakey or have dry patches. It has a slight glow and it doesnu2019t feel like anything on my skin. Did an all day wear test and it did not budge!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is perfect for a long lasting day. Itu2019s applies so smoothly and covers everything on the face . When I sweat it doesnu2019t smudge others do and itu2019s matte . The quality is amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a gift for an honest review.  I like this foundation itu2019s not bad but the only thing I donu2019t like is I have noticed with Lancome at least in my case their foundations run a little yellow. It has a long wear time but on my oily tea zone it does not stay matte Even with a matte primer. I think maybe if I found my perfect tone I might like this a little bit more but itu2019s always hard to pick up foundations online. All in all itu2019s a good foundation with good time youu2019ll just need to do some touchups.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this foundation/skin tint for the last week and itu2019s a great swap out for a daily foundation! Easy to blend and didnu2019t break up on my skin hours later. I have combination skin! The color match was also insane :-)

reviews.review_title: Already know Iu2019ll be repurchasing this!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Looks like my skin, but better. I think I may have gotten the wrong shade, but I can make it work!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Color match is shocking amazing. The product didnu2019t separate and worked well in the humidity of Florida. I would definitely purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this as a sample from BzzAgent to do an honest review. I wanted to start by saying that I am not a matte finish girly at all and tend to go for glowy finishes, but this foundation is not truly matte. It just looks like skin, it has a completely natural smooth finish. It liquid but not runny. The shade sent to me is a neutral golden finish, if that makes any sense. It's a golden tone but not yellow. I think this will be my new daily foundation. I wore it to work and it wore nicely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product blends in very well and it buildable.The thing I love most is that this is the first foundation that lasted all day on my face.

reviews.review_text: Absolutely loving this product. My skin has some heavy pink/red undertones and this covers it without being cakey. I love that it acts as SPF and is light to wear but offers a fair amount of coverage. Buildable too!

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved a must have I recommend 100 I recived as a gift

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 310N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. Not too dry and feels light weight. Last all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for writing a review. This summer, I got a lot more color than usual, and all of my other foundations were way too pale, so I was excited to try something darker. The shade is perfect for my skin tone. It blends in beautifully and looks completely natural.   The coverage is buildable, and a little goes a long way so definitely start out with less and add more if you need it. The first time I applied it, I used way too much. It has a matte finish, but I have been obsessed with cream products lately and my cream blush, bronzer, and highlighter applied over it like a dream. I only used setting powder on my t-zone where I am oily.   This truly lasts all day. I was so impressed that my skin still looked flawless at the end of the day. When working from home, I prefer a lighter, more dewy CC Cream, but I needed a great going out foundation, and this is definitely it.   I have attached a before and after photo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best foundation out there it's very light feel on your skin breathable feel longlasting the coverage is medium best for daily wear but it's a build able formula good shade range and doesn't cake gives smooth feel and look on skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for about a week and I believe I have found my new favorite foundation.  I am just amazed at how long this last and feels so good on my skin. Color matching was so simple and the color was perfect. When they said long lasting, they were not kidding!! I left it on overnight to see how long it would last and even after sleep and out all day and night, I still had full coverage. If you are looking for a silky smooth feel and full, long lasting coverage this is the product for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is SO full coverage but so lightweight on the skin! I love how one coat of this covers most if not all blemishes or discoloration, but you can build the foundation by adding more where you need it. 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like that this foundation is long lasting. It has very good coverage. I also like that it has SPF so I donu2019t need to worry about putting on sunscreen.

reviews.review_title: Honest Review in Exchange for Full Size Product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest feedback. Coming from someone who has used bare minerals for YEARS and does the bare minimum for my makeup routine, as Iu2019ve gotten older, I tend to only really like products that donu2019t look or feel heavy and cakey. I also always lean towards products that have light or buildable coverage. I have used IT Cosmetics Your Skin but Better foundation, also sent to me for review, and, comparing the two, Lancu00f4me is officially #1 on my list. This literally felt like my real skin. It lasted for hours and it didnu2019t once feel like cake or like I needed to wash my face immediately once I got home at the end of the night. Itu2019s THAT light and skin like! I highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this foundation but unfortunately I got the wrong shade, I tried it on my hand and it is well pigmented. I love that it has sunscreen included.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Lancu00f4me Paris Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation is a standout product in the high-end foundation category, offering a blend of luxury and long-lasting performance.   The foundation provides medium to full coverage, which is buildable without feeling cakey. It has a velvety matte finish, making it ideal for those with combination to oily skin. Despite the matte formula, it doesnu2019t look flat or dry, and it imparts a subtle radiance that makes the skin appear flawless and even-toned.  True to its u201cUltra Wearu201d claim, it delivers impressive staying poweru2014lasting up to 24 hours without needing touch-ups. Even in humid conditions, it holds up remarkably well, resisting smudging and fading.  While many long-wear foundations can feel heavy, Teint Idole is surprisingly lightweight. It sits comfortably on the skin throughout the day without causing dryness or irritation. It also includes SPF 15 for light sun protection, which is a nice bonus.  Shade Range: Lancu00f4me offers an extensive range of shades, catering to various skin tones and undertones. This inclusivity ensures that most people can find a close match, which can sometimes be challenging with other high-end foundations.  The foundation applies smoothly, blending seamlessly with a brush, sponge, or fingertips. It doesnu2019t settle into fine lines or emphasize texture, which is a major plus for those with mature or textured skin.  Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear is an excellent choice for those seeking a long-lasting, flawless finish foundation with a luxurious feel. Its comfortable wear, wide shade range, and impressive staying power make it a worthwhile investment for anyone looking for reliable performance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation in shade 320C, and itu2019s a game changer! The coverage is full but lightweight, leaving my skin looking flawless all day long. No oxidation, no fading, and it holds up beautifully even in humid weather. Plus, the color match is spot-on. A must-have for anyone who wants a smooth, natural finish!

reviews.review_title: Love this for my daily routine!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product for everyday wear. It gives the matte look without the heavy makeup feeling on your skin. I worked a 12 hour shift outside in fl at a tiki bar and it stayed on my whole shift. I really love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation a little goes a long way I love the matte leaves it looking natural which I like I donu2019t like the foundations that leave you looking dewy this one is a 10/10

It also worked well with my other products on my skin. This is definitely going to become a fall/winter staple for me.

reviews.review_text: This matched spot on with my skin tone .!!! I adore this so much , a little goes a long way & itu2019s very pigmented . No harsh chemicals

I just use the tiniest bit and dab with a makeup brush decent coverage but need to use it more to give a better review

reviews.review_text: This foundation was really good and really moisturizing the sunscreen was a very smart thing to add and took an extra step out of my makeup routine. It went on easy and had a very light feeling though the coverage wasn't as great it still evened out the skin tone. This lasted 12 hours with setting powder and spray and probably could have lasted longer. Also the bottle is absolutely gorgeous and the top is stunning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Seemless blende on first look. Moisturizer feel. Feels a little brighter than my tone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a must have! Absolutely love how many shades there are so you can find your perfect match. I can use a little for a 'no make up, make up' look or I can do a full glam look because of how buildable it is.  This is so silky smooth, I love how it feels. It doesn't cake up or make my skin feel dry, very hydrating and added bonus as it's spf 25. Last thing I love about Lancome is the packaging, it's gorgeous ud83dude0d .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how lightweight and breathable this foundation is! After wearing foundation (multiple brands) for a few minutes, my skin usually starts getting irritated. With this foundation, I found that my skin didn't get irritated and lasts all day! You do need to prep your skin properly before using the foundation because it will show dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love how light weight this foundation is. I just wish I had gotten a slightly darker shade. Next time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was selected to receive a free sample of this foundation from BzzAgent and I was super excited to try it! I definitely enjoyed the wear of this foundation. It lasted longer than other 24H foundations and it blended really nicely. I was definitely a matte finish, which I appreciated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. I have been trying it out for the last few weeks and put it to the test. I have The foundation is high medium coverage (with a sponge but probably high coverage with a brush) but feels lightweight and like a second skin. Itu2019s self-setting and doesnu2019t transfer a ton and works well with other products. It is matte so I was nervous because I have combo/dry skin and but it looked skin-like and not flat matte and did not emphasize any of my dryness. Shade match was spot on for my fair warmer/olive skin. It wears great throughout the day and I received a ton of compliments on my skin whenever I wore it. Highly recommend this foundation!

reviews.review_title: 225N Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation - IN LOVE
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this foundation for the last week, I can say I am very pleased with it overall. The foundation provides a beautiful full coverage, matte finish without the heaviness and u201ccakeynessu201d of others I have tried. Even though I knew I was wearing foundation, my skin didnu2019t u201clooku201d like I was wearing foundation. And, a little bit definitely goes a LONG way. After 15+ hours of wear, in the Texas heat, the foundation held up incredibly well. Sweat proof for sure. I also appreciate the fact this foundation is mineral oil-free, infused with hyaluronic acid (in my mid 40u2019s and need this), morninga seed extracts, vitamin E, AND prebiotics.   My skin feels more u201cnourishedu201d in a sense when wearing this foundation, and looks incredible with or without setting powder. I love the more u201cnaturalu201d look, and this foundation did not disappoint. Highly recommend, especially for women with aging skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried 215C Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation.  The coverage was nice and the formula didn't feel heavy on my skin.  The shade was close to perfect, just ever so slightly too yellow for a cool undertone, but that didn't make it unusable.  I would consider purchasing this product if the brand discontinues testing on animals.  Until then, I cannot recommend the product.  But I feel it's important to give the product just praise so that Lacome realizes they would have another customer if they improve their animal cruelty policy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage that lasted all day and didnu2019t leave skin feeling heavy. This product exceeded my expectations

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin

It has a breathable coverage and wonu2019t look cakey. Totally recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great foundation that blends well and has a light texture that doesn't feel heavy on my skin. It is buildable or performs well on its own, and comes in many shades for any skin tone! Very smooth and does not feel grainy.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 230W - for light to medium olive skin with warm/peachy undertones
reviews.review_text: This is great, long lasting and it goes on flawlessly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, I loveee the packaging. The way the shade matched my skin tone is unbelievable! I love everything about this product. It is long lasting and makes my skin look flawless. I would definitely recommend this to others. I would also purchase this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the feel but i felt like this oxidized on my skin a bit more than I would prefer.

reviews.review_title: Premium quality, long lasting, matches my skin ton
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin that varies depending on the time of year. Sometimes it's normal to oily (in the summer time) and sometimes it is normal to dry (colder, winter months). Finding the right makeup can be tricky at times.  Lancu00f4me is a brand that is worth paying more for and this foundation is no exception. In my opinion, it is leaps and bounds better than any of the drugstore brands that I have tried.  The 215C (fair with cool pink undertones) was a perfect match for my somewhat pale skin tone. It blended easily and seamlessly. You couldn't tell the difference between the areas where makeup was applied and where it wasn't. Definitely impressed!  I always apply a good quality primer before applying my foundation. It went on smoothly and didn't settle into any fine lines or pores. I didn't have to use a ton of the foundation to achieve my desired look. I do NOT like the overdone, caked on makeup look. I prefer something more natural so it's important that I don't end up looking clown like or like I'm applying face paint. I think this has a true medium coverage. I was very pleased with the somewhat glowy finish and end results.  It held up VERY well throughout the day. I have worn the makeup even when I was working outside and sweating a lot! I didn't notice any fading or changes from when I first applied my foundation in the morning from when I removed it in the evening. It does rub off on my sunglasses when I wear them so I normally have to fix my makeup after removing them!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was asked to review this product.  I love the concept of foundation and spf in 1 product.   If you like a full coverage foundation that has spf in it you will love this product.   It covers well and leaves a beautiful finish!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is light weight and provides great buildable coverage. It does dry down very quickly which for my dry skin wasnu2019t ideal, but with skin prep it is fine. The wear stayed relatively well on my normal to dry skin. I think it would work better with oily skin. Great shade range!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very bendable and i liked the coverages. The only thing I would say is itu2019s a little patchy but aside from that I liked it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used a lotion primer prior to applying this and it went on very smooth and blended out great. I like the pump and sleek design of the bottle. It had good coverage, I would say full, but build able to full. I have rosey cheeks and they were still showing through the first layer of this makeup. I was glad that it did, because I don't use blush. It did show more attention to one of my older blemishes that looked dry, but it went over fresher acne marks and I didn't have the same issue. It lasted the day and didn't feel heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this foundation as a promotional item to review. It is was much lighter coverage than I expected. It is a great foundation if need lighter coverage. It does well at lasting but I feel I need a lot of layers if I water heavier coverage. A good light and smooth matte coverage if thatu2019s what you are looking for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Please never stop making this product!!! I have tried so many foundations and never truly loved any of them before this one. It is the perfect amount of FULL coverage while being so lightweight that I don't even remember I am wearing it. It stays on extremely well (I wore this to a college football game in the rain) and my face makeup still looked flawless when I got home. It's not too matte or too dewy just the right amount of natural looking coverage to enhance your skin. Trust me just buy this stuff!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 205C - For light skin with cool/pinky undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the coverage this provided and the durability. It did dry down really quick so I had to work in sections for smooth application.

reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion.  I have been using this foundation for a few days now and have to say I'm not very impressed. I love Lancome makeup but this foundation felt heavy, made my skin look dry and would settle in the creases/wrinkles around my eyes. I tried different applications (using my fingers, beauty blender, brush) and same results every time. However, the shade (097N) was a great match for my skin and I liked that it went on smooth and blended well. I also liked that it contains an SPF which is something I look for in a foundation. Overall this product did not work for me and would not recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation offers full, buildable coverage and has a good color range. I like how smooth it looked on my skin. Other products, such as my cream blush, applied well on top of the foundation. Minus one star for the high price tag.

reviews.review_title: Great for a full finished look

reviews.review_text: This foundation was great quality. It went on like satin/creme and blended to the skin flawlessly. It was a perfect match for pinky undertones for fair skin. Itu2019s lasted all day without creasing or smudging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra 24H Matte Foundation offers flawless, long-lasting coverage with a natural matte finish. It feels lightweight, controls shine, and stays perfect all day. A must-have!

reviews.review_title: This was my favorite foundation ever.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am really in love with this foundation, the way that cover and fit so good with my skin is amazing. I can not  stop to analyze the huge difference from the others foundation that I have tried before. The results are very satisfying my needs and now is my choise always.

reviews.review_title: Good product if you use a primer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a long lasting, buildable formula that offers good coverage, but it definitely requires a good primer if you have mature (i.e. post-30) skin. The color matched my skin tone perfectly and it felt good on my skin. It is a very loose liquid foundation though so it sinks into every fine line and pore. A primer is definitely necessary. I like that it has an SPF in it and still looks good after a full day of work. Overall itu2019s a good product if you use a primer.

reviews.review_title: Great coverage and dries down nicely
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has great coverage and dries down to a nice satin finish, I found it to be comfortable on face for the whole day. The coverage is buildable and doesnu2019t cake. While the normal areas of my face saw really great all-day wear, the more oily areas began to wear off toward the middle of the day. All-in-all, I felt it was a better than average foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried this SPF product and found it to be decent overall. It provides solid sun protection and has a lightweight texture that feels comfortable on the skin. I appreciate that it contains SPF, as protecting my skin from UV rays is a top priority for me.  However, there are a few issues worth mentioning. The tint is a bit off for my skin tone; while it claims to be universal, it didnu2019t blend as seamlessly as I hoped. I found that it left a slight cast, which is not ideal for daily wear. Additionally, the finish tends to be a bit greasy, which doesnu2019t mesh well with my usual makeup routine. I prefer a matte finish, so I ended up having to apply a powder on top to reduce shine.  Overall, while this SPF does provide effective sun protection, the color match and finish could use improvement. I might continue using it on days when Iu2019m not wearing makeup, but Iu2019m still on the lookout for a better option that meets all my needs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. It looks great and goes on smooth. I will definitely try it again. Blends seem less with my skin tone

reviews.review_title: Buildable, full coverage foundation- my new fave!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this foundation. Itu2019s super lightweight and feels like my skin while on. Itu2019s not heavy at all and I havenu2019t noticed any significant oxidation. I also like that itu2019s buildable. 2-3 layers does well to cover my imperfections and even out my redness. It has a watery texture coming out of the bottle (see picture) but I donu2019t mind that. reviews.review_title: Great for oily skin, not for dry
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Decent foundation. I had used it when I was younger on my incredibly oily skin. Now that I'm older and my skin is turning more combo leaning dry, it's too drying for me. I was able to really prep my skin and make it work. It looks nice and smooth on the skin and lasts a long time. I can also mix it with a more luminous foundation and it's perfect. That being said, if you have dry skin and want something to put on and walk out the door, this isn't it. If you have oily skin and need something that won't slide of your skin, this is a great foundation. I will keep using it on days when I need my makeup to last longer. The colors also seem to run a bit lighter, I think because of the SPF, but I love that it has SPF.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 305N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Lancu00f4me 305N Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation is a standout product.  This foundation offers a flawless finish that lasts all day, making it an excellent choice for those with busy lifestyles or special occasions.  One of the most impressive features of this foundation is its buildable coverage. It effortlessly glides on the skin, allowing you to customize the level of coverage you desire, from a light, natural look to a more full-coverage finish. The formula is lightweight and breathable, which means it doesnu2019t feel heavy or cakey, even after hours of wear.  The shade 305N is particularly noteworthy for its neutral undertone, making it versatile for a variety of skin tones. It blends seamlessly, providing a beautiful, even complexion that looks radiant without the appearance of makeup. The foundation also has a matte finish, which helps control shine throughout the day, perfect for those with oily skin types.  Additionally, the longevity of the Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation is impressive. It boasts a 24-hour wear time, ensuring that your makeup stays put from morning to night without the need for touch-ups. The formula is also resistant to sweat and humidity, which is a bonus for those in warmer climates or during the summer months.  Overall, Lancu00f4me 305N Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation is a fantastic investment for anyone looking for a reliable, high-performance foundation. Its blendability, coverage, and long-lasting wear make it a must-have in any makeup routine.

reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this product as the color 225N is a perfect match for my skin color. I would say that the product is a medium coverage, but does still show some skin through which I personally really like. It goes on matte, But after a few hours my skin does get a bit shiny. I would continue to use this for casual daywear or when Iu2019m looking for something with a good sunscreen in it because it does have SPF. My skin did not get irritated or break out, but I did have to pat down some of the oiliness midday. Overall good product with nice packaging.

reviews.review_title: Unfortunately, it doesn't work well for me.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very excited to receive this through BzzAgent a couple of weeks ago. I love that it is a foundation and that it also has SPF and other sun protection. I have tried this product with various different primers, as well as without primer. Surprisingly, it performs best for me with no primer at all. It goes on easily and smoothly. It also covers the redness that I sometimes get on my cheeks. Those are the pros. Unfortunately, this product makes my skin look dry and bumpy, even when it isn't dry or bumpy. And, after only a few hours of wear, it separates quite a bit. This happens regardless of which primer I use, or how much setting spray or powder i use. I've tried various products along with this one, trying to find the magic combination. I have definitely tried worse foundations, but I've also tried better. I will keep this on my shelf as an emergency backup, for now.

This is a medium to full coverage foundation and did not take much to cover my full face. It definitely is buildable as well so if there are any spots or redness, this will help minimize the look. I was concerned that this shade would not match me but it matched perfectly! Below are pictures of my skin before and after the foundation application. I did not use setting spray either.

This foundation says ultra wear long wear 24 hours and they MEAN IT. I will definitely keep going back to this foundation.

I have rosacea and combination skin so my T zone gets very oily and my cheeks get very red, so this helps a lot with keeping it from separating and hide the redness, I took pictures so you could see the difference and how it hides my redness and pores
