reviews.review_title: I would not recommend this product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tested Lancome Teint Idole for a while, and here are my thoughts on it, especially as someone with oily skin.  Pros:  Easy-to-use pump dispenser Beautiful, sleek bottle design Liquid consistency thatu2019s easy to blend Cons:  Oxidizes significantly on my skin, changing to a darker shade over time Clings to dry patches and pimples, enhancing texture instead of smoothing it out Not waterproof or tear-proof u2013 I shed a tear, and later saw a visible streak where the foundation had wiped off from my eyes to my jawline Sits awkwardly on the skin and doesnu2019t feel natural Overall performance is disappointing, and the only redeeming feature is the liquid texture This foundation was sent to me in exchange for an honest review, but unfortunately, it didnu2019t work out for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing foundation! It is a great match for me! The bottle is beautiful and big and I love the pump as opposed to a wand. It sat so ni rely on my skincare and made my face look flawless. It didnu2019t produce too much extra oil on my t-zone. I also love that itu2019s build able but not cakey! It doesnu2019t have a chemical smell and I donu2019t need a whole lot to cover my whole face. It evens out my skin tone and covers my blemishes without caking on them. Itu2019s easy to blend and it lasted all night!! Love it so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product. I would definitely recommend to ages 20 and up! This makes my skin feel great and silly amooth

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this every day since receiving it! It looks beautiful on the skin. I am 52 years old and it does not sink in to fine lines or wrinkles. I usually have my makeup on for at least 14 hours and it still looks good when I take it off. I would definitely purchase this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am truly obsessed with this foundation. The way it sits on my skin and looks flawless. It doesnu2019t empathize my pores. It doesnu2019t clog my pores. Every time iu2019ve worn this foundation Iu2019ve gotten many compliments. Itu2019s light weight, medium to buildable coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for over 2 weeks. I have the color 105W in a matte finish. This definitely has full coverage but it made my skin so dry that I couldn't use it anymore. The shade was perfect for my skin tone. It matched me perfectly as a matter of fact. It held up for most of the day. I just wish it didn't make my skin feel so dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m really impressed with this foundation! The color match is spot on for my skin and blends seamlessly! Even after a full day, it still looks fresh. Definitely a go-to for anyone who needs long-lasting, natural-looking coverage! It has quickly become my FAVORITE!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation was perfect for my combination skin! Didn't settle into my fine lines around my eyes or forehead wrinkles. Even though it is a Matte formula, the foundation still feels hydrating and perfectly blends into my skin to make it feel light and flawless. Perfect for 40+ with no worries that you will look older, this foundation looks and makes you feel young!! SPF is an added bonus, as a mom on the go, I often forget the SPF step, so this foundation makes mornings a breeze for me! Love this product!!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 335W - For medium skin with warm/golden undertones

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin

I  will definitely keep this as party of my make up routine and will recommend to all my melons rich greens ABBA family! weight

reviews.review_title: A must have in my makeup routine

I'm in my 40s and starting to have some fine lines and this just smoothes right over everything making my face a nice even clean canvas. It really blends well with my skin. reviews.review_shade_purchased: 415W - For medium-deep skin with warm/golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the finishing look with this foundation. Itu2019s so pretty & full coverage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation in the shade 515W, and Iu2019m thoroughly impressed! The coverage is fantasticu2014medium to full, easily buildable without feeling heavy. I appreciate that it provides a natural matte finish that doesnu2019t look flat or cakey.This foundation truly lives up to its 24-hour claim! I wore it through a long workday, and it held up beautifully without any need for touch-ups.  Overall, I highly recommend the Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation in 515W for anyone with deep skin and warm undertones. It offers exceptional coverage, a perfect color match, and impressive longevity

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found this foundation to be very comfortable to wear, I didn't feel it at all throughout the hot summer day, it never ran or smudged. The consistency is more liquid, than creamy. It states that it provides full coverage, however I found it to be more on the light side, skin imperfections, though reduced, were still noticeable. Very natural look, not oily, not sticky, however more on a dry side, I would recommend using moisturizer prior to application. I love that it's unscented and not noticeable at all, but would prefer more coverage. I did use high-density brush for application, maybe applying by hand or with a sponge would give more coverage. It has 25 SPF sunscreen, which is a bonus. Doesn't smudge or stain clothes. Definitely a matte finish, and the shade was absolutely perfect, exact match for my skin. Love that it comes in a pump version for extra hygiene and dispenses the right amount of product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love how long lasting and lightweight, but buildable this foundation is. The color matches my skin exactly that it looks like Iu2019m not wearing foundation at all. It doesnu2019t settle in fine lines and wrinkles and blends nicely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is an oily skin girl's dream. I have dry skin so I did prepare my skin a lot before applying the foundation, I used serum and moisturizer, I didn't set it because it self sets, it happens kinda quick so you should work a little fast but it definitely smooths the skin, it basically looks poreless. The undertones aren't 100% perfect for me, but I'll make it work! Overall, I enjoyed how smooth it made my skin look and the fact that I didn't need powder which I feel is gonna help people with oily skin. I received this product in exchange of an honest review. All opinions are mine and only mine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me first start by saying I absolutely love this foundation. I have tried many brand and Iu2019m highly impressed with the coverage. I was able to cover a tattoo to see how good the coverage was and Iu2019m not disappointed. This is with just two layers! I love that itu2019s a buildable foundation. Drys nice and matte and not too dry . Husband said itu2019s hard to tell o had foundation on.

reviews.review_title: A matte foundation for dewy girls

The foundation itself is very lightweight and buidable so it came be as full coverage as one desire. The matte is still natural looking. Color match for me is perfect. Iu2019d definitely recommend this foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Product is alright, you definitely can feel it on your skin and kinda feels like a mask. The shade I got is a bit darker in person than it seems like from a screen, I definitely use it as a liquid bronzer though and for that purpose it works pretty well

reviews.review_title: Matte finish, not for mature women
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Teint Idole Ultra 400W to sample and review.   I was excited to try as I generally love Lancu00f4me products. The only positive I can give is the color.  It was a good pick for my skin tone and I generally use the Lancu00f4me Dual Finish Powder foundation Honey Warm IIIu2026which needless to say, I love it and have been using it for years.   Unfortunately for me, Iu2019m 52 years old, the Matte finish of the liquid Teint Idole Ultra did not do anything for me from a positive aspect. I felt like it made my skin look dry and wrinkly and not the well hydrated, Dewey look I generally get with foundation. It did offer full coverage, but in the 5 days I tried it, I had multiple people tell me throughout the day u201cyou look tired are you okay?u201d  I would not recommend for mature skincare!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am so thankful to have been given the opportunity to try this product. Otherwise I would have never known how amazing it is. Fully switching to this foundation. I am 32 no Botox so I show some signs of aging. This was the most bizarre consistency. I had no idea what to intislly make of it. Itu2019s liquidy and wet. But when you apply to the skin it sinks into and becomes ONE with your skin. It doesnu2019t sit on top like most other foundations. The shade ranges are insane. 55 shades and 100% of people found their match. My shade 225n matched PERFECTLY. It is a buildable full coverage that finishes matte. It wore soooo well during the day. Itu2019s supposed to be humidity proof which I havenu2019t been able to test. But with my oily skin this has truly impressed me. It feels more like skin care than makeup. Highly recommend. And the price point is SO reasonable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation for a couple of weeks, I am happy with this product. It goes on smoothly and does not feel heavy or cake up on your skin. It was a perfect match for my complexion and left a flawless look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The formula feels great and the color match was perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love a natural and not such a heavy feeling on my skin and this is it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The 240W Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation is my go-to! It matches my skin tone perfectly, giving me that natural, even finish. I love how lightweight it feelsu2014like Iu2019m barely wearing anything, but it still offers just the right amount of medium coverage. Plus, it has SPF 25, so Iu2019m protected from the sun without needing an extra step. My routine is so simple nowu2014just serum or moisturizer, then this foundation, and Iu2019m ready for the day. Itu2019s perfect for a quick, everyday look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is easy to apply and provides smooth, even coverage. I do not typically wear full-coverage foundation except for special occasions/events. The fragrance is nice. The only con is I ordered the wrong shade.

reviews.review_title: Solid everyday foundation from an excellent brand
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome kindly sent me this foundation for free so that I could review it. The following opinions are my own. I did not select a good color match unfortunately and found it very yellow for my light neutral skin. However, I am still able to use it reasonably well as long as I apply a light sheer layer. Both my 25 year old niece and I have been using it and enjoying it. The texture is a lovely gel that spreads evenly. I would call the finish skin-like, it's neither matte nor glowy. I have not noticed any transferability during the day. The longevity is excellent. There is no scent, which is also a plus. This has sunscreen, which I dislike because I always wear sunscreen as part of my skincare. Overall just a really solid, everyday foundation from an excellent brand.

reviews.review_title: A great product if you have the right shade

But it lasts through hot weather, doesnu2019t break me out, and Iu2019ve gotten many compliments on the finish.
this is my new favorite foundation!! it's full coverage but still gives natural, and is def sweat and transfer proof. the shad match is immaculate omg buy it rnnn

reviews.review_text: After using this new formula and new swatch(previously 460) I have to say that 440N is the better one for me and my natural makeup looks.

This found is a must-try foundation. I tend to get very oily skin when I wear foundations hence why I am so picky with foundations. I also commute and walk around the city almost everyday. This foundation was able to stay in place all day without transferring or disappearing like most foundations I've tried. The matte finish on this is perfect, it looks so natural and stays that way almost the whole day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this foundation has the right viscosity. Neither too thick or too thin. It also has a nice coverage which lasts

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin

Extremely lightweight and full coverage makes this a new staple in my year-round make up routine. Pigmented enough to use on its own yet it also combines beautifully with my moisturizer. I will be buying again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so thankful to Lancome for gifting this  product in exchange for this review. The Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation is a new favorite that I will definitely be purchasing in the future. Most matte foundations are drying and do not compliment my dark skin tone. This foundation successfully created the matte look I'd been wanting, without appearing dry or cakey. It is incredibly light and flexible, allowing for a full night of smiling and laughing without the annoying foundation creases around the eye and mouth areas. I wore this foundation, with primer, to an event that had an indoor and outdoor social area. My face was flawless throughout the night, after approximately 6 hours of smiling, laughing and talking in both the outdoor and indoor spaces. The color match, coverage, and longevity factors of this foundation each deserve their own 5 stars! I definitely recommend this purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the product for free in exchange for writing the review! I absolutely loved this it is bendable, no harsh smell and perfect match for me. Long wearing through work day as well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is sleek and convenient, with a pump dispenser that allows for controlled product usage, preventing waste. Also, it doesnu2019t break me out, which is always a concern with long-wear products, especially for those with sensitive or acne-prone skin.  However, there are a few areas where it could improve. First, while the foundation performs well in controlling shine, it can cling to dry patches if you have combination skin, especially during colder months. I find that using a hydrating primer helps, but without it, the product can exaggerate texture in drier areas. Additionally, though the formula is long-wearing, after about 8 hours of wear, I noticed slight separation around the nose and mouth, especially if youu2019re sweating or wearing a mask.  Lastly, while the shade range is good, the undertones can be tricky. Some shades lean too yellow or pink, making it hard to find a neutral match, especially for those with neutral undertones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the foundation. Skin like finish and satin finish

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Matte finish,stays on all day/night. I love this product because it also matches perfectly!!

reviews.review_title: One of the best foundations on the market

It doesnu2019t settle into lines and wears beautifully throughout the day with minimal or no touch ups for my oily-combo skin. One of the best and I will continue to buy it after my sample is finished.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is absolutely amazing! Long wear and looks so natural!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 345N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
