reviews.review_text: It has longevity in the wear and blends well with my regular makeup routine. I have oily skin and it didnu2019t cause me to be extra oily (I always use a matte primer in my t zones too).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this foundation itu2019s my new go-to! Iu2019m 37 with combination skin. This goes on so smoothly and has a beautiful matte finish that stays matte! The coverage is excellent. Itu2019s not so thick that itu2019s cakey, itu2019s actually a great consistency. It covers what I want and give my face an all over fresher look. Excellent! Five stars!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Teint Idole Ultra Wear foundation has truly impressed me! It's incredibly thin and buildable, yet provides amazing full coverage that feels breathable all day. I love how itu2019s waterproof it is and the formula is packed with skin care ingredients. The natural matte finish gives a smooth, perfected look that doesnu2019t feel heavy. So excited to use it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a fair cool olive so I mix in blue pigment to adjust the shade to match. I wouldu2019ve had to do this to any other foundation. This formula is also comparable to Fenty if youu2019re looking for a better formula. Builds up coverage nicely and itu2019s a nice luxury product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried this one out and I really like it. I have oily skin and it doesnu2019t make me look greasy. It has great coverage and doesnu2019t amplify the appearance of my pores. I do plan to return this item only because it was a bit darker than what I thought it was but overall I do recommend this to any acne prone or oily skin girlys!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used a glowy, hydrating primer and this worked perfectly for my normal/dry skin. It's buildable coverage, lightweight, and has amazing staying power. My base looked flawless all day. The shade was a perfect match for my very fair, pink skin tone. I love the luxury packaging and that it has a pump. I've been a Double Wear user for 15+ years, but this is what I've been reaching for each day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been wearing this foundation for a week now and I really love it! The coverage is amazing and it has really good staying power even without applying a setting spray! My cheeks get really red and it's hard to cover up to achieve a flawless look, but this foundation does a great job masking my redness. Since trying this has become my new every day wear foundation and I definitely recommend! I received this product for free in exchange for writing my review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very impressed. I wasnu2019t sure about what color would work for me and I found it very forgiving. It blends easily and doesnu2019t have a heavy feeling and lasted all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow I'm amazed!! This was my first non drugstore foundation and I can honestly say this is worth it!! It feels so nice on my skin and the coverage is great me for and very breathable!! It's such a plus that it has SPF also. Its a matte foundation and I have slightly oily skin so I love how it looks on my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this foundation, itu2019s holding well on face and great with highlighter.  Also itu2019s great to have SPF 25 as additional perk to foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay I am obsessed with this foundation!! I honestly didnu2019t want to love it cause of the price point but now Iu2019m a customer I guess! I have olive skin and shades never truly match me. I just have to get close but it will either be too orange or too light until this! Iu2019m obsessed with the shade and then when I came on the website I see they specifically worked on the olive shades and I feel so seen! I kept taking pictures of my neck because usually no matter how much I blend it just is not the right color and I have to blend it down my entire neck in order to not have an obvious difference in my face and neck! I also wore it to work and then took this picture after so it really is truly long wearing. Lastly I HATE when foundations FEEL like you are wearing foundation and this one felt super breathable! Love it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 440N - For medium-deep skin with neutral/deep peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product to try and review. I really light the lightweight feel and look of this foundation. I think I need a slightly different shade for the color to really work with my skin tone, but the coverage is great and it seems to last. I really like that it contains SPF.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! I was pleasantly surprised by how easy it was to blend into my skin. I used a beauty blender (dry) and just tap tap and it blends so well. This is light to medium coverage which is perfect for me. I usually donu2019t wear full coverage so this works out wonderfully. Feels very lightweight on the skin. Definitely live up to its name of breathable foundation. Another plus is the bottle looks luxurious, feel sturdy with a frosted look and pop gold cap. Looks good on the vanity. Overall this has become one of my most favorite foundation. Got compliments on how well it blends into my skin and looks natural.

I tested this product out for a week on my dry skin and I think that it is an amazing matte foundation! The foundation is super thin with great coverage. I would say medium to full coverage. The foundation also lasts a really long time ice worn it for 16hrs a day and it held up really nicely and I didn't really need to touch up throughout the day. I think of you have dry skin it can be a bit drying if you don't properly prep your skin for it like any other matte foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Buildible, medium coverage, matte foundation. Blends very nicely. Lasts all day with proper baking and finishing sprays. I have used Lancome skincare products but never any of the makeup so this was a first and I was pleasantly surprised.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I usually stick to wearing skin tints for a more sheer look and donu2019t use foundation a lot because of how heavy it feels on my skin sometimes, but I was pleasantly surprised by the Teint Idole foundation.  It felt very breathable to me and had nice medium coverage when buffed out with a brush. You can definitely build up the coverage if you want. While it is more matte than what I would typically go for, I still had a nice glow with it. I only took off a star because the shade (neutral/peachy undertones) did pull a little olive on me and I needed to color correct.  Received the foundation for free in exchange for an honest review!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So very lightweight, and just melted into my skin....extremely natural look, like actual skin....really!! I was super surprised and delighted at how good of a match to my skin tone and realistic texture, and I even chose the shade online! The matte finish wasn't powdery, just realistic. Blended easily as well, I started light and layered more product to customize the finish.  Will be reaching for this when I need to look super professional and put together.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this a few times over the past week. One day I wore for a more natural look the others more full coverage. The foundation went on smooth and was able to build well onto of it. It doesn't Smell bad either. I would highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While it works wonders in covering up acne scars, the foundation is still super light and comfortable on the skin. The matte finish lasts long and has great wear even for oily-combination skin. It does tend to cling here to dry patches, so you have to have good prep before applying. It has a great shade range so its good for different skin tones.

reviews.review_title: A new must have in my routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this product!! I used the merit primer with the kosas setting powder and this lasted ALL day. I was honestly shocked by how much I love this. I have combo skin and my makeup only got slightly shiny by the end. The coverage is very buildable and will be my new foundation that I reach for!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Texture is not too runny yet feels very light weight when applied. Does not accentuate texture and wore well on my combo skin. Lasting power is excellent; I wore it for an entire day in humid, hot weather and it still looked good by the end of the day. It does have a matte finish so if you have dry skin, Iu2019d definitely recommend prepping your skin well ahead of wearing the foundation. That being said, I think this sits well on the skin and would work for many skin types. It does have a mild scent if thatu2019s a concern for youu2014but it is not bothersome or unpleasant. Overall, it had a very gorgeous finish, wore very well, and was flattering under the rest of my makeup. Would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After a full day of foundation I can tell you that if you have combination skin this product is amazing! It held up so well and I didnu2019t have to touch up! I think Iu2019ve finally found my perfect foundation! I also used a couple other products with it and it didnu2019t make any of them lift or cake up so it was perfect!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I think Iu2019ve finally found my go to liquid foundation. The Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear foundation is fantastic; it has a natural finish that is very light (to me, almost undetectable) on the skin. I mean, who wants to feel the heaviness of makeup on their skin?!!  I have very oily skin & this foundation lasted all day (10 hours) on my skin without excess oil creeping through. As a deep skin girly, I appreciate the range of shades & undertones. I will definitely recommend this foundation to others.

reviews.review_title: The best foundation Iu2019ve owned in years
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best foundation Iu2019ve had in years!  This stuff actually covers my acne dark marks and looks natural! Goes on light and isnu2019t cakey either! I actually feel confident again while wearing just a tiny bit of this foundation to hide my uneven skin time and texture!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the lightest, most comfortable foundation I have worn! I donu2019t like the feeling of foundation on my skin and the way that Teint Idole sits on the skin is just so beautiful and natural looking! It definitely has buildable coverage and Iu2019d say a very lightly matte finish. I did notice some settling of the product in the wrinkles under my eyes, however I expected that and it wouldnu2019t deter me from continuing to wear and recommend this product to others. As a makeup artist believe me when I tell you Iu2019ve used a wide variety of foundations and this one is now in my top favorites!  I did receive this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion and unbiased review. Will be purchasing when my bottle runs out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am not that impressed.  I tried this as a free sample, but expected more.  The texture is really thin, very fluid-like, even when shaken forcefully before applying.  Not a fan.  Honestly it didn't seem to cover my dry patches very smoothly and it was disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: So, typically, I am a tinted moisturizer or BB cream user; but I was surprised by how much I liked this foundation! Some days I just want more buildable coverage, and this definitely delivers. Application is easy, it goes on creamy and smooth, and it doesnu2019t set into fine lines and wrinkles. By the end of the day, it had not budged, even without the use of a Setting spray. Itu2019s not five stars for me just because I think I picked the wrong shade, itu2019s a little too dark for my skin tone. It should be fine in the summer while I have a tan, but for the winter, Iu2019ll need to get a lighter shade.

reviews.review_title: THIS IS THE FOUNDATION FOR US OILY FACED GIRLS!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: OKAY LISTENNNNN! I have really oily skin and it seems that I can NEVER get the primer/foundation combo right. BUT THIIIIIIS! BABYYYYY! I am in love! This shade is just a TAD dark for me, but in the summer it will be perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this foundation for free in exchange for writing an honest review. This foundation was more liquid than I was expecting which made it kind of messy when applying to a brush and then my face. That being said, I like that it provides buildable coverage with a natural sheen. You can see in the photo below that I did a light layer over my wrist and you can still see my freckle coming through, but more layers would cover it better. The smell of the foundation wasnu2019t my favorite, but Iu2019m not sure If itu2019s an intentional fragrance or not.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for busy days - light and long lasting
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just started using the Teint Idole Ultra 24H Matte Foundation, and Iu2019m really loving it! Itu2019s super lightweight, so it doesnu2019t feel like Iu2019m wearing a ton of makeup, but it still lasts all day. The SPF 25 is a nice bonus, too! As a new mom, I need something I can just throw on quickly before heading out, and this does the trick. Itu2019s super easy to apply, and Iu2019m really happy with how itu2019s holding up. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 560 - For deep skin with cool/rich red undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am trying Lancu00f4me for the very first time. This foundation went above my expectations! The label is the truth!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really good foundation. Itu2019s giving skin.Its Def A Nice matte makeup. Kind Of Remind Me of Fenty matte makeup.I Would def recommend it to family and friends. I can see it being apart of my makeup routine. I would definitely buy This

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this foundation. I have shied away from foundations because they never did not look cakey to me, or the color match was never right-I have tried several. I picked out my match with very little faith it would match and that I would enjoy this product. The packaging and bottle are very Lancu00f4me- very pretty and well made. I started off by pumping twice on top the top of my hand to check the consistency and color. I applied with a makeup brush and boy was I shocked. It was outstanding. The color match was like second skin, it was so very lightweight, and moisturizing and the application went on smooth and fast. I would say it took maybe 2 to 3 pumps for neck and face. I love this and have been wearing it daily. It stays all day and has me SHOOK. LOVE IT.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good product overall! I felt that the product was smooth and left my skin looking smooth and airbrushed. I felt that it blended well and applied smoothly. It doesn't have a strong smell and leaves a nice glowy finish. It lasted most of the day, a tiny bit of caking but otherwise, it works well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The color match was perfect and I love how light the foundation feels. I was worried with it being matte that it would feel heavy and look cakey, but it doesn't at all! It blends well and lasted all day for me, especially in our 100-degree heat! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great option for someone who does not have the time, resources, or energy to try several different foundations and brands. This is tried and true! I can see myself eventually picking a shade that better fits me but Iu2019m impressed with how it blends out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t wear foundation daily but when I do, Iu2019ve found it hard to find one Iu2019m happy with. I tried the Lancu00f4me ultra long wear and Iu2019m really happy with it! The first thing I noticed was how light it was. I very much dislike the cakey thick ones. I also noticed that the Lancu00f4me one does not settle into fine lines. I wore it for about 10 hours each day last week and it still looked great at the end of the day. There was no transfer and no settling in the fine lines. I have pretty oily skin that I blot throughout the day, but it didnu2019t seem to affect this foundation. (Sometimes other foundations will start to u201ccome apartu201d). I love that itu2019s a medium but buildable foundation too but that it also looks NATURAL and not super obvious that Iu2019m wearing anything. Iu2019m really happy with it and would absolutely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I canu2019t get enough of this foundation. I was skeptical at first but then when I saw its finish and what it looks like after at least 6 hours I was so in love!! I tried it with different primers and products on top and it didnu2019t budge. Iu2019ve been telling everyone to just buy it. It leaves my skin so uniform and it covers all my hyperpigmentation. I have acne scars and Iu2019m just sold.  I love it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Full disclosure: I received this product for free in exchange for writing a review.   I really really like this foundation. It goes on nicely, even over skincare. It has a nice matte finish and I didnu2019t need any setting powder. It also didnu2019t cling to dry spots or break down at all during the day. The staying powder is wonderful and it looked the same at 8am as it did at 8pm. The only reason I didnu2019t give 5 stars is because I got C for cool and it was still too yellow for me.

reviews.review_title: SPF protection and full coverage. Give it a try
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved this product. Unlike other brand I've tried this one offers full coverage without looking like you're wearing a ton of make up. I love that it has SPF protection and is a bit water proof, so would be perfect wearing by the pool. I would def buy this product again but would go a shade darker. If you're looking for a quality product with full blendible coverage give this a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Natural finish, long lasting, and evens skin tone. It did not enhance my dry patches. Itu2019s giving medium buildable coverage. Good shade match for myself! Did not feel heavy on the skin. New everyday foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. I like my foundation to be breathable and buildable and this fit the bill. Enough coverage to cover any redness and imperfections but keeps my freckles showing. And if I want more coverage, I can add more but itu2019s still very lightweight. Perfect as a daily coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is a game-changer. It provides flawless coverage, feels light on the skin, and lasts all day.  This foundation makes my skin look naturally radiant and stays put through any conditions. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 505N - For deep skin with neutral/deep peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This made my skin look worse with it on and thought to check the expiration date just to find out I spent money on this only to find out that it expires 3 months after I purchased it and I missed the return window.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently was able to try this product for free for my review. Wonderfully packaged product. Works extremely well and has nice lightweight coverage. Breathable and not cakey feeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried this matte foundation and I absolutely love it. Although I need to get a shade that matches better, it was light weight, airy, and it provided great coverage. I will definitely be buying this product as a part of my makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation glides on very smooth and is super buildable but without feeling heavy. i love the sunscreen component so i can skip a facial care step. i love the range of lighter shades because i am pretty pale.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: First, the color match was spot on. Thinner in consistency, it blends really nicely with a brush and/or a beauty blender. This foundation claims to be full coverage, but I would qualify it more as a medium buildable coverage, allowing skin to still look skin-like. In areas I did not set, as an combination-oily skin type, it held up beautifully with minimal if any separation after well over 8 hours of wear. It works well with contour and blush without blotchiness and looks really beautiful, while still feeling weightless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome Teint Idole Ultra Wear, Shade 215C Before, is a full coverage longwearing foundation with SPF25. This foundation feels lightweight on my skin and it covers very well. This foundation is waterproof and transfer resistant, lasts up to 24 hours. I love the matte finish and how comfortable this foundation feels on my skin. I am very happy with how this foundation looks and I would recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this foundation everyday for the past week or so.  And I am impressed, it is lightweight and doesnu2019t feel or look like I have foundation on.  It stays on all day.  Skin looks great.  I wear sunscreen everyday but itu2019s nice that this is SPF 25, and contains titanium dioxide.  What I love most, it is not traditional matte, it has a natural, slight glow of a finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is light in texture and has a matte finish. I love that it doesn't have any scent to it.  The packaging is gorgeous. It lasts very long without getting oily. You must prep your skin before applying this foundation because this is matt. Overall, I think this is a great foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didnu2019t expect this product to be exactly my skin shade and so lightweight. I never put foundation on with my hands but this is so smooth it blends perfectly. Coverage on point as well. Definitely a forever Lancu00f4me user.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Lancome foundation for free in exchange for my honest review, and I absolutely love it! The foundation provides medium coverage, giving me a natural, dewy finish that feels light on my skin. Itu2019s one of the best color matches Iu2019ve found for my cool-toned skin, blending seamlessly. Itu2019s also incredibly long-lastingu2014 I only need to touch up once around lunch, and it stays flawless for the rest of the day. It has quickly become my go-to foundation, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable, all-day product with a great shade range.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest opinion. This foundation is my new favorite holy grail foundation. I got shade 225N and it matches perfectly, it seriously looks like your own skin. Itu2019s lightweight and medium coverage which is perfect because you can build up the coverage if desired. I asked my coworker how my new foundation was looking and she said u201cyouu2019re wearing makeup? You canu2019t even tell. It looks so good!u201d. This foundation doesnu2019t even settle into my eye lines or smile lines either, even better!

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Thanks to BzzAgent for this product. This matte foundation nails the shade match for dark skinu2014absolutely flawless! It blends seamlessly with no ashy or grey undertones, giving a smooth, natural look. The finish is lightweight. it starts to fade after about 5-6 hours, especially in oil-prone areas. Despite that, the perfect match makes it worth it. Ideal for when you need a  flawless complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a gorgeous matte finish foundation. Iu2019ve been applying it with primer underneath and gives me a full coverage appearance without feeling cakey at all. Iu2019ve been wearing it throughout the workday and feel like my makeup still looks great at the end of the day. Plus, it has spf 25 which is awesome to add just another layer of sun protection for my sensitive skin. I think I chose a slightly darker color than I should have for my skin tone but definitely can use this in the summer months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to receive a sample of this foundation from the brand to try out and have been pleasantly surprised by it! With so many foundation choices out there, Iu2019d never tried one from Lancu00f4me before. My first impression was that they offer a really impressive shade range. I have fair-light skin with aggressively neutral undertones. Most foundations are too warm or too cool for me, but I was able to pin down the perfect shade (097N) using the photos and swatches provided online. The consistency of foundation was a little surprising. It has a slightly oily, thin consistency that dries with a natural semi-matte finish. I didnu2019t need much to get a light level of coverage (which is my preference) and it seems buildable, but I do wonder if it would look a little heavy if I used much more. The only downside of the oil-like consistency is that it magnifies any dry patches/flaky spots, so prepping skin with a good moisturizer first is essential!

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this foundation for free, and Iu2019m so impressed! It provides full coverage while feeling incredibly lightweight on my skin. My face feels so healthy and moisturized throughout the day, without any heaviness or cakiness. The formula blends seamlessly, leaving a natural finish that lasts for hours. Itu2019s perfect for both everyday wear and more glam looks, as it holds up well even under different conditions. I also love that it doesnu2019t settle into fine lines or dry out my skin, which is a huge plus for long wear! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very happy with this. I received it as a sampling program and was able to give it a try before buying but I think I'll buy it again. I love the color and how it blends. I wish it lasted a little longer throughout the day but that may change based on weather and such. I'm perfectly happy with this foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: iu2019ve used this for 3 days and itu2019s my new favorite foundation. The package is amazing. Itu2019s the first foundation that hasnu2019t turned yellow or pink after applying. Itu2019s not thick but it covers well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would give this a 4.5 if available.  I love the expansive shade range.  The 130(C) matches my fair skin and pink undertone perfectly.  The liquid foundation covers very well, and provides medium, buildable coverage, that still allows some natural skin to peek through.  The matte formulation performs well throughout a normal workday and does not settle into my crow's feet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for about 5 days now and I really love it.  It's been hot where I live and it hasn't felt greasy or heavy on my skin.  I'm relatively pale and this has been a great match for my skin.  It gives good coverage without being obviously that I'm wearing makeup and I feel like it does a good job of staying on.  I like a more natural look and this has been great for that.  Would highly recommend this product if you're looking for something that goes on light, covers well, and doesn't feel greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this foundation. It is medium to full coverage and is easily buildable. I love wearing this for date night! I can go from work to date with very little touching up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this foundation. It's lightweight but has good coverage. I felt like my skin could breathe. Other products feel suffocating to my sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely amazing! Very light on the skin with giving full coverage. Wore great all day long! Itu2019s worth every cent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have spent nearly 2 decades trying to get my skin to cooperate with me, so I have become hesitant regarding trying out new foundations. I am very happy that this product was sent to me to try in exchange for a review, because I would have never otherwise experienced how great it is!  I keep my morning routine very simple, moisturizer, SPF, and aloe vera gel for primer before foundation, but since this one has SPF included, I have been able to skip that extra step (I use powdered SPF for touch-ups during the day). This foundation goes on easily and blends well, and I haven't noticed any creasing. I use setting powder out of habit, but could see some users having the ability to skip that step if they aren't very oily. The finish is quite matte but doesn't feel or look crusty. It actually looks very natural, but could be built up for a more flawless finish if that's your preference.  I have combination/oily skin, so for foundation, the real test for me is longevity. Without going into too much detail, I had an emergency one day after using this foundation, which ended in me not doing any touch ups, and I even neglected to remove my makeup before bed. Sleeping in foundation is a guarantee that I will wake up with angry skin, or so I thought. My sensitive skin showed no signs of irritation the next morning, which was pleasantly surprising!   I would like to add that I haven't used chemical-based SPF in a few months, as it has made my skin break out in the past. Even after sleeping in it, I did not experience any breakouts.  Overall, I would recommend this to anyone who has a compatible skin type. If you're considering giving it a go, I would say it is worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for a couple days now and itu2019s amazing! Itu2019s Matte! I love how matte it was. It was an easy application and it stayed all day! I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! Lux and substantial packaging on par with other high end brands. The shade range was easy to match with a photo. As a fair girl that can be a challenge - for it to match but not be so fair that it makes me look sickly. This gave me the perfect color match. It is super buildable. One pump is enough to get a beautiful medium satiny finish. If I wanted it heavier, I could have used a little more. I was nervous it would be too matte (super matte foundations scare me) and I really don't find it to be the early 2010s matte dry look and found this to be more radiant to me. I would describe the finish as looking like my skin but more even and blurred. So far it is also very longwearing (on par with like an estee lauder double wear imo without being as heavy) This will definitely be added to my foundation rotation - I will definitely replace it when I run out!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 130C - For fair to light skin with cool/pinky undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm really impressed firstly that it matches my skin tone perfectly! It's very buildable and it truly lasted all day! It dries to a velvet matte but doesn't dry out my skin at all. It's really a beautiful foundation. I recommend using a primer if you have wrinkles because after it dried I saw wrinkles I didn't even know I had! Lol! Really though it's a large bottle so the price isn't so bad when you consider it's quality and quantity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this foundation for almost a week now every day and I love how it feels on my skin. The color is perfect. It is lightweight, but also buildable. It does not dry out my skin and leaves a nice finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first I didnu2019t feel like it was full coverage, but after using it a couple of times I do feel like itu2019s buildable. The color match was perfect and I love how it has spf in it. I would recommend this foundation for someone looking for a breathable, medium to full coverage foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally found a foundation actually in my color! Love that it has SPF but still covers all of my little problem spots well(:

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: So, typically, I am a tinted moisturizer or BB cream user; but I was surprised by how much I liked this foundation! Some days, I just want more buildable coverage, and this definitely delivers. Application is easy, it goes on creamy and smooth, and it doesnu2019t set into fine lines and wrinkles. Itu2019s not a five star for me just because I think I picked the wrong shade, itu2019s a little bit too dark for my skin tone. It should be fine during the summer while I have a tan, but in the winter, I will need to pick a lighter shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lightweight, easy to blend. I like that it has SPF in it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation it is buildable and lightweight at the same time. It stays put pretty well but as soon as I start to sweat it is gone. Overall a great foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation by Lancome comes in a nice glass bottle with a dispenser. It is easy and convenient to use. One pump provides an exact amount of product I need for my makeup.  The foundation applies smoothly and provides full coverage and natural matte finish. I like how it makes my pores invisible but doesn't clog them. Also, it is long-lasting and sweat proof. It is a great addition to my everyday makeup. I would recommend this product for others.

reviews.review_title: Great event or every day foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I would give this product 4.5 stars if I could. Shade match was easy to do based on product photos. The neutral undertone was not too pink orange or yellow, just right. Consistency is quite liquidy/runny which makes it easy to spread the product around. One pump is more than enough for medium buildable coverage. Satin finish, I still had to powder a bit in my problem areas. Did not sink into my pores or creases. Lasted well for 8+ hours and did not break up in my oily areas such as nose. Overall this foundation is a beautiful foundation that I would wear every day if it was less expensive, but great for formal events as it lasted a long time on my oily skin. I did moisturize well underneath and used a hydrating primer since this is a more matte foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is incredible. The formula is light and buttery, and it melts right Into the skin. It is the perfect shade for me and looks just like my skin. Not to mention the packaging is generous and beautiful. I will definitely be repurchasing this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this Lancu00f4me foundation. I have used this foundation in the past many years ago and always liked it but the new formula is even better! It goes on evenly and truly lasts 24 hours. I like that this foundation is matte because I have oily combination skin so the finish is natural but still glowy. I have not experienced any break outs from this foundation which is a plus. Overall, this foundation is great for everyday wear or even a special occasion look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Overall a solid medium coverage matte foundation. I liked the ease of application, and it felt much lighter on my skin compared to other medium coverage foundations. The biggest highlight for me was the range of undertones. It can be harder to find a fair enough shade in a warmer underline. Most range from cool to neutral which is not as exact of a match for me. I was very happy with the color match to my skin with this foundation, and Iu2019d for sure recommend it to anyone looking for an easy matte finish.   I was gifted this product in exchange for a review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the luxury packaging and pump dispenser. It has a mild sunscreen smell going on, which isn't noticeable after application. I feel like it lasts all day without melting off, and it's hydrating without feeling heavy. I love that it has additional benefits like sunscreen and HLA!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m not usually into true foundation - I typically wear a cc cream as my foundation. But this was a bit of a game changer! Itu2019s pretty full coverage for me but doesnu2019t feel like it. And the match to my skintone was absolutely perfect. I wouldnu2019t wear this for everyday makeup but Iu2019d definitely buy again for special occasions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I havent used this product in such a long time, like 2016 era. I retried this foundation and absolutely wow! Super longwearing and natural looking for a full coverage foundation. I did feel like after a long day of wearing it did settle in fine lines but nothing that couldnt be fixed without a great setting powder or spray. I would absolutely repurchase this on my own.

reviews.review_title: Finally a matte that doesnu2019t enhance dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this foundation for about a week and Iu2019m obsessed! Itu2019s difficult for me to find a matte foundation that doesnu2019t make my skin look dry or splotchy/streaky. This foundation blends in easily and doesnu2019t feel cakey. The consistency is perfect, thin but not too thin that it is running everywhere. I love that it has 25spf so even if I forget to apply sunscreen I know that Iu2019m still protected.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this product! It was not cakey nor did it crease. I wish I had picked one that was closer to my skin tone to really see how great the foundation was bc I liked it a lot.

reviews.review_title: Decent foundation but not my holy grail.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got color 097N.  While itu2019s supposed to be neutral, I feel like it skews mildly yellow (just a touch. I was still able to make it work). Itu2019s a natural matte finish, so not terribly matte. I did not set with a powder at all. It is very skin like but can get patchy in some areas. Anyone with dry skin should avoid this.  Itu2019s a thin formula, but does have a medium coverage, which is my preference.  The longevity of it is good. I used it with and without a primer.  My preference is without, but maybe with a different primer, I may like it more.  Overall, itu2019s a decent foundation but didnu2019t achieve holy grail status.  The photos included are after a full day of wear- no primer and no powder. Blush and bronzer were liquids and creams.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this foundation!! It provides coverage, but it's not heavy. I love the way it goes on and the way it blends with my skin. Definitely changing my go-to foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this foundation for some time now and I really like it so far!!! Itu2019s very buildable so you can have as much or as little coverage as you want. Itu2019s very light and almost remind me of a serum because of how liquidy and smooth it it. A new foundation stable for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for the last week I have to say that I am very happy with how well it covers and stays put. It is very hydrating without being oily. Stays well on the skin for hours. Does not clog pores and it very blends well. This color was a little darker than I normally use so it wasnu2019t a perfect match, but I am so happy with the quality. I received this product in exchange for my review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is lightweight with great coverage. It didnu2019t cake up or crease in my pores. Itu2019s very bendable and buildable if you like more coverage. Itu2019s a clean ingredient product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it, feels light weight & love the coverage will be repurchasing !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used the foundation for 5 days in a row, the skin looks natural, it is easy to apply, not greasy, not smelling, just an amazing product that helps me to cover my light wrinkles and skin issues. Women needs to feel confident and pretty, with this product it is easy to achieve both desire outcomes.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 250W - For light to medium skin with warm/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this foundation,  but it's no better then cheaper ones. I do like that it has spf in it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation really applied smoothly and didnu2019t leave any streaks. I always use a moisturizer before applying foundation and it blended well into it. It lasted all day but I always apply a setting spray so Iu2019m not sure if thatu2019s part of the reason. I would definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancu00f4me has always been a top tier brand although I never went out of my way to purchase it because it seemed like something for my grandma but this long wear foundation really has swayed me after wearing it with my regular makeup routine Iu2019ve found that it actually has surprised me! It is long wear the transfer is minimal without primer and setting or finishing spray /powder but even without those thing itu2019s barely any transfer it gives a clean finish very natural but is buildable not full coverage at all feels and looks like skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage, easy to blend in, it is a bit thick though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this foundation. I have never tried Lancu00f4me foundation before but have found a new favorite. The shade matches my skin perfectly. I will say, it has a very matte finish but looks so smooth on. A little goes a loooong way! I love that itu2019s not scented. I have sensitive skin and scented products are irritating to my skin. This will definitely be a regularly used product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation provides an airbrushed sort of finish that is very lightweight, isnu2019t greasy, and wears well for a long time. The color I received was too yellow for my very fair complexion, so I tried it on my mother whose skin tone it matched much better. She has more matured skin with larger pores and a few age spots here and there. The foundation covered beautifully and survived through both the humid heat and her nap ud83dude09We decided to play with it later into the day, trying on an evening look, and we found the coverage to be buildable without having to apply too much and avoiding that cakey look and feel you get with a lot of others. Overall, Iu2019d say this foundation is a winner for those who want sheer coverage all the way up to those preferring a fuller one. Even at this price point you canu2019t really go wrong because the amount you have to use for either look is minimal and I definitely can appreciate that!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The best foundation. I have been using Estee Lauder for years when I tried this foundation I new itu2019s my new favorite foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for a week, i am loving the results! I can feel my skin dehydrated unlike other foundations that make it feel dry. Very light weight & has the full coverage feeling/look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has a BEAUTIFUL finish, long lasting and light weight. It is slightly oily, but wears nicely. My face still looked put together while walking outdoors in 90 degree weather! Full coverage and breathable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and this foundation was very lightweight and breathable. It had a natural finish that made my skin look perfect in photos. I really liked how it evened out my skin tone and didn't crease in my fine lines. Lasted all day without getting oily. I received something in exchange for this post (free product.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is awesome foundation.  It lasts all day. You only need a small amount. The coverage is great. Very moisturizering too.

reviews.review_title: Long lasting and great medium coverage!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wore this foundation in place of my normal tented moisturizer. One pump covered my whole face using my fingers to put it on my skin then beauty blender to blend out. I would call it medium coverage, demi matte. That was surprising for the amount of sunscreen in it, which generally means thinner coverage or too thick of a formula. Itu2019s very liquidy. I did set it with loose powder, and it lasted all day, no oxidation. I use a lot of cream products, so I avoided those because of the set, it seemed too risky and might disturb it. Overall I would definitely wear for events where I want my makeup to stay all day with a matte-like finish. It does smell like sunscreen if you are sensitive to that smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved that there was a wide ranges of shade types to choose from. Especially as someone with warmer undertones.  It went ok so smooth and lasted me all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! My skin is combination that can get really oily at times. This product keeps me my skin covered while also looking natural and not shiny! I have worn this to workout in and stays putt also!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love 225N Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation it goes on great wears good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'll start by saying. I did love the way this felt on my skin. It was light and blended in nicely. The finish is perfect. Its like a matte natural finish. I hate glowy foundations. It didn't clingy to my dry spots either. I did mix it with my moisturizer. I used a foundation brush to apply and a beauty blender after. My main issue was the shade match. This color is not for peachy neutral tones. It was very orange. There was a clear difference from my undertone and this shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this new formula Teint Idole Ultrawear foundation (shade 250w) to try for free in exchange for my opinion/review. I can say that this has absolutely replaced my previous foundation. The benefits of this product are so noticeable within the first week of wearing. I live in the Northern United States where the weather is variable this time of year and you can be sweating one day and freezing the next. My skin has remained hydrated wearing this foundation and on the hot days the Teint Idole foundation has not melted off when sweating and does not transfer to my clothes! This is HUGE! Not having to switch my outfit or wash shirts right away because of foundation on the collar. This shade matches my skin so well and it feels thin and breathable- two things that are a MUST for me with foundation. It is buildable for full coverage or a more natural look but either application look so natural on me, it doesn't look like I'm wearing makeup at all. There is also no scent which I appreciate and my skin has been really happy with this product, as some other products typically will cause breakouts or sensitivity. I will definitely purchase this again in the future and will recommend it to my friends!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: was very pleasantly surprised with this foundation. It's the perfect amount of coverage and is very breathable. Doesn't feel thick or heavy on the skin at all. Also blends beautifully with both sponge or brush application. I got the shade 115C and have pale skin. I'll say the shade wasn't a perfect match and had a orange undertone to it. But I feel like I just picked the wrong shade. I am planning on getting this foundation in a different and slightly lighter shade. That's how much I like this foundation. It blends beautifully, provides the perfect coverage, and stays out for my full 12 hour makeup wearing day. Would definitely recommend. Just make sure to get color matched, so that you get the right shade. Then it will be perfect! Im picky when it comes to foundation. Can't stand the feel of it on my face or it ends up looking to cakey. So was very happy to find this foundation, since I don't mind wearing it. It looks great on the skin too. This is honestly the first foundation that I have really liked. Very pleased with it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this foundation for about a week, and it's quickly become one of my all-time favorites. What stands out the most is the buildable coverageu2014it makes my skin look incredibly smooth while evening out my complexion perfectly. As someone with combination and sensitive skin, Iu2019m always cautious about trying new products since I tend to break out easily. Thankfully, this foundation feels so lightweight and blends effortlessly into my skin, giving me a gorgeous, natural glow without that heavy, cakey feel.   With my deeper complexion, I'm thrilled that Lancu00f4me offers an extensive shade range that takes different undertones into account. If you're looking for a foundation that delivers on both coverage and healthy skin benefits, this one is definitely worth a try! I will be gifting this foundations to my mom and daughter for the holidays.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is unlike any Iu2019ve tried. It goes on so smoothly and doesnu2019t leave lines or streaks. Doesnu2019t havenu2019t a weird smell and leave a nice glowy finish! Plus it has sunscreen, who doesnu2019t love that!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A must have! I've been using a few weeks now and can't go back to my old foundation!! Full coverage but my skin can still breathe! It doesn't feel heavy on my skin and goes on so easily. My new favourite step in my routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this in the past and really love the formula - nothing has changed. Itu2019s still super lightweight and blends nicely. Itu2019s not the highest coverage but is buildable. No noticable scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very smooth. I like how this blends into the skin and does not accentuate any lines.

reviews.review_title: Great for night out not all day wear.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product a few times, it goes on really nicely. My skin looks like porcelain. I just feel it doesn't last very long. I will continue to use when I go out. Definitely not for everyday wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for my honest review. The shade match was perfect and it glided on very nicely. You have to be alittle quick since this seems to dry down rather quickly. It felt lightweight on my skin and I can honestly say it lasted all day. It was neither greasy or patchy. For myself I prefer something more dewy and hydrating. If you have dry skin this might not be for you. But for those oily skinned girls you will love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this product! It feels super lightweight on the skin but provides excellent coverage. I also love that it has SPF. It stays on all day and has a nice matte finish! Easily one of my favorite foundations ever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product does not compare to other products that I have tried in the past.  The wear is long and not heavy, which is so nice to not feel like your wearing foundation.  A little goes a long way.  I will continue purchasing this product for my lifetime as it really works well and I can finally say I found the right one for me!  I will continue broadcasting this to everyone I know that I LOVE this foundation and the reasons why I do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely loved this product! I got it as a sample to test and the finish is amazing very nice coverage and I will be buying more once this runs out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this foundation, however it seems to sit on my skin rather than blend in.  The color was too light.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 455W - For medium-deep skin with warm/golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product ! It wasn't my exact shade but I still managed to make it work for me. Blends very smoothly

reviews.review_title: A new staple in my everyday lineup!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation for a week and absolutely love it! I have used Lancu00f4me in the past and previously found their formulas to be on the heavy side but not this one. It is the perfect lightweight everyday coverage that can be built up without looking cakey. It applies so evenly and smoothly I almost feel like I donu2019t even need setting powder.  I donu2019t feel like this shade is my exact color match, but I will continue to use it regardless and then try a slightly cooler shade on my next bottle. Try this one out! You wonu2019t be disappointed.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 505N - For deep skin with neutral/deep peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Lightweight and easy to apply. It has enough coverage to cover my post-acne spots and the coverage lasts all day even after I blot my t-zone.

reviews.review_title: Lightweight and matte but not heavy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good dupe for Pat McGrath Labs foundation super lightweight but good medium coverage and it lasts all day I honestly loved it and the color range is really good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved it! It blends beautifully and it light buildable coverage which I LOVE, I like the look without feeling like I have to much makeup on. Only 4 stars because the shade is more my summer shade and itu2019s fall but nothing a little concealer canu2019t fix.

reviews.review_title: Essential medium coverage light weight foundation!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used this product for the past few days and I love the medium coverage light weight feel. It blends beautifully and breathes well also.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i never wear foundation because i hate the way it feels on my skin as if itu2019s too heavy, i like this product though, it matches my shade perfectly and looks as if i donu2019t have anything on. the only thing is that it doesnu2019t work for every primer , and pills under my eyes. other than that- i like it a lot

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great choice for those who don't like the feeling of wearing a heavy, full coverage foundation. The finish is absolutely beautiful, very natural but helps keep my oil under control throughout the day. I work in a pace faced retail environment and tend to get really overheated. But surprisingly, this foundation hasn't separated and ended up looking like it's melting off of my face.  Overall, if you're an oily girl looking for a lightweight foundation with natural coverage would highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Let me begin this by saying that I am not normally a makeup person and I am very much not a foundation person. My skin is pretty decent and I don't like feeling like I'm wearing a mask. My regular go-to makeup look is nothing. Barring that mascara and concealer because I have very dark undereyes. Concealer, however, is hard to find because it cakes and doesn't cover that well but since I'm only really using it in one area (and rarely bother with makeup anyway) I never cared.  I received this product for free and I thought why not try it. I absolutely would not give an opinion that wasn't facts regardless of that because I am not generally a fan of incentivized (read: inflated) reviews, but y'all...I used this in place of my concealer and I look AMAZING. I'm 41 and I swear this took 10 years off my face. Undereye circles are covered perfectly, but more amazingly? You can't tell I'm wearing makeup. AT ALL. It is perfectly smooth and blended to look and feel like nothing. As a non-makeup person I cannot tell you how much I appreciate this! I will 100% wear this daily. I love it. I have never felt this way about a foundation before. All I've ever wanted was something that covers the dark circles and otherwise looks like I'm wearing nothing. Apparently that was too much to ask...until now.  The sunscreen is nice a bonus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Lancome Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation as a free product. I honestly have a new favorite foundation! reviews.review_text: First off, this foundation is really soft and silky on the skin. It blends so well that you would believe it was your natural skin. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have loved this foundation. Typically I like to switch up products but I havenu2019t since getting this foundation. It looks great all day & other products blend into it so well!

Great foundation! It's lightweight yet buildable. The color was a bit lighter than I expected, but it adapted to my skin after a while, which was a big plus. I also loved that it has a dry touch but isnu2019t completely matteu2014it looks very natural and doesnu2019t highlight my skin imperfections.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear 24H Foundation, I am impressed! This foundation truly delivered on its promises. As someone with oily combination skin, finding a foundation that lasts all day without transferring and fading can be quite the challenge, but this one nailed it.  First off, the coverage is flawless. I noticed how effortlessly it blended into my skin. A thin, pigmented fluid that is buildable without feeling heavy and never cakey. It offers a breathable feel while still providing excellent buildable coverage. It evened out my complexion beautifully, and I felt like it improved the overall appearance of my skin throughout the day. I was able to achieve a flawless look without it feeling heavy or cakey on my skin. Whether I wanted a light layer for everyday wear or a more polished finish for an evening out, it delivered beautifully.  One of the standout features for me is how well it held up throughout the day. With my oily combination skin, I often struggle to find foundations that last, but this one stayed put without transferring. I didnu2019t even need to set it with powder, which is a huge plus! It felt lightweight and comfortable, allowing my skin to breathe.  Another bonus is the SPF 25, giving me added protection without feeling greasy or overly drying. Overall, the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear 24H Foundation will become a staple in my makeup routine. If youu2019re looking for a long-lasting, breathable foundation that works well on oily skin, I highly recommend giving this a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is very thin when you put it on, truly offering a buildable coverage. It has broad spectrum SPF but doesn't feel sticky like some sunscreens. I live in a warm, humid climate but the matte finish on the foundation lasts all day! I'm so impressed that it keeps my skin from looking oily by the afternoon! A little bit goes a long way, so I expect that a bottle will last me several months, making it a great value as well.

reviews.review_text: I've been sleeping on Lancome for far too long! This liquid foundation made me rethink some of my favorite brands. This formula blows a lot of them out of the water. I couldn't ask for a better match. Aesthetically, the matte bottle is nice and makes you want to use it. Plus, ladies, they snuck SPF into it! reviews.review_title: A New Favorite for Everyday Wear
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've tested out many foundations over the years, and I have to say, the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear in shade 525W really blew me away. Compared to other high-end brands I've tried, this one strikes the perfect balance between full coverage and a natural finish. It feels light on the skin but still manages to give me that flawless look without feeling heavy or cakey.  Why I Love It:  - Long-lasting wear: It lasts all day, even when I'm running around after the kids. No need for touch-ups! - Perfect match: The shade 525W is a lovely warm tone that blends perfectly with my skin, which can be a struggle to find for deeper skin tones. - Non-greasy finish: I tend to get shiny throughout the day, but this foundation gives me a matte finish without drying out my skin.  Would I Buy It Again? Absolutely! It's now my top choice for both everyday wear and special occasions.  Would I Recommend It? Definitely. I've already shared my love for it with a few friends, and I'd recommend it to anyone in need of a long-lasting foundation that provides great coverage and feels comfortable.

Wore it the first time no powder for 10+ hours, pretty decent wear, slight caking and oil breakthrough.   Second day again wore for 10+ hours but applied with a brush and powder on top. Slightly better wear, still some caking and oil breakthrough.  Excellent foundation in my opinion.

reviews.review_text: The Lancu00f4me Paris Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation in shade 215C is exactly what I was seeking. After trying a full-coverage foundation that left me with painful welts, I was cautious. However, I intentionally didnu2019t wash my face after using the Lancu00f4me, and it not only avoided breaking me out but also left my skin looking flawless the next morning. While I always recommend cleansing, this product held up exceptionally well without causing irritation. The color match is perfect, and it balances my skin without excessive dryness or oiliness. Plus, it blends seamlessly with other products. Iu2019m truly impressed.

reviews.review_title: Matches My Skintone Perfectly! Iu2019ll buy again.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra in 130 C for about a week now. I absolutely love this tinted foundation sunscreen. 130C is the perfect match for me. I have combination skin that is prone to breakouts. The fact that this foundation is non-comedogenic, and non-acnegenic is a must for me. I use a lot of serums that can tend to leave me with a little more shine than I would like. The breathable matte finish is perfect for that. I can be a tad drying, but I do know that comes with a matte finish. I wish the SPF was higher than 25, but itu2019s better than none! Overall Iu2019m very happy with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using Lancu00f4meu2019s Teint Idole Ultra 24H foundation for a while, and the shade 510N is an absolute game-changer! Finding the right match for deep skin with neutral or peachy undertones can be a challenge, but this shade nails it. It blends effortlessly into my skin, giving a flawless, airbrushed finish. The coverage is full yet lightweight, never feeling cakey or heavy, and it easily covers any discoloration or imperfections.  The matte finish keeps my skin looking fresh throughout the day without any shine, and it holds up beautifully even in humid conditions. It truly lives up to the 24-hour wear claimu2014Iu2019ve worn it for long days, and it stays put without breaking down or transferring.  One of my favorite aspects is how comfortable it feels on the skin. It doesnu2019t dry out my skin or cling to any textured areas, which is perfect for anyone dealing with occasional breakouts or uneven skin texture.  Overall, if youu2019re looking for a long-lasting, high-performance foundation that delivers flawless coverage and a perfect shade match, I highly recommend the Teint Idole Ultra in 510N. Itu2019s a must-have for deep skin tones with neutral or peachy undertones!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've tested this for the past week to assess longevity across different activities and weather, and I'm honestly pretty impressed. I've gotten a solid 10 hours, and any additional is not bad, but just not perfect. But really, you need to do all sorts of work to make any foundation last that long. I have normal skin (but dry these days due to it getting colder). I do 2 pumps and apply 2 thin layers with a fluffy foundation brush, and going back in with a denser brush on areas that need more coverage. It sits SUPER naturally on my skin. I could probably go a shade darker if I didn't contour and blush. I'm a C4 at MAC and it's a perfect UNDERtone match. I don't know if I'll repurchase for $57, but we'll see. I can see this lasting for at least 4-6 months, with using it 3-4x a week. Also important to note, even though this is a silicone based foundation, I felt like it sat better with a water based primer. Meaning, when used with a primer that's more of that slippery feel, it pilled, but maybe I didn't wait long enough. I have had better experience WITHOUT any primer at all, just a regular moisturizer (again, wait til its fully dry). Just like with any other foundation, exfoliating and removing any dead/dry skin is key, especially for a matte foundation where it's going to more easily show the dryness.

I could see this as being too drying for those with dry skin, as the foundation is very mattifying. I found that a little bit really goes a long way, and the coverage is truly buildable. It gave me a sunkissed glow.  The bottle comes in a slender design which is great for holding. The pump works well no clogging and unscrews as well.  After the first application, I knew this would become one of my top loved foundations!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would recommend this foundation to anyone looking for something long lasting and comfortable. I donu2019t like to wear a lot of foundation, and this one felt really light on my skin. The formula evened out my skin tone, but still allowed my freckles to show through and look natural. Having sunscreen in the formula is also a plus! I could see this as being too drying for those with dry skin, as the foundation is very mattifying.   I found that a little bit really goes a long way, and the coverage is truly buildable. The product also dispenses neatly out of a little pump on the top.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want to preface this by saying I'm currently on a prescription acne cream (tretinoin), so my skin is peeling and breaking out (purging).  That being said- this foundation by Lancome surprised me by how much it covered. My face is very red due to rosacea, and to make this review fair I did NOT use any green concealer or powder. Just my usual primer as a base and the Lancome foundation.  I'm pretty pleased by how well the 130C fit my skintone. I don't feel like it washed me out or was too dark. Another plus is that it has SPF in it, which is a must have for fair skin like mine. It didn't completly cover my freckles and hyperpigmentation, but it seriously put in some work. I can definitely see the difference. It doesn't feel too heavy on my face, I feel like the final look could have been better overall had I used other products but again, I wanted to show you all how the product looks without compromising it with other products.  I included a before and after for you all, no filter, natural lighting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Lancu00f4me foundation in shade 225 N, and it pleasantly surprised me! I have combination skin, sometimes prone to dryness, with a neutral undertone. The shade matched perfectly u2014 not too light, not too dark, just right!  Before applying, I always use a moisturizer, and on well-hydrated skin, this foundation applies beautifully. It doesnu2019t highlight dry patches or flakiness, which is a big plus for me. The coverage is quite full, but it still looks natural on the skin u2014 no mask-like effect. As an experiment, I applied it on my hand over a brow pencil, and it covered it really well, showing great coverage power.  Another bonus u2014 the foundation doesnu2019t oxidize or turn yellow or orange throughout the day. I usually set it with a translucent powder, which helps it last longer. I wore it for about 10 hours, and during that time, it didnu2019t smudge or transfer onto my clothes or tissues.  I hope it doesnu2019t cause breakouts since my skin can sometimes react to new products, but so far, so good! The key is to properly moisturize your skin before applying, and the result will definitely please you. I highly recommend giving it a try!

reviews.review_text: Thank you to Lancome for the free product in exchange for this review. This foundation in 400W is a true medium with warm undertones that was a decent match for my tan skin. The consistency is runny but not watery or serum-like; it was easy to spread with my fingers, a dense brush or beauty sponge, depending on how much coverage I was looking for, which makes this more versatile than the other foundations in my collection. As someone with combination skin, I thought this wore OK on my dry areas but looked much better on my oily T-zone. I prefer a medium coverage foundation, and rely on concealer to deal with dark spots or blemishes, and it was easy to build this up without looking too heavy. Of course, powdering helped this foundation wear longer, but that meant having a really glam look that I would only ever wear when I want to look flawless in photos. I'd recommend this foundation to anyone looking for a foundation that works well on slightly oily skin, provides more than just sheer coverage (i.e., can be layered for a more flawless complexion) and wears solidly for about 6 hours before fading.
