reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this last year because the color matched perfectly and initially had some trouble with it, grew to love it and wanted to repurchase but noticed there was a formula change.    With the previous bottle, because it was very budge proof and once something successfully budged it it was impossible to blend back in. Once I got more comfortable with it this actually became what I liked most about it. With the previous formula I could apply just a little and it would stay all day and not break down. I didn't need to powder or prime, it was one step. It would even look better as time went on and my oils mixed with it. It was also the best color match I had ever found.  The new formula is beautiful on the skin right away on application. If I had tried it first before being used to the old formula I might have loved it. It's not budge proof and moves around a low-mid amount through the day. Isn't matte, more like a natural finish, so on my oily skin it doesn't look as good at the end of the day as the previous stuff. It probably needs powder but the previous bottle didn't. It also has a thinner consistency and is easier to apply then the previous formula. It also has more skin loving ingredients which I appreciate. However the new color is a shade darker than my previous bottle which was the most disappointing...   I like it, I'll use it up, but I probably won't repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin. I get really oily around the T zone, and Iu2019m an Estee Lauder double wear loyal girl but I heard great things about Lancu00f4me and honestly I got so excited especially after trying their concealer. Iu2019m extremely picky and nothing impresses me so I had lower expectations. I wore this foundation for a few days around 8 to 9 hours and all I can say itu2019s a wonderful formula with medium to full buildable coverage. I used it with the YSL primer and they worked really well together. The finish is natural not too matte and you definitely donu2019t feel something setting on your skin. I didnu2019t notice any emphasized texture or pores, but I had to use blotting sheets on my nose after a few hours of wear which is OK. However, this is not Transfer proof :( although I set it with powder and setting spray! So this is some thing Iu2019m not truly happy about, because when a foundation is not, Transfer proof it means that everything I apply on top of it is going to move around throughout the wear time.  I hope they improve this, for the meantime I will finish the bottle and I will go back to my Esther Lauder foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutly, positively, obsessed! It's soo hard for me to find a shade and when it comes to quizzes it's like, the color picked is always either like my same color or off, I know most of you are thinking duh.. that's the point to get the same exact color of your skin but that's NOT what I want, like I specifically prefer to look a bit tanner then I am, as it just looks, well, better.. it still matches my body as my face seems to be one of the lightest parts of my body as I try to keep it protected from getting burnt, also at 35 almost 35 almost 36 in July, I'm noticing a really HUGE and multiple diff. Changes with my skin... things I never thought or imagined or knew anything about and kind of still don't as far as like my forehead having started to well ill put it like this it looks like I went to the beach got burnt, pealed, some of the burn turned to tan and now my foreheads blotchy like 2 diff colors ud83dude1e I've been trying to figure it out & from what I've researched it's Hyperpigmentation  and normal for my age.. but this is one of the reasons I also look for a VERY ALIGHTLY tanner foundation.  And I cNt beleive I literally found it and SO EASILY! I love how it blends making all my skin perfectly one color which gives me so much confidence back, it doesn't crease in my fine lines like my forehead creases from make that face like excuse me???? (With sass) ud83dude09 you know those creases right above your nose the horizontal ones!! I KNOW I'm not thee only one with them. Anyhow, I digress I'm just so over joked that I found an AMAZING and buildable and comoletley perfect match my FIRST try, it lasts me all day unlike others I eaily sweat off when working or make creases this foundation is TOP TIER lightweight, not cakey, feels good on your skin, and literally gives you a totally new view on your day I put it on and can go from feeling like zero to hero real quick haha. Total confidence booster I highly highly recommend.

I found it works best without primers however I would be interested in trying it with a brand-specific primer to see how long it wears. reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Lancu00f4me foundation and I am absolutely delighted with the results. The coverage is light yet beautiful, providing a classy summer glow that feels both natural and radiant. With its buildable medium coverage, it allows for a flawless, healthy-looking complexion without feeling heavy or cakey.  I also love this foundationu2019s formula - SPF 27, with the hyaluronic and mandelic acids work to hydrate and smooth the skin. I also liked how long lasting it was too. The foundation gives my skin a natural-looking glow finish that is perfect for summer, making it my go-to choice for a fresh, radiant look.

reviews.review_title: Pairs nicely with the matching concealer!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free by BzzAgent in exchange for my honest review. I love the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole concealer and have been using it daily for a long time (reference shade is Buff N) so I was very excited to try this formula out and see how it wears with the matching concealer. This product has buildable coverage and despite being listed as a matte foundation, I found that I was able to manipulate the finish depending on how I prepped/set the face! I have combo skin but prefer to have a more natural finish so I was glad to see that it was breathable and not too drying. I can see where it could look heavy in some areas but on a positive note it does set down well. Worked well with my current routine and all my usual products layered nicely ontop. The shade I received (240W) is a little dark/yellow for me at the moment, but I am very excited to see it match better in the summer when my olive skintone deepens. I still prefer something a little more skin like and thinner but I will be reaching for this when I need my makeup to be locked in and not budge on hot days!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First time using this foundation and I was very impressed. First it blended very easily, i used a brush and also a beauty blender. My skin looked amazing! It gave me good coverage with one layer and dried almost matte. It lasted all day and worked well with a variety of different face products. The shade was perfect for my skin tone. The packaging looks luxurious,  its a must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation, and I am thrilled with the results. As someone with combination dry skin, finding a foundation that blends seamlessly and doesnu2019t emphasize dry patches can be quite a challenge. This foundation, however, blends like an absolute dream.  One of my biggest concerns with long-wear matte foundations is that they can often look cakey or cling to dry areas, but the Teint Idole Ultra exceeded my expectations. It provided a flawless finish without looking heavy or textured. My skin looked radiant and healthy, yet not overly shiny or greasy, which is a perfect balance for my combination skin.  The staying power of this foundation is also impressive. It lasted throughout the day without the need for touch-ups, maintaining its fresh, natural look. The coverage is buildable, allowing me to customize it to my needs, whether I want a more natural look or full coverage for a night out.  In summary, the Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation has quickly become a staple in my makeup routine. It offers a beautiful, blendable finish that doesn't compromise on comfort or longevity, making it a fantastic choice for anyone with combination dry skin. I highly recommend giving it a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a bit saddened by this product, because it wasn't anything spectacular. I'm approaching 40 and am that nice age where I still have few wrinkles but can feel makeup settling uncomfortably to make me look older. It's fairly sheer as a product and does take quite a bit to get moderate coverage. I have a few light sunspots and hormonal redness that took 2-3 layers to cover. Even with moisturizing prior, it caked around my nose. It didn't feel overly heavy but wasn't as lightweight as a BB cream, despite similar coverage. I will use it up but will be more for grocery shopping than date night.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 220C - For light skin with cool/pinky undertones

The finish is a nice comfort matte and it is extremely thing feeling. Itu2019s not my favorite right now but itu2019s a solid option when I need something long wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest review from Lancu00f4me and BzzAgent. I gotta say this stuff is really great. Lancu00f4me is a trusted beauty brand and they put years of research into creating makeup formulations. Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear is their newest matte foundation. It offers a 24hr wear time and although I didnu2019t wear it that long it, certainly lasted throughout my 12hr days of work and errands. I also liked that it was a natural matte that still allowed me to look like myself and not like a mask. One of my favorite things about this product is that it is buildable. I think one pump can be spread from the center of the face outwards for a tint-like effect and you can add extra pumps depending on coverage needs. This is perfect for the days you only want to hide some t-zone shine. Even with one pump I was able to diminish redness and some hyperpigmentation. A nice thing about Teint Idole Ultra Wear is the extensive shade range featuring deep and olive friendly shades. Marine blue allows for deeper shades while chromium green is used for olive tones. I use the shade 240W and would say it a pretty solid match. Sometimes I think it looks slightly pink, so I do wonder if Lancu00f4meu2019s u201cWu201d tones have some cool tones added but overall itu2019s a good match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LAMCOMe sent me this free sample through the BzzAgent sampling program to do a honest  review. Since the pandemic I have been looking to a ligth foundation to avoid the acne eruption;I  tried so many options of foundations even sunscreen with color ,but doesn't worked.But this product its amazing really amaizing. I have been trying the tone 305N and it's a very ligth formula with out oily sensation .I love the mate finish and the most beautiful thing is the skin care formula with SFP 25. I confirm that last 24 hours with a breathable coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

This is a nice quality product and I'd recommend giving it a try if you're looking for a natural, light, dewy finish.

Itu2019s not drying and also doesnu2019t make my skin break out. I like to apply it with a cosmetic sponge, it also applies well with a brush. Itu2019s competitively priced for comparable brands. I would recommend this and intend to make this my go to foundation. I love the pump bottle and the elegant design. I received this product at no cost to me in return for an honest review.

reviews.review_text: This is the first Lancu00f4me foundation that I have tried in quite some time. I am very pleased with it. I have normal-to-dry skins and at age 43, I am definitely seeing some early signs of aging. I do try to take good care of my skin, but I prefer full coverage to even out my skin and create flawless palette for the rest of my make-up. The problem with full coverage foundations, though, is that t emphasize  fine lines. This one does not! It gives great full coverage and doesnu2019t sink into my fine lines. It is a satin finish and is neither dewy nor a drying matte, which for me is perfect and I can use or skip a setting powder depending on how Iu2019m feeling. I really like it and will keep using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, so Iu2019ve been on the hunt for a foundation that can keep up with my busy lifestyle, and let me tell you, the Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation is a game-changer! First off, shade 415W is the perfect match for my skin tone. Itu2019s like this foundation was made for me!  Iu2019m all about that full-coverage life, but I hate feeling like Iu2019m wearing a mask. This foundation is lightweight and breathable, plus it has skincare goodies like hyaluronic acid and vitamin E, which is amazing because who doesnu2019t want a little extra hydration?  Now, letu2019s talk staying power u2013 this stuff lasts through my morning coffee, midday meetings, and even after-work yoga sessions. Itu2019s sweat-proof, humidity-resistant, and doesnu2019t budge, which means no more disappearing act by 3 PM.  And the finish? Gorgeous! Itu2019s matte but not flat, and it gives me that u2018I woke up like thisu2019 vibe. Plus, itu2019s buildable, so I can go from a natural daytime look to full glam for a night out with just a few extra dabs.  In short, if youu2019re a busy bee like me and need your makeup to work as hard as you do, Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation is your new BFF. Trust me, your skin will thank you!

reviews.review_text: I really love this foundation! This stuff really is transfer proof and sweat proof too. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a long-time Lancu00f4me user and devoted lover of your products, I wanted to take a moment to share my heartfelt review of the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation, shade 325C.   Having been a loyal user of Dual Finish Powder Foundation for many years, I was hesitant to switch to a liquid foundation. However, from the moment I tried the Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation, I was absolutely blown away. The lightweight yet full coverage formula allowed me to achieve a flawless and natural look that I had never experienced before.   One of the most impressive aspects of this foundation is its blend-ability and buildable coverage. It seamlessly blended into my skin, leaving it feeling nourished without any oily residue. Living in a humid climate, I was delighted to find that it effectively controlled oil and lasted all day long, keeping my skin looking fresh and radiant. I was particularly thrilled that the foundation did not settle into my fine lines, and instead, it provided a smooth and natural finish that enhanced my complexion. The confidence and comfort I felt wearing this foundation are unparalleled.   Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation has truly transformed my makeup routine, and I cannot imagine going back to powder foundation after experiencing the remarkable results of this product. Thank you for creating such an exceptional foundation that has become an essential part of my beauty regimen.

reviews.review_text: I was sent the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear foundation to test in exchange for my review. Iu2019ve been using it for just over a week now and I really like it. Itu2019s a surprisingly decent shade match, Iu2019m a fair warm olive and itu2019s really hard to find a match. Shade 095W works pretty well on me! Closer than most. Iu2019ve been using a lot of medium coverage, dewy skin tints lately and was a little skeptical of using a fuller coverage, matte foundation at my age. I was so pleasantly surprised! First of all, itu2019s not a flat matte. Itu2019s a pretty natural finish if you ask me, at least on my combo skin after my normal skin prep. It didnu2019t apply streaky with a brush or with a sponge and it didnu2019t settle in or accentuate my fine lines. It wore beautifully throughout the day and was still holding strong by the evening when I was ready to wash it off. It really is sweat-proof and it holds up under a mask as well. Iu2019m very impressed and will be repurchasing when I run out. Itu2019s nice to have a full coverage foundation in the rotation that looks nice on maturing skin and pairs well with my skincare. The attached photo is after 8+ hours of wear. I have had longer days and itu2019s also held up well. This one is a keeper!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start by saying, as someone who struggles to find the right foundation match for my deep skin, stumbling upon Lancu00f4me's Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation in shade 535N felt like hitting the jackpot. It's specifically designed for deep skin with neutral to deep peachy undertones, and let me tell you, it's been a total game-changer for me.  First things first, the coverage is fantastic. A little goes a long way u2013 it effortlessly hides any flaws, evens out my skin tone, and leaves me with a flawless finish. Even though it offers full coverage, it feels surprisingly weightless on my skin. No heavy or cakey feeling here!  What really blew me away is how long-lasting this foundation is. It truly lives up to its promise of staying put for hours on end. Whether I'm dealing with heat, humidity, or just a long day, this foundation keeps my skin looking fresh and matte without budging.  And let's talk about the shade. 535N is a dream for deep skin tones. The neutral to deep peachy undertones blend seamlessly with my complexion, giving me a natural yet enhanced look without any ashiness or orange tones. It's such a relief to find a shade that works so well with my skin tone.  When it comes to applying it, I prefer using a damp beauty sponge for that flawless, airbrushed finish. But it also blends like a dream with a brush or even just my fingertips, so you've got options depending on your preference.  Overall, Lancu00f4me's Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation in 535N has become my go-to foundation. Its amazing coverage, long-lasting matte finish, and perfect shade match make it a standout choice for anyone with deep skin tones. If you've been on the hunt for your holy grail foundation, look no further u2013 this one's a winner.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 350N - for medium olive skin with neutral/peachy undertones

reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review. The product itself has a great dewy finish (without looking u201csweatyu201d or oily), flawless blend and maintains coverage without feeling heavy on my face after wearing for several hours, like I have experienced with some over face products. Packaging is lovely and luxurious. The shade matching comparison images could use some improvement, even after reading the undertones and looking at the pictures, I still feel like the shade I selected was off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Foundation transfer is one of the most annoying things to me so I enjoy a long wearing formula, but am typically plagued with formulas that are super drying, look extremely thick and unnatural and are not comfortable to wear. That is definitely not the case with Teint Idole Ultra Wear. The coverage is light to medium and buildable without getting cakey. It wears beautiful and looks like a satin skin finish, which I prefer, with little to no transfer. I like to apply with a damp sponge for the most flattering effect. It did feel a little drying on the first few days I tried it, but my skin adjusted and I don't have that problem any longer (I have normal to slightly dry skin). I think the key is to get the correct shade and undertone for your skin and 220C was perfect for me.

Compared to others, its lightweight yet buildable formula provides flawless coverage without feeling heavy or cakey. The shade range is extensive, catering to various skin tones, and the 405W shade perfectly matches my complexion, giving a natural, radiant finish. What sets it apart is its long-lasting wear, staying put throughout the day without needing frequent touch-ups. While it's pricier than some alternatives, its quality justifies the investment for a flawless complexion that lasts. Overall, it's become a staple in my makeup routine, surpassing many other foundations I've tried.

reviews.review_text: I have used this product for 2 weeks now. I used my clean fingers to apply the product. I tried various combinations of different products with this foundation. Overall, I really like to coverage and texture of this product. It matches my skintone perfectly. It has lasting coverage. The finish is lovely. The only complaint that I have is that it separated on my nose. I tried it with various items from just on clean skin to my usual lotions to different primers in multiple combinations of those and it would always result in separation on my nose. So, to battle that, I just stopped applying it to my nose and applied my usual sun protection and blended everything. It gave a nice natural look by doing that. Overall, I really do love the product and I will continue to experiment with more products as a base to see if anything works to stop the separation.

The foundation came out great and did not break my skin out at all. Thankfully it had a skin like ending. I would highly recommend this for anyone that prefers a   Matte Finish!

reviews.review_title: A solid medium/full coverage matte foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Lancu00f4me sent me this free sample through the BzzAgent sampling program, and I'm very glad I've been able to add it to my collection. This foundation does what it sets out to do - it is a long wear, matte foundation, that lasts all day.   Pros: I like the way it blends with my other (mostly liquid) makeup. It applies well with a brush, and looks good even as the day goes on. It also doesn't have an unpleasant smell, so that's an added bonus.   Cons: It does stick to the dry parts of my face and pill with the dryness. But I would say that's to be expected of a matte foundation. I also think I probably could have gone with the pinkier undertone foundation for a better shade match.   Who I think this is best for: Neutral leaning warm skin tones, on the combo/oilier side

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 097N - for fair skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It was easy to blend, light weight, no scent and applied smoothly. The color was also a great match and a little bit goes a long way.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 305N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I couldu2019ve gone a shade darker, but I do like this foundation. It is very light weight, easy to blend, and buildable. Thank you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very excited to receive this product! Unfortunately, the color in the photos was very different from the color of the product when it came. The formula and consistency of the actual foundation is amazing. However, the shade is way too dark for me. I was able to use it as a liquid contour and that worked, very well. But, I would love to see how it wears on my whole face. I would definitely purchase another shade and test it out as a full face foundation because the overall product is actually very nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has become my new favorite and stable foundation. Admittedly, I am horrible when it comes to choosing a color match online. However, I used the foundation e-finder toolu2026and OMG! It is the perfect match! I have been wearing this for the last few weeks and have worn it for hours at a time. It provides beautiful coverage and it is buildable. It is not heavy and the foundation melts into my skin. I am also using a Lancome concealer and together they work perfectly to give me flawless, but natural looking skin. I have noticed that even with a setting spray, it does come off somewhat easilyu2026 But this is lessened if you use a little powder to set it versus a spray.   Also, Iu2019m not usually a matte girl, so I find that using my setting spray over the top of this gives me the small glow Iu2019m looking for.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 425C - For medium-deep skin with cool/rich-red undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This specific hue didn't quite match my skin tone but after a full day of wearing it my face did not feel dry at all and definitely retained hydration. Would definitely use again but probably go a shade darker.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After using this foundation for the past week, I have to say it lives up to its 24h wear test.  I have oily combination skin and it stayed in place all day w/o any touch upu2019s.  My oils did not shine through and the foundation gives my skin a nice and natural glow. It photographed very well and Iu2019d definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation feels so smooth as Iu2019m applying it and sits surprisingly well throughout the day. It smooths out my complexion and gives me an effortlessly flawless look that lasts all day. This has quickly become one of my favorite foundations and I particularly love how many different shades this line has. I received this product for free from BzzAgent in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is a great medium/full coverage foundation while still feeling light on the skin. There was a slight oxidation effect as it dried, but overall the color match was nearly perfect. I will be reaching for this again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this foundation for over 3 weeks now and it's the best I've ever seen. If you love beautiful, well-groomed, glowing skin without an incomprehensible yellow or pink tint, then this cream is for you. It moisturizes perfectly, the coverage is light and weightless, and at the same time it masks pigmentation well. The packaging is beautiful, high quality. looks expensive. I recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing foundation. I like that it is long wear and breathable with a matte finish. Also this foundation has a sunscreen which is good for sunny days. I used for several occasions such a birthday party and photoshoots and totally can recommend it! It is stays perfect and look good in pics. I like that it is feels good on skin and don't bother me during the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this foundation, the finish is gorgeous and Iu2019m so impressed by the match just going by the online swatched! I applied with a damp beauty blender and was happy with the coverage that gave but this foundation definitely is buildable. It felt pretty light and I love that it has spf! It lasted multiple hours of a night out and didnu2019t separate or start to look weird, Iu2019m very happy with it!

reviews.review_title: This is my new go to!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is by far the best I have ever used! I have fine lines and wrinkles which makes it hard to find a foundation. I hate when makeup makes those lines more noticeable and most of them do. This goes on so smooth and easy never caking. It is buildable as well so when you have a breakout it will cover it right up. I also have hot flashes the fun things that come with getting older. This makeup stays put! I break out in a sweat and this foundation doesnu2019t budge! I wasnu2019t sure what to expect when I tried this foundation out because so many say they do this and that but donu2019t. This foundation does all it says it can do and more! My new favorite! If you are on the fence about it then here is your sign to buy it!! You will love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm loving the results of this foundation. I have a hard time with foundation lasting on my T-Zone because it's oily compared to the rest of my face.  This formula seems to do the trick, it lasts and lasts.  I haven't tried it for a full 24 hours, but it lasts much longer than other brands I've tried.  It seemed a little harder to wash off (which is fine), but it also doesn't feel heavy on my face.  Considering it's a matte formula, it didn't make my skin feel dry

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 340W - For medium skin with warm/golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It blended in well with great coverage but light weight as well. Lasts all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this foundation. It stayed on for my entire labor and delivery, and that was rough. No transfer, skin stayed flawless for hours. The color match was perfect to my skin and my skin changes colors a lot. I recieved this foundation for free for exchange of a review

reviews.review_title: Wiped my hyperpigmentation away like MAGIC!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am thoroughly impressed are how well This product works! I am typically a drugstore/beauty supply makeup girl, and this is my first luxury foundation! The coverage is so amazing it deserves a full study! The match for my skin tone was absolutely perfect, and the weight was surprisingly super light! Ive found my new summer foundation! TT: BuyMeShenelle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I canu2019t say enough about this foundation. Ever since COVID, I scarcely wore foundation (mostly because of my mask). In the years that flew by, I got used to excluding it from my makeup routine and enjoyed the freedom of light and clean skin. But as Iu2019ve gotten older, itu2019s easier to see blemishes and dark spots and I find myself wanting a foundation again but not the thick coverage I used a couple years ago. THIS. FOUNDATION. IS. PERFECT. It feels like there is absolutely nothing on your skin, itu2019s opaque enough that it still allows your skin to maintain a natural look but itu2019s buildable if you want something a little heavier. Thereu2019s no strange smell that haunted my teenage years of heavy makeup. Itu2019s in a pump, so you can avoid as much exposure to bacteria and the air as possible. On top of that, I chose my color from a photo online and somehow it matched my skin tone perfectly. The value of this foundation is more than what they have it priced at and I canu2019t see myself using anything else while including foundation in my makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has a great, full coverage.  I have aging and sensitive skin that is dry but gets oily throughout the day.  I did not have a reaction to the makeup but I did feel like it made my dry skin and pores more noticeable.  When I used with a primer the makeup blended well and did not show my trouble areas as much.  I would recommend for days when you are wanting full coverage.

reviews.review_title: A new must have in my makeup case
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After several wears on long weekends, I can honestly say I absolutely love this foundation and it it definitely long wear. I put it yo the test being in the heat, rainy conditions,  and linger than 18 hour wears. It Tru lasted and I got so many compliments on how beautiful my makeup was. I have already told several ladies to go find their shade and purchase it. I am very happy with this foundation.

reviews.review_title: Great foundation for new makeup users
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great pigment and very easy to build. I am new to makeup and it was an easy foundation to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a holy grail foundation. Lancu00f4me is one of the first companies with an inclusive shade range. This is a buildable product and the finish is Devine. Iu2019ve worn this with and without powder.  I havenu2019t worn this over 10 hrs so I cannot speak on 24hr wear but at 10 hrs I only blotted once with combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so glad I had the opportunity to try this. I'm not a fan of most foundations. However, this doesn't even feel like you have any on. It is lightweight, buildable coverage, and it gives a smooth finish. It is definitely worth the price! My favorite part is it lasts all throughout my work day and I don't have to reapply.

reviews.review_title: Your makeup routine just got easier!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a bit skeptical on the color match but after the first application, I've fallen in love! Easy is the name of the game and this product makes your makeup routine so much easier! The coverage is amazing and buildable! It gives a natural finish that shows up well on camera and last all day long! I wore this to a wedding and my happy tears didn't ruin my glow! I love this product! Highly recommended!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 355N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not sold on this foundation. It's somewhat liquidity so it runs easily. It feels very good blending in, absorbs rather smoothly. I will say it dries up with a matte finish. The finished result is more of a dull ashy look. Not something I would purchase or recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancu00f4me TIU Refresh, Deep is a game-changer for tired, dull skin. This refreshing toner instantly revitalizes and hydrates, leaving my complexion feeling rejuvenated and alive. Infused with skin-loving ingredients, it effectively removes impurities while balancing the skin's pH levels, prepping it for the next steps in my skincare routine. What sets it apart is its deep-cleansing action, which unclogs pores and minimizes the appearance of pores, promoting a clearer, smoother complexion over time. With each use, I feel like I'm giving my skin a much-needed reset, making Lancu00f4me TIU Refresh, Deep an essential step in my skincare ritual.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This formula gives a nice my skin but better look. Very natural, although the coverage could be a little better. I don't like to cake on my foundation, but I will add some more in my areas where there is scarring or discoloration. It seems I have to add more than I would like to even out those areas (for photos, events, going out etc) but for everyday this foundation is great. Color match is perfect, normally I am matched with shades that read too yellow or wash me out. I love how natural it looks on me, like I'm not wearing any foundation at all!

reviews.review_title: The perfect foundation for all day wear
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a busy mom with 4 kids who also works a 9-5 so I needed a foundation that would last through my work day and also all of the extracurricular activities my kids are involved with after my work day. This foundation did that for me. It looks natural on the skin, feels lightweight and gives me the perfect base to apply blush, highlighter, and concealer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t wear foundation on a regular basis but this one worked out for me. The shade was a bit lighter than what Iu2019m used to but I found it to be buildable which worked out in my favor. Sunscreen is always a plus when purchasing foundation. I only purchase items with lowtox ingredients and from what I see, it doesnu2019t meet my standards. I will continue to wear it, just not as often as my cleaner foundations.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation applies really well and gives me a smooth and even finish. It doesnu2019t appear too matte either, which I really like. I have oily skin and it lasts all day long with only minimal oil showing through. I looked more dewy than oily which was a pleasant surprise. I would say itu2019s a medium coverage as my freckles showed through but it covered my uneven skin tone and redness perfectly. This foundation had been my favorite so far and I highly recommend! I received this foundation free in return for my honest review. This does not change my opinion on the foundation and I genuinely love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this foundation. It was light weight and it did last. The only thing I have an issue is the scent but overall it was good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product for a few weeks and I have mixed feelings about it . The texture was amazing and had great coverage . It doesnu2019t have a harsh smell, which I loved . You can also build up the coverage. What I didnu2019t like is itu2019s too dark for me , starts out a great shade and after a hour itu2019s a total different color. Overall itu2019s easy to apply and lasts for hours . I would recommend trying on the makeup to get your perfect match .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the flawless look! Itu2019s so light and easy to blend. It also has a SPF 25 which is a great addition to the sunblock I already put on my face. The packaging is also divine. Such a nice glass bottle with a pump so you donu2019t waist any product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really enjoy this foundation! Not super heavy but great coverage

reviews.review_title: Try and you wonu2019t be disappointed!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for a few now and the results are amazing. The coverage is perfect for my imperfections. I also work long days and it last very long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest feedback. I have the concealer by Lancome and have been interested in trying out the other products from the tent idols line. When I first dispensed the product I was worried it was a little dark, but it spread so nicely and immediately began to blend. I like that it really gave my skin a smooth appearance and minimized pores. It was so lightweight and breathable. I enjoyed that my skin never felt dry or cakey.  I also appreciate the spf since I am a soccer mom who wants makeup that can hold up to the weather without leaving me feel like my skin cannot breathe. I absolutely will be buying when I run out.

reviews.review_title: amazing full coverage + long lasting foundation!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: while this isnt my shade and having receiving this product for free - i've been using this foundation on my clients and the wear on it is incredible. coverage is amazing + lightweight. it also has the perfect undertone for deeper complexions, especially it being a peachy undertone. works amzing with different types of powders + concealers ( nars + dior concealers specifically).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful foundation with a very natural skin like finish. It gives a beautiful natural but buildable coverage and I love the skincare benifits all Lancome products have infused into them! This is my go to foundation now for glamorous skin which looks flawless and has great coverage.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 135N - For fair to light skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lightweight formula and medium coverage which i love! paired well with my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all thank you so much Lancu00f4me for the free product to try out! The Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation is truly a game-changer! As someone who's tried countless foundations, this one stands out like a diamond in a sea of stones. Its lightweight feel belies its incredible coverage u2013 it flawlessly conceals imperfections while letting your natural radiance shine through. Plus, it lasts all day without budging, keeping you looking fresh from morning coffee to midnight cocktails. Say goodbye to touch-ups and hello to confidence! Trust me, this foundation is the ultimate secret weapon for a flawless complexion!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 320C - For medium skin with cool/rosy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the way this applies, very silky, buildable and didnu2019t break me out at all. My only reason to not give 5 stars was I felt like it oxidized on my skin after about 4 hours and was looking more orange. If you have a more warm complexion this might be perfect but I am on the cooler side. Besides to color change, the wear was still super nice after 8 hours.   This product was sent to me for free in exchange for a review!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm impressed with the lightweight coverage and long lasting wear of this foundation. I have worn it for multiple days full of travel and even when getting off the plane at 11 pm my foundation still looks great. The shade is a good match that looks natural. I've been using another brand for a while, it had good coverage but it felt too heavy. The Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation has good coverage that corrects my uneven skin tone with red spots and occasional blemishes and it feels lightweight. Thanks Lancu00f4me for sending this product to test. It's my new favorite foundation.

reviews.review_title: New staple in my daily routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used this product several times since receiving it, and I absolutely love it! It gives a nice, light coverage if youu2019re wanting to wear it by itself. If you plan to use it as a base layer, other makeup layers well on top of it. Overall, Iu2019m very pleased with it. Iu2019ve been looking for an SPF to use. This is now a staple piece for my morning makeup routine!

reviews.review_title: yu2019all chewed but yall can eat! (undertones)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: let me start by saying i am darkskin with a pretty neutral/golden/ even some olive to be honest. it is not easy for me to find a perfect match or not have to troubleshoot to make a foundation work. this is one of the closest match to undertones although i do wish it was a lil more neutral/ olive.  the feeling of it is light medium and pretty good  coverage. i have tons of discoloration and hyperpigmentation so what tends to be full coverage for others is most likely medium buildable on me. i do find it more lightweight weight to u201cspot concealu201d with the foundation first then a wait a little before doing a whole layer of foundation. although i did receive this for free in exchange for a review everything im saying are my genuinely thoughts. again that tip still helps you waste less product and not put too much where u donu2019t need it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the formula of this foundation! It has buildable coverage and blends beautifully. Itu2019s lightweight and does not make my face look cakey but still provides nice coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for a week, I must say the drugstore foundations stand no chance. You can definitely tell the difference in quality. My makeup lasted all day and only required a quick powder retouch. It was hydrating, but not oily. Layered well with my skincare products. Also a great color match. I also love the extra layer of SPF protection.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 400W - for medium-deep olive skin with warm/golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Doesn't look cakey and doesn't rub off onto clothing that easy. However with combo skin type it somehow emphasises the dry patches. This product was received in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pleasantly surprised by this foundation. I usually find that most foundations that donu2019t highlight my pores and texture donu2019t provide enough coverage for my natural redness. This foundation provides a buildable level of coverage without sticking to my dry patches and texture, especially around my nose. With primer and a setting spray it also lasted all day, through some heavy humidity-induced sweating too. It feels relatively lightweight, blends easily, and has wore beautifully. Not to mention this has been my best color match Iu2019ve found. I think it will be my new go-to foundation. Received this product for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is actually phenomenal. I did a trial run of this product going to work this weekend. I work in retail so weekends tend to be hectic.  Thereu2019s lots of running around & not to mention the bright lights everywhere. The claim is that it works for up to 24hrs but I didnu2019t wear mine that long (close to 8 hrs though). It held up really well throughout both my long shifts. I have combo skin (more on the oily side ) and my makeup looked still looked sooooooo good. Full coverage without the cake face. It plays well with other products from different brands as well. The first day I used my Lancu00f4me concealer and the second I used my go to which is my NARS concealer. Love that itu2019s soft matte because usually matte foundations on me make me look so dry even though Iu2019m oily ( idk very weird ). All in all I love this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In trying out the product Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation by Lancome, my view was mainly positive. It felt very light on my skin. It absorbed right away on the top layer of my skin and stayed on practically all day. It was ok with being able to layer the foundation in spots that needed it, but don't expect extremely full coverage like some other brands. In conclusion, I believe that this would be a great option for someone who doesn't want a cakey feeling face also providing even coverage when spread out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome teint idole ultra wear foundation   This foundation has a sunscreen of spf 25 and claims to be a breathable coverage foundation that will last up to 24 hours. Though this could was about 2 shades lighter than me, I was able to blend jt in with my other foundation.  The color 405 is more on the peachy /orange side. I think the coverage is beautiful and I'm sure in my full color. It would look even more beautiful without mixing it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised at how well Lancome Teint Idole Ultra Long Wear foundation performed (even though I should have chosen a darker shade my fault)!! It felt so natural on my face like I was wearing nothing at all. It stayed on all day long, even overnight (yes I know I shouldn't but I was testing to give a detailed review). The only time it came off a little was around my nose when I had to blow it. It also did not run into my lines & wrinkles, it stayed put even through sweating! It's definitely worth the cash it costs and performs better than any other foundation I've used to date and I've used some good brands. It also stayed on through sweating, too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had the opportunity to try this product for the past month.  It goes on so smoothly and easily.  It blends nicely and a little good a long way.  I have not had any issues, such as, clogged pores from using it all day. The best part about this product is the SPF25!! I NO LONGER need to use a separate moisturizer with spf unless I want to.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 310N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this foundation applies on your skin. It is medium to full coverage. It was very hydrating. I wore it for a very long night with lots of dancing and sweat but the makeup didnu2019t budge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this foundation over few weeks, I have feel my dry skin hydrated,  bright, and more soft. I am feeling more comfortable and confident using this foundation. My consideration about it is a very good quality, really recognized brand, and I not doubt recommend it.  Thank you for the opportunity to learn more about this great foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Things I liked about this product:  It is truly long wearing, not just a claim. It did not transfer once set,  I like that it includes a sunscreen and a pump to avoid cross contamination.  As much as I wanted to like the foundation however, I could only get good results from it if I didn't prep my skin.  I use Tretinoin, niacinamide and a moisturizer, not sure which product it didn't get along with, but every time I used after my skincare the product would pill and didn't set the way it would without skincare.  I like the product and would reach for it on special occasions but it doesn't work for my everyday.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, I am in love with this foundation! It goes on super smooth and has just the perfect coverage. I teach Pilates all day, and even after all day at work and working out, it stays on and isn't greasy like some other foundations I've tried in the past. I absolutely recommend it!  Thank you SO much to Lancome for sending me this free Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation.  I've been using it for the last few weeks, and it's my favorite!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you to bzzagent For the complimentary sample. I am surprisingly pleased with this foundation, I am not the best at shade picking, but I feel like this was a pretty good match. It was definitely buildable coverage, but I did a light layer and it just made everything smooth And even. I'm not quite sure if it was the powder or the foundation itself that oxidized, but I did notice overtime a shade change and I have oily skin and it definitely show to surrealu. However, the foundation itself didn't separate which I was pleased with. I'll experiment more with it, but I will definitely keep using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love a Fuller coverage foundation that doesnu2019t make me look cakey, and this foundation is definitely that for me. It blends super easily and is a part of my every day routine!

reviews.review_title: Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation is a highly raved about foundation that promises a matte, long-lasting finish. Here's a PERSONAL review of its performance:  **Pros:**  * **Matte finish:** The foundation delivers a true matte finish that controls oil and shine throughout the day. * **Long-wearing:** It lives up to its claim of lasting for up to 24 hours. The coverage remains consistent and intact without fading or smudging. * **High coverage:** The foundation provides medium to full coverage, effectively concealing blemishes, redness, and imperfections. * **Lightweight and comfortable:** Despite its high coverage, the formula is surprisingly lightweight and comfortable to wear all day. * **Wide shade range:** Lancu00f4me offers a wide range of shades to cater to various skin tones.  **Cons:**  * **Can accentuate dry patches:** The matte finish can emphasize dry or flaky areas of the skin. Moisturizing the skin well before application is essential. * **Not suitable for all skin types:** The matte finish may not be suitable for those with very dry or sensitive skin. * **Settles into fine lines:** Over time, the foundation can settle into fine lines or wrinkles, especially for older skin. * **Limited refill options:** Repurchase can be costly compared to some other foundations that offer refill pods or accessories.  **Overall Impression:**  The Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation is a reliable and high-performing foundation for those seeking a matte, long-lasting finish. While it may require careful application to avoid accentuating dry patches, its exceptional coverage and durability make it a worthy investment for special occasions or everyday wear. If you have dry or sensitive skin, you may want to consider other foundation options or use a hydrating primer underneath to ensure comfort and prevent dryness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is nice I wore a little less of the other product so I can get a good feel of this for the first time wearing it.  My skin was hydrated very smooth and natural no cake up. Towards the end of my 8th hour day I felt like it still did it's Job. You don't need to apply to much at a time as it spreads a long way. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wesr Matte Foundation, I can say that I am shook. This foundation absolutely went on smooth and it's full coverage. It looked so natural and effortless. I love it. Easy 10/10 I would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After receiving a new product for free, I became very excited to try it out. Compared to other foundations Iu2019ve tried, the Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation stands out for several reasons. First, its long-lasting formula ensures that it stays put throughout the day, even during sweaty or grueling moments. The foundation provides a soft matte finish that eliminates shine without feeling heavy or cakey. Unlike others, its added nourishments like hyaluronic acid and vitamin E, makes the foundation feel comfortable and keeps your skin hydrated throughout the day. Overall, itu2019s definitely worth considering if youu2019re looking for a reliable, long-wear foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been looking for a matte foundation for summer to avoid looking too shiny in the warmer, more humid summer weather. I love this foundation! I am in my early 50s, with typical skin issues such as fine lines and hyperpigmentation. This is medium to full coverage foundation that is matte but not u201cflatu201d. It stays in place all day and looks as good at end of day. Iu2019ve worn both with and without primer with similar results. I have had success with other popular brands (Haus labs, Estee Lauder) and this is an equally beautiful finish (with the added benefit of sunscreen). In addition, there are many shade variations to choose from and I found the perfect match for my skin tone. Definitely worth a try. Lancu00f4me has been making amazing makeup for years  .and this one is a winner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've only used this product a few times but I already love it. It blended in very well with my skin complexion, has a creamy matte finish, and had beautiful looking results overall. I'm glad that I got the chance to try out and keep this great  product as a free sample.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually really liked this foundation, I have oily skin so finding a matte foundation that doesn't make you too matte is hard to come by. This foundation felt lightweight and easy to blend. It feels good on the skin. I did get this product for free in exchange for a review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome graciously provided me with this product as a complimentary sample for review purposes, and I must say, I've fallen head over heels for the Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation! Initially, I was taken aback by the thinner consistency compared to my usual choices, but any skepticism dissolved upon application. This foundation is truly amazing. I've worn it as a foundation is intended to be worn (full face) and on days when I didn't want to wear full makeup, I used the product for spot coverage only. I always use a foundation blender brush for application. The Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation truly feels tailor-made for me, offering impeccable coverage without the heavy, cakey feeling often associated with long-wear foundations.  The color is a perfect match for my skin tone. I had been skeptical about this, as well, because I always have a difficult time finding a foundation that's just right.  They often make me look either too orange or too pale. Again, not this one!  It is PERFECT. It's a match made in heaven for me.  While it may come at a slightly higher price point than what I typically budget for foundation, a little goes a long way, making it a worthwhile investment in my beauty arsenal. Trust me, this foundation is not just a product u2013 it's a game-changer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin

I have not experienced any breakouts or reactions and like the look this provides me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has become my new holy grail!! I have combo (mostly oil) skin and full coverage foundation is my preference as I have acne scars and hyperpigmentation to cover up. I was previously using a competitor's long wear full coverage foundation (EL) but this foundation has quickly taken its place! This foundation is SO lightweight while being full coverage and without being cakey, which is hard to find in a full coverage foundation. This has lasted 10+ hours on my skin with minimal touchup throughout the day. It does not settle in to fine lines or break apart, which most foundations on me do. The shade range is excellent and I was very easily able to find my shade (love the olive undertone representation!!). If you're looking for a foundation to cover everything and that will last you from day to night, this is the one!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was glad to find this full coverage foundation didnu2019t feel suffocating on my skin like some others but still had great coverage.  I was lucky to pick a shade that worked for me without testing it (fair but can wear neutral or pink undertones).  So far has layered well with my finishing powders and other products I use.  Havenu2019t been through a full sweaty summer day with it but I have high hopes ud83dudc4d

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Foundation and I must say, it exceeded my expectations in every way! This foundation has quickly become my go-to for achieving a flawless complexion.   Firstly, the coverage is incredible. With just a small amount, it effortlessly camouflages any blemishes, redness, or discoloration on my skin. It provides a medium to full coverage that is buildable, allowing me to customize the level of coverage I desire.   What I love most about this foundation is its lightweight formula. It feels like a second skin and doesn't weigh down my face at all. It blends seamlessly and evenly, giving me a natural-looking finish that doesn't look heavy or cakey.   Another standout feature is its long-lasting power. The Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Foundation stays put all day, even in hot and humid weather. I never have to worry about it melting off or fading throughout the day. It keeps my skin looking fresh and matte, without the need for constant touch-ups.  Overall, I highly recommend the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Foundation to anyone who wants a high-quality foundation that provides excellent coverage, a natural finish, and long-lasting wear. It's a true game-changer in the world of foundations, and I can't imagine my makeup routine without it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I struggle with finding a foundation that doesn't separate or dry out in an hour or so. This foundation applied like a dream. It was a little dark and orange for me, so I added some white and blue pigment, hoping it wouldn't impact the foundations chemistry. It did not. It matched beautifully and was easy to apply with a beauty blender. It took just a few minutes. I contoured, bronzed and blushed. Using this everyday with different primers and products and it stood through the changes. My skin looked filtered and smooth. I was thrilled with the results and the wear time as it lasted all day to my surprise. It doesn't feel heavy on the skin, honestly it does not feel like you're wearing anything. It blends great and works with any product I have added whether underpainting or layering on top. I love the glass bottle and the push top dispenser as it makes a clean and easy application. I would definitely purchase this again in the future. I am eager to pair it with the Lancome concealer. Truly a beautiful finish of matte, where it is not drying, it does not look dry and is exactly what I have been looking for in a foundation. I have mature skin, well starting to have mature skin in my 30s and have been pleasantly surprised with this.

reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite foundation. The matte finish doesn't look overly cakey, dry, or flaky. I have oily, acne prone skin and this product covered everything! It lasted all day with minimal separation and I just needed to pat some powder in my T zone to get it looking back to flawless. I also have light to medium olive/neutral undertones and shade 354N was absolutely perfect. This is a new staple for me in my makeup rotation. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the most perfect everyday foundation! This is super lightweight and has buildable coverage. Works great on top of primers, and stays matte all day long! Perfect for my acne-prone skin- no breakouts and covers any redness I have! Would definitely spend my money on another bottle when this runs out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this produce over the last few days and truly love the results. Lightweight and long-lasting...great for a flawless everyday look. I am not one who likes to look made up so I always go for a natural finish and this product did not disappoint.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 240W - For light to medium skin with warm/yellow undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked how smoothing this foundation is. It blurred my pores and kept my oil down throughout the day. I did feel like it oxidized throughout the day but perhaps that is from the powder im using. Would buy again but a shade lighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this product every day since I got it, the coverage is flawless and actually lasts all day! The fact that it has spf I donu2019t have to worry about applying spf before the foundation. Perfect color match also. I do feel like the finish is more matte than dewy so depending on your preference. I would definitely recommend this product for all day foundation coverage!

reviews.review_title: Perfect if you have oily skin!
reviews.review_text: I do really like this foundation, itu2019s full coverage which I donu2019t mind, but for me personally I prefer something a little more sheer. Itu2019s matte which is great for oily skin during the hotter months. The only reason Iu2019m taking off a star is because it oxidized to a darker shade and didnu2019t really match me. Other than that, itu2019s a great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: great quality, coverage and texture!  i have received mine for free to test from BzzAgent and i feel so lucky! what a great foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with warm undertones, finding the perfect match can be challenging, but 335W is an impeccable match that blends seamlessly into my skin. The formula provides impeccable coverage that lasts all day without feeling heavy or cakey. It effortlessly conceals imperfections, evens out my skin tone, and leaves me with a natural, radiant finish that looks like skin, only better. Plus, its long-wearing formula means I can trust it to stay put through long days and nights without needing touch-ups.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So upset that I did not get the correct shade, I selected a shade a little too light, but I did love it. In bad lighting you couldn't tell and it  actually looks really good. I know for sure if I had my shade it would be that perfectly natural like coverage. Super easy, build and lightweight. I received this item for free in exchange for my review, but I will definitely go out and buy my correct shade to get the full effect. I am convinced it will do what it needs to do!

reviews.review_title: Full coverage foundation with SPF? Yes, please!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for a full coverage product that also protects your skin from the sun, this is it!! It covered blemishes, as well as, made my skin feel soft. I would definitely buy this foundation again! My friends and family are definitely going to hear about this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation went in smooth like butter. It was a perfect match, doesnu2019t feel heavy, and you can build if you need more coverage. Iu2019ve seen the girls rave about this foundation and I didnu2019t really get it but after trying it I understand the hype. This is now a foundation that Iu2019ll add to my top 5.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is perfect. Totally buildable and goes on so easily. It melts into your skin. The only thing that didnu2019t work for me is the color. Itu2019s hard choosing a color from an online swatch. I always see a color and think itu2019s me but itu2019s lighter than my skin almost every time but thatu2019s a personal problem. Iu2019m wondering if itu2019ll turn darker once it oxidizes a little bit. I would buy this foundation again. I like how light it feels even when building the coverage.

reviews.review_title: A Contender for a Everyday Foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This Lancome foundation is good, it felt great going on my skin. It gives good coverage and is easily buildable. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this foundation as a gift and havenu2019t put it down ever since I got it. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin

I realized through trying this foundation, that I don't need the heavy full coverage. It was making me look older. This looks so natural, but the best version of natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation. It's so light weight!! I was nervous at first because I don't usually go for Matte but it gave my skin the most amazing finish EVER!!!!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 225N - For light skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using this for a few days, I really like the results I am getting.  At first I was a bit unsure I'd like it... it was, I thought, to light. It was not heavy or greasy which was a huge perk. I don't normally wear sunscreen because of the greasy feeling it leaves on my skin, so this has been a huge hit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really this foundation even though I donu2019t typically wear foundation. Iu2019m not used to the full coverage look on myself but I feel like it wasnu2019t too heavy but provided coverage on blemishes.

reviews.review_title: light and buildable; would use again!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised with this foundation. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin that likes to get random dry flaky patches. So I need a foundation that not only will stay on and put throughout the day, but wonu2019t cling and accentuate any flaky patches. Itu2019s not an easy task! This one did it though! It blends like a dream, didnu2019t cling or show off my flakes. It matched my skin perfectly. Didnu2019t settle or crease. I only needed to blot once or twice throughout the day. Which is the norm for me, sometimes more with other foundations. The foundation stayed in place even with blotting! It didnu2019t oxidize or change color. I am so happy I found this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the shade 310N which unfortunately was too orange for my skin tone. I feel i can make this work if i incorporate a lighter shade with it. The foundation itself is nice, blends out easily and doesn't make my skin look patchy or dry. It also doesn't leave a super oily cast but does need powder to set it. I love the glass bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been loving this foundation. I have had such a hard time finding a foundation that is light enough for my skin tone, while also not oxidizing. This leaves my skin looking flawless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it so much. i have never used foundation before because it's always cakey and looks weird. this was a perfect match using the sephora matching online and the consistency is so perfect! provides great coverage but feels lightweight. Btw iu2019m wearing shade 415W and itu2019s perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay I think I found my new foundationu2026.im really loving this product. Not only was the color a perfect match, it goes on so thin and the coverage is amazing. Doesn't look cakey either. It's leaves my face looking super natural and flawless. I love it!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 510N - For deep skin with neutral/deep peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Seemed to last all day. Its light feeling. Would recommend to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this foundation is amazing. It feels good on the skin not too heavy and it covers all my pigmentation and acne marks this really is full coverage and buildable. I think I found my new foundation from now on. I loved it a lot really really really recommend it. I love that there is a variety of colors to match your skin. Perfect match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancu00f4me's Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation in shade 225N is a game-changer for those with light skin tones boasting neutral to peachy undertones. This foundation delivers on its promise of long wear, providing a matte finish that stays flawless throughout the day. The lightweight formula feels comfortable on the skin while offering buildable coverage, allowing you to achieve your desired level of perfection without feeling heavy or cakey. With its impressive staying power and ability to control shine, it's a must-have for anyone seeking a reliable foundation for all-day wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation for about a week. It has become a fast regular addition to my daily routine. The color match is perfect and I prefer light to medium coverage so I donu2019t have to use much to achieve my desired effect. Iu2019m lazy so I use my fingers and it goes on very smoothly. reviews.review_title: Just OK- not a favorite or must have

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely obsessed and highly recommend Lancu00f4me teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation this is the most amazing as well long lasting foundation in which I have used in a long time I am obsessed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Pros Lightweight foundation and feels great on my skin. Goes on smooth, doesnu2019t cake, and lasts all day. Color is a perfect match and can be used year round. Contains SPF 25 without feeling like a heavy sunscreen.   Cons Slightly more transparent than i normally wear. I prefer a medium coverage foundation. I will need to use this as a base and build with my CC cream to fully cover redness and blemishes.   Overall, a great choice if you are looking for a natural looking, lighter weight foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this foundation. It was a perfect match for my skin and it was a medium coverage but very buildable. It left a satiny finish that did not leave my skin feeling dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Goes on smooth and no crease or any cakeyness at all. I use my beauty blender to apply and I can skip the primer. Skin looks glowing and I put my friend on this foundation too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this foundation for the past week I have noticed it leaves my foundation flawless unlike my old foundation. It doesn't clump and it matched my skin tone perfectly. Another good thing about it is that it's buildable. I fell inlove with this foundation. Thanks bzz agent for the free sample, I'll be buying one for my mom for mother's day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite foundation. It applies so nicely and blends easily,  I tried with both a make sponge and my fingers, and both methods worked beautifully . I love the way it melts on the skin and its uniformity. I had no problems  with it so far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this foundation for the past week, I have to say itu2019s quickly become a new fave.
