Love that it also provides UV protection without making me look shiny or oily like some other foundations with SPF do. Just a healthy & radiant look!! This will def be my go-to for the summer months :)  *this product was gifted to me by BzzAgent in exchange for an honest review*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this long lasting foundation. It provides a good full day coverage for my uneven skin tone without feeling heavy and sticky. The Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation, 110C match my skin tone perfect. My skin looks natural and smooth. It fits well with my combination skin type. I recommend this product.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 110C - For fair skin with cool/pinky undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the only foundations that's ever worked for my oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for a few weeks now and overall I'm quite happy with it under certain conditions. For starters it is VERY yellow, more yellow than you expect and it was for me even though I am very pale with warm tones. So definitely shade match! Secondly I struggled to layer it over moisturiser and/or SPF without the foundation pilling which is super unfortunate as I view moisturiser and SPF as a must under makeup. With that being said I would probably use this for nightouts or mix it with some moisturiser to help with the pilling.  The good thing about this foundation is that without the pilling it goes on very nicely and blends with my other products so well (liquid blush, highlighter, cream contour stick) for a really put together and dewy makeup look. It's also decently long lasting and I feel like this is good for 8 hours of wear before it starts to break down.  I want to emphasize again that it does leave the skin looking nice when applied correctly.  I'd give this a 4/5 as it is very dependent on the application. If you are interested in the foundation I can't stress enough how important it is to go for a shade match and also test the product as apparently the formula changed a year ago!  I received this product for free in exchange for writing a review, just as a full disclosure! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! I typically use a CC cream; however, this foundation is lightweight yet provides great coverage. I would say it's a medium/full coverage and is certainly buildable. It covers any redness and stays put all day! I loved how easy it was to blend and really smoothed out my skin and kept my face looking flawless all day. On certain days I did pair it with my Milk primer, however even the days I didn't, it still went on easy and lasted all day. I am definitely a fan of this.

reviews.review_title: Light weight, blend well, match skin tone

I received this for free in exchange for an honest review

reviews.review_title: Definitely adding for my summer routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is so good! The only reason why itu2019s missing a star itu2019s on me because I picked a shade a bit darker than my skin tone. The coverage was immaculate nonetheless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 095W - for fair skin with warm/yellow undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging of this foundation is very nice and the foundation itself does not have a scent. I found the foundation to be ok but not something Iu2019ll reach for as my primary choice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using the product for a week Iu2019m loving the results. It blends beautifully to my skin. Itu2019s lightweight and covers beautifully. Highly recommend, my current favorite foundation. Loving it!

reviews.review_title: IT IS A LONG LASTING FOUNDATION
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It is a great product, suitable for many skin types. Personally, I feel like it will save me time applying sunscreen because the cream's ingredients are already there. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love a Lancu00f4me foundation! The formula is sheer-ish but really silky and buildable. It's perfect for an everyday Sumer foundation especially as an oily girl myself AND since it's getting warmer out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is buildable and goes on smoothly. It has good coverage  and doesnu2019t feel heavy on my skin. It lasted me the entire day outside without cracking or melting off.

reviews.review_title: The Teint I Canu2019t Go Without!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 345N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 090N - for fair skin with neutral/pinky undertones

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great foundation. It blends really well and it's nice and light. Last all day and doesn't run. My daughter was super pleased with it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin

It did start to get thick and crack a bit when I got it to a full coverage, but that may have been due to using more because the shade was wrong. I will definitely be trying my correct shade!   I love that it is a sunscreen and foundation because I like to use different moisturizer and they don't all have SPF so this will have you covered!   Even being an extended wear and not transferring after it was set on my face, it still washed off without issues. I used my mild cleanser and didn't have to go back and reclean spots that I didn't scrub.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

I also LOVE that thereu2019s sunscreen in it because again, late 30u2019s girlies donu2019t mess around with sun. Itu2019s a great multitasker. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

By the end of the night I expected to see some creasing and blemishes poking through but that wasn't the case! If I was getting married, this would be my go-to. Until then, I will reach for this each Friday + Saturday night when clubbing ;)

reviews.review_title: A must have in my daily routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product! It goes on super smooth and is so light on with the perfect blending with my skintone. Definitely would buy this for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is so beautiful itu2019s seamless on the skin and its buildable without the cakeyness. No needfor powder it looks amazing without it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing foundation! It is lightweight but still gives you a good amount coverage. It doesnu2019t transfer as well which always annoys me with foundation. I like to mix my foundation with my moisturizer and this foundation combines perfectly. Additionally, this foundation lasts a whole work day (8 hours).

reviews.review_title: New formula is not as good
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The old formula was my holy grail. I exclusively wore the old foundation every day for 5 years. The new formula doesnu2019t work with my skin and I hate that they got rid of my shade that I had for years.

reviews.review_title: A MUST FOR ALL SKIN TYPES
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE the formulation of Lancu00f4meu2019s Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation, and 245C is an exact match. The product is liquid with medium, buildable coverage and so light and breathable, the texture is skin-like. I use a smaller, but very dense, fiber foundation brush and the application is phenomenal. My skin isnu2019t oily or dry most days, though once in a while, it falls under combination. On those days, I typically have to be careful with matte foundations. Not with Lancu00f4me Teint Idole foundation. My skin is  perfectly even; no patchiness or fading. Powder and cream products donu2019t affect the flawless foundation coverage, though seem to benefit from Teint Idoleu2019s 24 hour wear. I have worn the foundation with and without primer and the difference is minimal. Some days, I donu2019t need concealer, which is incredible since I have very dark circles under my eyes.   I compared the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole foundation to my Chanel Les Beiges, and I was a little surprised to find the Lancu00f4me is superior. The Chanel is a little dusty and amplified pores that arenu2019t otherwise noticeable. My single, minor dislike is the foundation contains SPF, which is due to my personal preference and does not, objectively, change the efficacy at all.  Although I was gifted the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole from BzzAgent, I give fair reviews, as you can see in my history. I truly test the product under different conditions for nearly a month, even though Iu2019m aware it means I wonu2019t have the opportunity to test additional beauty products during that period.   *Please note I had just recovered from COVID when I took this photo a few days ago.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: glides on smoothly, offering just the right amount of coverage without feeling heavy. The shade range is impressive, ensuring everyone can find their perfect match. Plus, it stays put for hours, which is perfect for long days.  That said, it doesn't quite live up to its claim of being transfer-proof. While it holds up well, especially considering daily activities, it's not completely immune to transferring, especially in humid weather or after a full day. Despite this minor setback, Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation remains a solid choice for achieving a flawless look that lasts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been wearing this foundation every day for over a week now, and it has quickly become a favorite.  The formula is Light weight and I find that it does not need a primer, I usually pair it with a light moisturizer.  The finish is not exactly matte but more of a satin finish, I found the foundation, really looks the best a few hours into wear as my natural oils seep through. I had no problems layering this foundation with the rest of my cream and powder products. This is a long wear formula that looks good all day.

reviews.review_title: this is a must from now on
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received it for my honest review on this foundation. I love the texture of the foundation, goes on very smoothly and it does not feel dry at all. I use a brush to apply the foundation goes on lovely. I love how my skin feels as if I was not wearing any foundation on at all. This is my first time ever using Lancome Foundation and how I see what people are talking about.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 340W - For medium skin with warm/golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a new longwear foundation to try after religiously using Estee Lauder Double wear for a few years. Lancome tient idole had great medium to full coverage. It did not settle into my fine lines and look really natural on my skin. The shade match was great also and it matched my warm undertone. I prefer my foundations to be medium to full coverage so I can tone it per my preference. I did set it with the Kosas cloud set powder. It wore really well throughout the day however did break a little on my chin after 6 hours which is usually my problem area. Which is why I reduced a star but overall I do really like this product and would recommend it to someone who has lesser of an oily t zone/chin area. My mother in law uses and loves this foundation since a few years and it sits really well on her skin.

reviews.review_title: This will be my Go to summer foundation.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am enjoying the formula of this foundation. Itu2019s really hydrating and It gives me a matte finish. I applied With a brush and the product how so on really smoothly, There is no streaking or clumping. It was really easy to blend in to my skin, And what I loved was that the coverage was medium to full depending on the look I was going for. I could build and add more foundation for complete full coverage. And even when I had full coverage on, it was not heavy on my skin! My skin felt breathable. Itu2019s also great to know that thereu2019s SPF 25 in it so I have that added sun protection. After a couple hours, I am not oily in my Tzone and thereu2019s no budging Foundation, itu2019s a really great formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really beautiful product. Lancome is a brand that you know is going to be quality and this product really lived up. The color match was really perfect which I was happily surprised by since I chose the color online. This foundation goes on smoothly and feels great on the skin. I always go for light to medium buildable coverage foundations but 4 stars from me because I felt myself needing to apply more than usual to get my normal coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have loved LANCOME for years and used several of there foundations so my EXPECTATIONS where higher but this formula is next level for me IM IMPRESSED and for about 8 weeks I have wore this everyday I CAN TELL WHEN I SWITCH BACK ON DAYS I Didn't.. most days I USE AS A CONCEALER as well.. IT COVERS THAT WELL ..it wears SOOOO nice 10 + hours WITHOUT Separating I it drys down nicely without feeling heavy sticky or rolling ..I feel like most skin types could use this formula I can tell a big difference when it comes to cosmetics and foundation... some are worth the splurge some NOT... this is one OF THOSE GEMS worth every penny It is concentrated and pigmented...1 pump is all I need on a daily and 2 if I'm going full coverage..AND CONCEALING l was impressed with this formula not just the coverage but the tone and color match on my skin didn't look fake I went a little lighter so I could use with my cream bronzer and it really worked well with other products I didn't need a primer and it mixes well with a moisturizer for a lighter coverage if needed..THIS FINISH IS UNIQUE I HAVE ALREADY PURCHASED THE 250 SO THAT I CAN WEAR IT IN THE SUMMER MONTHS

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love Lancu00f4me. The brand is super consistent with all of their products. This foundation is buildable and didnu2019t move all day. Color matched correctly and there are many different shades to choose from. What I loved about this product is that it was easy to distribute and it didnu2019t not cake. I love that it didnu2019t have any orange tint to it unlike some foundations do. I will be purchasing this once I run out. Price point seems fair.

reviews.review_title: Pretty nice coverage and very lightweight!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This glass bottle is very luxurious, but the tip at the end of the pump gets very gooped up and doesn't completely dispense onto the surface.  The foundation itself is very nice.  It has a thinner consistency, and looks pretty full coverage after application.  I have found that it does dry pretty fast, and it does cling to dry patches (I have combination skin - oily in T-zone, dry on cheeks).  I do have to moisturize my skin VERY well to prevent that from happening.  I tried applying it several ways - finger, wet blending sponge, brush.  I think the most successful was the sponge.  The finish is very nice - it says matte, and it is for the most part.  I do get a little shine in my T-zone, but it does control oil better than most foundations. I think the nicest things about this foundation are that it feels lightweight and has the SPF in it.  - Thank you to BzzAgent for allowing me to try this foundation for free!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s been my go to ! I love how itu2019s a full coverage foundation but itu2019s light weight Iu2019m a sweaty girl and there was no budging or transfer and the finish it gives my skin chefs kiss and brown girl approved  !

reviews.review_title: Flawless Finish All Day Long: A Review of Lancu00f4me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation promises a flawless complexion that lasts all day, and it certainly delivers on that front.  One of the standout features of this foundation is its impressive staying power. True to its name, Teint Idole Ultra stays put for a full 24 hours without fading, creasing, or transferring. Whether you're facing a long day at the office or dancing the night away, this foundation remains intact, ensuring your makeup looks fresh from morning until night.  That being said, there are a couple of drawbacks to consider. While the foundation does an excellent job of controlling oil and shine, it may not be the best option for those with extremely dry skin, as it can accentuate dry patches. Additionally, the price point may be a bit high for some, but considering the quality and performance of the product, it's well worth the investment.  In conclusion, Lancu00f4me's Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Foundation is a standout product that lives up to its promises. With its long-lasting formula, comfortable wear, and extensive shade range.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As I head into my mid 40u2019s, I have recently been on a mission to find a foundation that doesnt settle in to my fine lines and wrinkles.  This foundation doesnt!.  Itu2019s very pigmented so I dont use very much, but it could definitely give almost full coverage.  I do prefer a dewy look over matte, however that isnt a fault of this product.  Itu2019s easy to apply, blends easily, doesnt have any scent and doesnt irritate my skin.  All wins in my book!

reviews.review_title: Smooth, light weight, and good coverage
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a lot of hyper pigmentation and acne, and I just wear small amount spread it, I love how light weight this is and does not feel heavy on the skin. And has good coverage, definitely recommend to people who have dry and combination skin, just love it.

reviews.review_title: One of my go to foundations!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m really enjoying this foundation! Definitely matte but not too drying like a lot of matte foundations iu2019ve tried. Canu2019t really decide if itu2019s worth the price so thatu2019s why I give 4 stars, but really love the finish of this on my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorite foundation now. It has sun screen spf 25. It has a matte finish that is non drying, leaving my skin looking smooth. It is so light on the skin I feel like wearing no foundation at all.

reviews.review_title: Finally, a foundation that I love!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised after using Lancu00f4me Twins Idole Ultra 24H Foundation. I previously stopped using foundation because products would make my fine lines appear more noticeable. The Lancu00f4me Foundation covers well and does not settle in my wrinkles. It makes my skin appear smooth and covers age spots and under eye dark circles flawlessly. It does not make my skin feel dry but still keeps it matte looking all day. Iu2019m so happy to find the perfect product for my aging skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is really great for those who want a full coverage, satin finish look. It is a great classic foundation that I have used for years. I like using powder bronzer and blush over this foundation for a smooth look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new go-to for during the day.  Typically, I wear the Chanel water tint/the Covergirl dupe during the day because I don't need a ton of coverage. I found that without setting powder it is more natural/slightly dewy finish (which I actually prefer) and with setting powder it is more matte.  Wears all day long and doesn't feel oily.  I received this product for free in return for my honest feedback.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: My favorite from day to day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin

I got a darker shade to accommodate my summer tan and itu2019s perfect! It leaves me with a golden finish PLUS spf! Love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

I have a few sunspots and this covered them up not fully just slightly to where my skin looked even and radiant. it is pretty light weight and I paired it with my huda beauty setting powder and they worked very well together. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Idole Ultra Wear is amazing. Full coverage, but still looks natural. It controls shine all day long. Two thumbs up!

reviews.review_title: A must have in daily routine!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for an everyday foundation  and Im very content with this one . Its light, buildable, perfect for everyday use. I have combination skin and it lasted all day with minimal breakup. Blended well with other products which i love .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s giving SKIN! I was blown away by this foundation and how it looks so natural on my face. I had to wipe to make sure I had foundation on. The matte finish is such a nice touch to this formula. Itu2019s long lasting and by the end of the night it looked just as fresh as it did when I applied it in the morning. I went to a wedding and danced the night away and my face LOOKDT GOOD!!!! I would definitely recommend this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is so lovely! Iu2019ve been using it for a week before reviewing. The packaging is gorgeous for starters! A little goes a long way, and the product is very buildable! Its blends like a dream and dries down matte. It feels very lightweight on the skin, and will truly last you all day especially if youu2019re like me and touch your face throughout the day. It doesnu2019t leave a greasy/oily feeling. Just wonderful and worth trying out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: You will need to ensure you have prepped/hydrated your skin prior to use. Upon receiving the product I applied a little to my skin just to see if I selected the right color match and could tell instantly this can look very dry on your face if you do not moisturize first. Next use I made sure I applied my moisturizer's (20 mins prior) then dabbled product on my face using a foundation brush. Once the foundation had time to set my face looked flawless. From the first time I applied to the second time around the foundation's results were night and day! I have a new go to item. It's very light weight and buildable. SPF is a super plus! I am mid 40's with combination skin.  I would recommend this to anyone that is looking to try a new higher end foundation, I was pleasantly surprised with the outcome. Even with a matte finish you can add a finishing spray that will give dewy results and will have no impact to the staying power. Please note I received this foundation complimentary from BuzzAgent in exchange for my honest review.  #Buzzagent #Lancome

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation really lasted 24 hours! I didn't have to use much because it was buildable. It was also a nice subtle coverage. The color was jus right! I would definitely recommend! Huge fan of Lancome products so I wasn't disappointed in any way. Perfect matte as well hardly any shine outside of a little sweat since Im located in the south.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using the products a few times, it was not a great fit for my middle-aged, dry skin. It seemed to make my fine lines more prominent. I shared with my daughter who loved it. The finish was smooth and it stayed put. Itu2019s perfect for dance comps and performances.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation color 310N is a easy to use long lasting foundation that's has gorgeous results! I would definitely recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a darker skinned woman it am be hard to find a really good foundation that matches and doesnu2019t dry out my skin. This looked beautiful and it felt great too. It look just like my skin but better! I would definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used this foundation a couple times and Iu2019m a fan. I love that its buildable and doesnt look cake-y after Iu2019m done applying my makeup. Also out of habit I sometimes touch my face throughout the day which leaves me with less makeup on my face by end of the day. This foundation seems to stay on longer compared to my nars, fenty, and haus labs foundations. This is not a dewy foundation. If youre looking for a foundation that will make your skin look dewy - this isnt it. Its more matte. Overall this foundation is pricy but its worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Light weight and you can layer it! Lasted 12 hours without moving! I found it to be glowy but not over shiny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Has a nice even and matte finish. Lasts through my workouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I  love this foundation as it is not too heavy, gives great coverage, and lasts all day. I also love that it protects my skin by SPF 25 and giving a matte look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In the last week of using this product, I absolutely loved how the foundatuon blends with my face perfectly. looks like I'm not even wearing the foundation in the first place. I will most definitely be puchsing it again when I'm done with the one I have. A big plus is the SPF. Highly recommend it. It's a must have!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

This is supposed to be the matte formula but it was not matte on me until I set it.  Maybe it's because foundation tends to make me look oily.  With that being said, I was not super oily after 8 hours of wear which I'm impressed with.  I really like this foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation for a week and wanted to share my experience. The packaging is super nice and very high quality. A little product went a long way when I was applying with a beauty blender. Blended in really nicely and dried down to matte. No issues applying anything over it. Wears the whole workday with no issue. I'm normally not a huge matte fan but found that I really enjoyed this product. Would recommend to a friend if looking for a matte foundation. Also, great shade match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this formula. I was skeptical about the shade as it was chosen by looking at a modelu2019s photo, however it matches so well it almost looks like I donu2019t have any makeup on! The coverage is buildable without feeling cakey. Definitely an add to cart (and routine) item!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Lancome Teint Idole Ultra Wear foundation goes on easily, very clean feeling and light weight on my face. It gives me great coverage and has sunscreen to keep my face safe from sun damage. #Buzzagent #Lancome

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 110C - For fair skin with cool/pinky undertones

reviews.review_text: The 110C color is a lot lighter than I was expecting it to be but it would be a good winter foundation for me. I have very dry skin and matte can be difficult for me, but this foundation worked well and made my skin seem hydrated while still being matte

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

I've never liked how it would sit on my face. This actually surprised me. I'm blown away. Dried pretty quickly. Heavy, glass bottle with a pump.. every girls dream. You can't feel it on your face! reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: New everyday foundation for the summer!

reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! It feels super light on my skin while simultaneously giving me a perfect amount of coverage to even skin tone out. I love that it has SPF in it as well. Lasts all day!

reviews.review_title: Good not great for oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Firstly Iu2019m impressed with the amount you get. I feel like sizes are getting smaller and smaller and this is certainly not the case with the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear foundation. I have oily combo skin. I tried this foundation with no primer, illuminating primer and mattifying primer and got the best results with mattifying primer + mattifying setting spray but still needed to power and blot within 4 hours of wear. Besides that the foundation feels very comfortable on the skin and is a true buildable formula. This does have SPF so if you are sensitive keep this away from your eyes or it may cause mild irritation.  Overall I do really like this foundation and would recommend to people looking for a soft matte with buildable coverage. Please note I received this product for free to try and review.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 225N - For light skin with neutral/peachy undertones

Provides the right amount of coverage, doesn't look patchy, and has sunscreen which is always a plus in my books.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received as gift , I have been using for 2 weeks , it's amazing looks stunning on the skin , I am mot a foundation girl ,but this one make me change my mind , so pretty not drying , easy to wear like skin ,of course highly recommended ud83dudc4cu2764ufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this foundation complimentary from BzzAgent in exchange for my honest review.  I was skeptical at first because there is a slight perfume scent, but thankfully it doesnu2019t last.  The formula is very lightweight & coverage is buildable. The shade match was actually perfect. My skin gets very oily throughout the day and this foundation holds up! I may have to blot once or twice, but thatu2019s the least Iu2019ve had to blot with any other foundation I wear. Iu2019ve been wearing it everyday since I got it & Iu2019ve loved it.

reviews.review_title: My go-to for reliable, flawless wear
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: From my experience, the Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation in 335W excels with its natural matte finish and offers robust, long-lasting coverage. Its waterproof capabilities have proven dependable, even through long days and adverse weather. It's my go-to for reliable, flawless wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Foundation has a smooth texture and blends nicely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the finish of this foundation. Very natural light to medium coverage and my freckles still show through perfectly. I have combination skin and this worked lovely with my skin type.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: Surpassed all expectations! Incredible must have!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm broken out rn due to my monthly however I got to test this out several times and my god this is the best foundation I own! I wiped my face, my nose was running, I for sure thought my makeup looked atrocious but to my surprise it looked just as nice as it did when I applied. Even though it's a matte formula it feels so silky smooth on my skin, it doesn't emphasize texture, and covers up discoloration quite well. I did feel like I had to apply several pumps at times to get the coverage I desired, however I tried a few different brushes and found to enjoy a large almost medium density brush to achieve even flawless coverage. Overall I'm blown away at the quality of this foundation it's a 10 out of ten even though the bottle appears small it's a sturdy glass bottle, the details are an extra bonus you can just tell its luxurious. I received the shade 135N slightly darker than I anticipated but that's ok for summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Ideal for oily or combination skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation by Lancu00f4me stands out as an exceptional foundation product in the market. It offers customizable coverage from medium to full, effortlessly concealing blemishes and imperfections while maintaining a natural look. The foundation's lightweight texture ensures comfort even with substantial coverage, and its matte finish leaves the skin velvety smooth and shine-free, making it ideal for oily or combination skin. With impressive staying power of up to 24 hours, it withstands humidity and physical activity. Lancu00f4me's wide shade range ensures a perfect match for every skin tone, blending seamlessly for a flawless finish. The packaging is both stylish and practical, featuring a pump dispenser for easy and hygienic application. Infused with skin-friendly ingredients, this foundation helps control oil and minimize pores over time, suitable even for sensitive skin. Overall, Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation delivers on its promises of coverage, finish, and longevity, ensuring a flawless complexion throughout the day, whether for daily wear or special occasions. For me, I used the 100W and it really blend with my skin really well. It stands 24 hours. I really recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin

It provides beautiful coverage and is not very heavy looking. I am not a fan of a heavy or cakey foundation. This is lightweight, provides amazing coverage, and lasts all day! I will definitely purchase this again!

reviews.review_title: A new must have in my routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: The makeup you didn't now you needed, until now!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Historically, I've had challenges in finding a liquid makeup that matches my skin tone well and doesn't leave my skin feeling dry and uncomfortable. This product is a complete game changer for me!  I have used this product for the two weeks.   Overall, when you first apply it, it feels quite light, smooth, natural and refreshing. I found that it also replaced my concealer and a little goes a long way. I typically don't go heavy and this still provided quality coverage and looked quite natural and long lasting.  As far as the sunscreen, I didn't notice anything that would indicate it as far as scent or the texture.   After a couple of days of use,  my skin feels smoother and hydrated while using it which shocked me.  Overall, I found it to be high quality product that gives you a natural look while keeping my skin fresh.

reviews.review_title: Will be buying with my own money. A new favorite!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample so had no expectations. I am in my great skin era, so I only want to wear a foundation that is going to enhance my luminosity, while blurring imperfections. I often find that many full-coverage foundations either appear too heavy, to chalky, or have the effect of over-mattefying my complexion. This was the perfect balance. I felt like I had a blur filter on with the right touch of glow.   Shockingly decent coverage with one pass of the brush despite the thinner texture of the foundation. Went on light but stayed PUT. And I emphasize stayed put because I proceeded to go to a pretty high energy concert later in the day, sang and danced my heart out and when I got home my face still looked great. Not just the foundation but it also kept my blush fresh and that always seems to fade. 10/10 recommend and will be buying this regularly from now on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a tester and am quite surprised at the results. It dries nicely, wasn't greasy or oily. I tend to have oily skin when it's humid and the product didn't come off onto my clothes, so that's a win for me. Also felt light, not like I had a face full of makeup.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 135N - For fair to light skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who has used Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation extensively, I can confidently say it's one of the best foundations I've tried. Let me break it down for you:  Coverage: The coverage is buildable from medium to full, which is perfect for me as it covers any imperfections or redness without feeling heavy on the skin.  Finish: The finish is matte but not flat, giving my skin a natural yet flawless look. It controls shine throughout the day, which is a big plus for someone with combination skin like mine.  Longevity: This foundation truly lives up to its Ultra Wear name. It stays put for hours without fading or oxidizing, even in hot and humid weather conditions. I don't have to worry about touch-ups throughout the day, which is fantastic.  Texture: The texture is smooth and creamy, making it easy to blend. It doesn't settle into fine lines or pores, giving my skin a smooth canvas.  Shade Range: The shade range is impressive, offering a wide variety of undertones to match different skin tones perfectly. I had no trouble finding my perfect match.  Packaging: The packaging is sleek and travel-friendly, with a pump dispenser that dispenses the right amount of product without any wastage.  Overall, Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation is a staple in my makeup routine. It provides long-lasting coverage with a natural finish, making my skin look flawless all day long. Whether I'm running errands or attending a special event, this foundation never disappoints.

reviews.review_title: Run to get this foundation you wonu2019t regret it.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation looks so natural. The matte finish helps keep my face from looking too greasy!  I love that it has SPF in it. Suncare is super important. I also picked the perfect shade and it blended easily and flawlessly. The packaging is slick and sophisticated as we have all come to expect from an idol in cosmetics. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage without feeling heavy on face. Doesnu2019t crease and last all day.

reviews.review_text: I've used this product for several days now and I am IN LOVE! I have mature skin and it doesn't cake or sink into my pores. It looks great after several hours of wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is my new daily foundation on my makeup routine, my shade is 420W matches perfectly with my skink tone, the consistency itu2019s not heavy, but the coverage is buildable. It has sun protection and doesn't transfer, which saves me a lot of time doing makeup. I loved Lancu00f4me products they never disappoint me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The past week Iu2019ve tried it out with a few different looks, application types, and for different occasions. Off the bat, a few pros like SPF 50 and a perfect color match.   Application: I found it super easy to apply to the point where I got a solid application using my fingertips. On days where I wanted to spend more time on my makeup it also applied great with my brush.   Longevity: On a usual office day it was still looking good & matte upon completion. I also wore this to an outdoor event and despite breaking a sweat with hot temps my face stayed matte. +1 because I naturally have very oily skin.   Coverage: The coverage is buildable and I was able to skip concealing dark spots and foundation while applying with both my fingers and a brush. Itu2019s also not at all splotchy and I found that the color didnu2019t change upon oxidizing.  Overall Iu2019m really impressed with this foundation! Love that I can skip a few skincare steps by using this & get a matte foundation application that lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried out Lancome's Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation in the shade 310N, and I have to say, I do like. This new formula feels lightweight and breathable, it's perfect for all-day wear without feeling like I'm wearing a heavy mask. It goes on super smoothly and evenly, without any clumping or looking too thick on my face. Plus, it lasts all day and provides good everyday wear coverage, but you can still see actual skin, so it doesnt feel like paint. It is not opaque. It is quite transparent tbh. The scent Is neutral, which is a big deal for me because I have super sensitive skin. I've never had any issues with irritation when using this foundation. Overall, Lancome's Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation is definitely a winner for me. It's lightweight feel, long-lasting coverage, and skin-friendly formula make it a staple in my makeup bag.

reviews.review_title: Feels Like Nothing on the Skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great, medium coverage foundation thatu2019s extremely lightweight. It gives a natural matte finish. Although it comes out of the bottle as a liquid, it almost turns into a whipped texture. Very beautiful and a new favorite! I received this for free in return for an honest review.

reviews.review_text: For reference, I am a POC that tried shade 500C. It was a little warmer for my undertone, but thatu2019s something both out of my control and out of Lancomeu2019s. I did deduct a star due to there not being a lot of options for shades like some other brands and due to it feeling like it was sliding or moving on my face and appearing a little patchy after long-term wear. Otherwise, it was very lightweight and offered full coverage of my face. I really liked that I did not feel like I had on a layer of makeup. It gave a very natural look and blended somewhat well (I have a slightly cooler undertone). It looked as if I had a freshly washed face and great night of sleep!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 110C - For fair skin with cool/pinky undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you to Lancome and BzzAgent for providing this product to me for free in exchange for my honest opinions.  I received the Lancome Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Foundation in the shade 110C.  I felt that 110C was a good shade match for my fair skin tone.  The foundation provided buildable coverage, felt lightweight/comfortable on my skin, and gave me a natural-looking finish.  Bonus that it has SPF!  I liked the results best when applied with a damp beauty sponge.  It lasted well all day (12+ hours); I did not notice any settling into fine lines or clinging to any dry areas on my skin.  I would recommend this foundation to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation is an exceptional product that deserves high praise. This foundation has become a staple in the beauty industry, and for good reason.  First and foremost, the long-lasting formula of the Teint Idole Ultra 24H foundation is truly impressive. It stays put for a full 24 hours, ensuring that your makeup remains flawless throughout the day. This is particularly beneficial for those with oily or combination skin, as it helps to control shine and keep the complexion looking matte.  The coverage provided by this foundation is also remarkable. It effortlessly conceals imperfections, redness, and discoloration, leaving behind a smooth and even skin tone. The formula is buildable, allowing you to customize the coverage to your preference without feeling heavy or cakey.  One of the standout features of this foundation is its lightweight feel. Despite its long wear and high coverage capabilities, it feels incredibly lightweight on the skin. It blends seamlessly and doesn't settle into fine lines or pores, creating a natural and airbrushed finish.  Additionally, Lancu00f4me offers an impressive shade range for the Teint Idole Ultra 24H foundation. With a variety of undertones and depths to choose from, it's easy to find a perfect match for your skin tone. The formulation also works well for those with sensitive skin, as it is fragrance-free and non-comedogenic.  In conclusion, Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation is a top-tier product that delivers exceptional results. Its long-lasting formula, high coverage, lightweight feel, and extensive shade range make it a standout choice for anyone in search of a reliable and high-quality foundation.

reviews.review_text: Full disclosure, I received this product for free to test out, but let me tell you, it's earned its spot in my routine!   Alright, let's dive into my recent foundation journey! You can customize the coverage, so whether I'm going for a laid-back vibe or full-on glam, it's got me covered.  Now, let's chat about shade matching. Anyone else find it's like trying to solve a puzzle? But 505N? It's like it was made for me. Blended in flawlessly, no weird lines, just pure perfection.  And here's the kicker: I'm all about that dewy glow, but this foundation's matte finish? Surprisingly impressive. It kept the shine at bay without feeling like I was wearing a mask. reviews.review_text: The reformulation is beautiful on this product, but not good for dry skin. This dried down to a satin/matte finish. It was a medium-full coverage foundation and buildable. I enjoyed how this looked on my skin as it looked and felt like my skin could breathe underneath it. I did enjoy the way my skin was not completely matte and flat looking I still had a glow showing underneath from my skin prep. I wouldnu2019t recommend this for people with very dry skin (I would use their glow version of this) as up close I noticed it was clinging to a few dry patches in my skin which I did expect as it is advertised as a matte foundation. To be completely fair it was a lot closer in the mirror than anyone typically would be looking in person but regardless it still was clinging to my dry patches. From a little further back in the mirror it looked beautiful like my skin but better. I first tried to blend this product with my fingers as I felt it would be the most difficult and give me a chance to really feel this product and it worked so unexpectedly well. I really did enjoy this foundation and would recommend for those with normal to oily skin looking for a matte foundation with medium coverage. I took off one star as my skin is not typically that dry but it clung to dry patches (around my nose and on my chin) more than any other product I wear in my everyday makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 330N - For medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones

reviews.review_text: Absolutely recommend this product! It offers a radiant, glowy finish and is buildable for those seeking fuller coverage. reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently was gifted the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Foundation to try in exchange for reviews and was particularly impressed by its standout feature: the SPF formulation with medical-grade ingredients. This foundation not only provides excellent coverage but also offers significant sun protection, which is a major plus for anyone looking to combine makeup with effective skincare.  The foundation is a bit thin and runny but proves to be buildable, allowing for customized coverage that can be layered for a fuller effect. Choosing a shade through the promotional campaign was challenging, but I found a perfect match with 320C for my winter fair skin. The matte finish holds up remarkably well throughout the day, absorbing excess oil without the need for touch-ups.  Overall, the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Foundation excels in longevity, coverage, matte finish, and especially in skin protection thanks to its SPF formulation. It's an excellent choice for those who value makeup that also safeguards their skin.

reviews.review_text: I feel like people donu2019t hype this foundation enough! Itu2019s expensive but the wear and shade range is awesome and a bit more robust in my opinion. This foundation has been considered a holy grail for oily/combo skin so I tried it out. First off this foundation applies beautifully, but you must wear a primer or use a setting powder with it or else you're going to be an oily mess. Upon first application, I did it without primer and a setting powder, because this is 50 dollar foundation and I didn't expect to use setting powder. The primer I skipped out on because I can't find it. So this did not last me very long before I started getting extremely oily. The foundation still held up pretty well once I blotted, in fact it looked like new after doing so. The next day, I decided to apply the foundation and then use a setting powder on top, and this it worked pretty well. My makeup held up for a long time and I only needed to blot one time. I do believe that if I get a new primer that will control my oil, this foundation will look flawless even longer.

reviews.review_title: Ideal for an impeccable and luxurious look!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you Lancu00f4me and Sephora for giving me the opportunity to review the Lancu00f4me TIU 24 H Long Wear Matte Foundation for free in exchange of my honest review through BzzAgentu2019s sampling campaign. Lancu00f4me is a premium beauty brand and itu2019s no surprise that the TIU foundation feels rich on the skin!   The Lancu00f4me TIU has a very luxurious look and feel when applied. It has a medium yet lightweight coverage giving off a luminous and smooth look to the skin. It applies smoothly and leaves the skin looking fresh, flawless and radiant. What I loved the most was that unlike most of the foundation it doesnu2019t feel heavy on my skin and leaves no appearance of fine lines and creases. It is buildable and has the added advantage of broad spectrum SPF 25 so I can wear the foundation and skip the sunscreen.   The bottle is sleek, premium and comes with a pump dispenser so itu2019s easy to use the amount of foundation needed with precision. The 325 C perfectly matched my skin tone and gave it full flawless coverage. My acne marks and uneven skin tone was covered flawlessly and yet my skin felt breathable. I just applied some blush and my face looked radiant!   I am really happy with the results and the Lancu00f4me TIU foundation will now be an essential to go in my beauty regime.   I highly recommend the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear foundation. Pamper yourself!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! Great coverage but my skin still looks like skin and can breathe! I normally donu2019t wear full coverage foundations but this one may change my ways

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest opinion and review. Texturally, this foundation feels light, airy and not drying at all.  I applied using a moist blender sponge and a few pumps on the back of my hand to warm the product before applying. My skin felt pretty good inside and out after applying as opposed to sticky and suffocating like some foundations Iu2019ve tried. The coverage was medium and just right IMO and the finish was a youthful matte with some natural glow breaking through, which I love. My skin tends to look oily after applying other foundations which requires a powder to mattify (Iu2019m trying really hard to avoid all powders at the moment to increase the look of youthfulness), so this finish is what Iu2019ve been trying to achieve! The color I chose 220C may have been a little lighter than I would have chosen in person, but nothing my bronzers couldnu2019t handle. I applied this foundation in the afternoon, and after about 5 hours I noticed some minimal shine in the t-zone and chin area. Nothing crazy.  When removing at bedtime, I noticed my cleanser didnu2019t take as much off as I expected, so I used micellar water, rewashed, and then my regular toner. Probably an indication of how long lasting it will be.  Will definitely require a makeup remover.  Overall, would I buy this product? The price is a little out of my range, personally, but definitely worth every penny and highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have finally found my holy grail foundation in the Lancome Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation, shade 355N! Let me just start by saying, wow! This foundation has completely transformed my makeup game and exceeded all my expectations.  First and foremost, the shade 355N is an absolute perfect match for my skin tone. It seamlessly blends into my skin, providing flawless coverage without ever looking cakey or unnatural. Whether I'm dealing with redness, blemishes, or uneven skin tone, this foundation effortlessly evens everything out, leaving me with a beautifully smooth complexion.  But the real magic of this foundation lies in its staying power. True to its name, it wears ultra long without budging or fading throughout the day. I can confidently go about my busy schedule knowing that my makeup looks just as fresh at the end of the day as it did when I first applied it in the morning.  And can we talk about the formula? It's absolutely divine! Lightweight yet buildable, it provides just the right amount of coverage without feeling heavy or suffocating on the skin. Plus, it's oil-free and fragrance-free, making it perfect for sensitive skin like mine.  I also appreciate the sleek and travel-friendly packaging, complete with a convenient pump dispenser that dispenses just the right amount of product every time.  Overall, I cannot sing the praises of Lancome Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation, shade 355N, enough. If you're in search of a foundation that delivers flawless coverage, long-lasting wear, and a natural finish, look no further. This foundation is worth every penny and has earned a permanent spot in my makeup routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation for free from Lancu00f4me and BzzAgent in exchange for my honest review.  Let me start by saying, wow! The lightweight feel of this foundation on my skin was incredible; it felt like a second skin. As someone with combination skin, I appreciated how it kept my drier areas hydrated without adding extra shine to my oily T-zone.  One thing I loved was its buildable coverage, allowing me to customize the finish. And can we talk about the packaging? It's downright luxurious, exactly what you'd expect from a high-end foundation.  But, alas, there's a hiccup. Despite carefully selecting shade 415w based on online visuals, the color was way offu2014too dark and too orange for my skin tone. Let's just say I resembled an unintentional Oompa Loompa.  For that reason alone, I had to dock a star. And as much as I adored the foundation, the steep price tag of $57 is a tough sell for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product.  I love this foundation so much.  Itu2019s feel so nice on my skin.  Itu2019s lightweight with full coverage.  Matte finished but it doesnu2019t feel dry or cakey on my dry skin.  Itu2019s lasted all day.  So easy to blend.  It matched my skin perfectly.  I. Love it so much!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 335W - For medium skin with warm/golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the finish and the way my skin looks with this. Will repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: Must have staple added to my makeup routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: My new go to foundation for the summer

The matte finish strikes the perfect balanceu2014neither overly dewy nor flat, ensuring a sophisticated and polished appearance that lasts throughout the day.

reviews.review_title: So good and lasts all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

It seems to last most of the day when I put it on pretty thick. I havenu2019t noticed it rub off too much on random things that touch my face. My face does not feel cracked or dry after putting it on.   The color doesnu2019t quite match my skin tone, but that is my fault and not the companyu2019s fault.  Overall I really do enjoy this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 435C - For medium-deep skin with cool/rich-red undertones

reviews.review_title: Upsetting changes to both the formula and shades
reviews.review_text: The old formula used to be my holy grail foundation but this new formula and reduced shade range is not it. Warning to those with known skin allergies - they've added titanium dioxide as an active ingredient in the new formula, which I didn't realize because I was unaware they had made any changes to the formula. Since I'm allergic to titanium dioxide, I started breaking out in hives on my face. Needless to say, I'll be returning this immediately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Lancu00f4me has been my fav for years!! I am obsess with this foundation. The new formula works pretty well, wouldnu2019t change it for other brand. Coming from a super oily skin girl.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin

BEST FOUNDATION EVER! Has a consistency of a BB cream, has great coverage, truely blurs, and i can actually feel the air hit my face! It feels and looks so lightweight! Price is a little up there but im a forever customer now

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product provides full coverage and does not cause any skin issues.  However, I still prefer the stick Idole over the liquid foundation, because I can use it as a concealer.  Go to the Sephora store to find your best match.  Do not rely solely on the Sephora employees to assist in finding your color match as the lighting can vary from store to store.  Remember that your skin shade may vary from summer to winter, so you may need to blend 2 shades as you get more exposure to sunlight.  Lancome is still my favorite for reliable foundation that doesn't cause break-outs or burn my somewhat sensitive skin.  During summer, Lancome serum provides an added layer of hydration that lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin

I never leave reviews but I know some people can be very sensitive to certain skincare ingredients and wanted to warn anyone who is considering buying this. Please be more careful Sephora, sending a completely different product with different ingredients is dangerous to consumers!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: for anyone having an issue converting their old shade with the newly Lancome shades. Go to Lancome shade converter online. Put in your old shade, and it will give you your new shade that matches the old one. Mine used to be 340N bisque, which was discontinued after updating the bottles and shades. It's now saying 330N is the replacement.  Hope this helps. if you need help finding the converter, DM me @ _MIZ.BROWN22

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: I think I found my new favorite foundation.

Okay so I LOVED my foundation and Iu2019ve used mine other than Lancu00f4me for yearssss, but this new formula is not as good as the previous formula. It SMELLS like gasoline, and the shades are just not it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the new formula and shade range! Definitely get shade matched in the store. I figured out I'm 310N when I'm a little tan, and 235N during winter when I'm paler. Application is smooth and leaves my face looking flawless. I love that it stays matte and doesn't make my skin look greasy after a few hours. It also doesn't break me out! I will keep buying this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the new formula and shade range! It doesnu2019t oxide like the old formula did and makes my skin look smooth and flawless. Iu2019m 41 and get mistaken for being 10 years younger. Also, get shade matched in the store because it is too hard to do online. Iu2019m shade 310N when tan and 250W in the winter.

reviews.review_title: Great new concealer for a great price point
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really enjoyed this concealer formula - particularly, the darker shade I used for contouring. Found that it dried down nicely. Good coverage without sitting too heavily on my under eye. Note - received for free from the brand in exchange for my honest review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this product for free for my honest review. First let me start by saying I have very sensitive eyes. When I first applied this foundation my eyes teared and cried up so bad I had to remove the product. Second Application came out better but I had to avoid my eye areas. I could not get any near them because they would tear up. The product blends very well and is very buildable. I like a more natural look so one layer was fine for more coverage I ussaly two. The finish is between matte and dewy which I really liked . The product has slight scent and gets rid of redness and controls oils really well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed the old formula, so I was hesitant about trying the new one. Pleasantly surprised. Sits nicely on the skin throughout the day, did not settle into any lines. I wouldnu2019t call this a matte formula, but Iu2019m not mad at it. It gives a nice sheen. It took me a few tries to figure out the shade, but 105W works well. I was using 250 Bis W in the old formula and mixing it with a drop of Dior Backstage 1W. No need to mix the new shade with anything else. For ref Iu2019m closest to NC15 in MAC. Both Lancu00f4me formulas sit really well for me over the Caliray So Blown primer as well as the Rare Beauty one - any pore-filling primer seems combine well with these on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great concealer, it doesn't crease and it blends beautifully

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My go to foundation on a daily basis. Itu2019s great coverage and I love it on my combination skin type. It also covers by acne and blemishes really well and doesnu2019t seem to break me out like other foundations.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin that is prone to breakouts and that is dry has never looked so good, this was before my 2023 hoco, I used this shade, the lawless pressed powder, and the ysl burgundy shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m super mad that my shade 090N is not included in this new formulation. That is literally the only shade that matches me and I canu2019t find it anywhere. Not happy at all. I love this foundation just super mad that my shade isnu2019t available anymore

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how the foundation leaves my skin looking nice and matte. It also lasted me all day. I wonu2019t recc this to ppl with acne(prone) skin though, itu2019s pricy yet broke me out; worsening my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure who's bright idea it was to totally leave out all fair/light shades from this new formulation, but in doing so, when there were so few to begin with... you completely left so many longtime customers who help make that specific foundation such a long-running success and topshelf, without now. you left so many specifically fair/light shades out in addition to so many undertones. It's almost unbelievable in this day and age. And the new formulation? Who asked for this?? You totally ruined perfection.

reviews.review_title: Bring back the old formula shades
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fair, cool-neutral tone skin, and 090N in the old formula was a good, like 9/10 match for me (sometimes pulled a little too yellow but overall a great match). I liked the wear and feel of this foundation as well. Iu2019d also use 110C old formula as a summer shade. With the new formula i am struggling to find a good match as 110C is too dark for non-summer and the shades prior to that are warm/yellow toned. Also iu2019d say that 110C new pulls more yellow than the old version which is also frustrating, making it look pretty orange on me. Swatches in natural light for comparison in photo. Estee lauder 1C0 Shell is an excellent match for me, so i guess im giving up on lancome

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the way my skin looked after I used this product for an event. It lasted all evening and received so many compliments on my complexion. I feel in love with the formula and itu2019s so hard to find anything like it. Will repurchase again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancu00f4me's Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation with Hyaluronic Acid is, without a doubt, a standout product that lives up to its promises. As a makeup enthusiast, I've had the pleasure of using this foundation over an extended period, and it has truly become a favorite in my collection. The medium coverage is buildable, allowing for a customized application that caters to different occasions. What sets this foundation apart is the radiant and natural finish it imparts. The healthy-looking glow it provides is unparalleled, giving my skin a luminosity that lasts throughout the day. The inclusion of hyaluronic acid and mandelic acid in the formula is a game-changer. Hyaluronic acid ensures my skin stays hydrated and visibly plumped, while mandelic acid contributes to smoothing and refining the skin texture. It's rare to find a foundation that not only offers beautiful coverage but also incorporates skincare elements that genuinely benefit the skin.

reviews.review_title: Great for oily, minimal textured skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with very oily, acne prone, and textured skin, this foundation isn't the best. It clings to my dry acne spots and doesn't cover a ton without looking cakey. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: New formula is not for me!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use the old formula daily because it leaves my skin looking so smooth and doesn't look caked on while offering very good coverage that lasts all day.  However, this new formula is not for me.  Not only can I not find an exact color match to my skin, but the new formula is hard to blend, leaving it somewhat streaky and the consistency is thinner with somewhat worse coverage.  Additionally, it is not long lasting and even with minor sweating melts right off my face, even going in my eyes and causing burning, especially in the summer.  So sad to see this one go!  In the meantime, I'm buying up all the old formula wherever I can find it and hopefully that will give me enough time to transition to a different brand that is better than the new Lancome formula.  I would like to have faith that they might bring back the old formula, but the company has probably already spent lots of money and resources in developing the new and improved formula so I doubt they would go back to the old one.  I'm sure they were trying to produce this new formula for someone, but it's just not for me, and based on the reviews I have seen about the new formula, many life-long users will stop using this product too.  I guess all good things must come to an end.

It builds perfectly and you can touch up after hours of wear without looking cakey or patchy. I used with a laura mercier primer and setting powder. Im no professional this is easy to use. Love it!

reviews.review_text: Heinz Jalapeno Tomato Ketchup is a delightful blend of classic tomato ketchup with a mild jalapeno kick. The infusion of jalapeno peppers adds a subtle heat, creating a well-balanced and flavorful condiment. It's a versatile choice that enhances the taste of various dishes, from burgers to hot dogs. The smooth consistency and familiar Heinz quality are maintained, offering a reliable and tasty addition to your favorite foods. If you're looking for a ketchup with a hint of jalapeno warmth, Heinz Jalapeno Tomato Ketchup is a tasty and approachable option for those who enjoy a mild kick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was given the opportunity to try out this new foundation, Teint Idole Ultra Wear 325C. I am used to wearing a full coverage foundation.  I noticed over time, the full face foundation just felt too heavy. As my skin changed with age, I needed something that would conceal my fine lines and wrinkles ( not accentuate them). I really fell in love with how natural this foundation looked on. This product is lightweight and spot on when ot comes to color match. A little goes a long way, so this has lasted me quite a while. I also love the glow I get, my skin looks and feels luminous.  Thank you Lancome and Bzzagent for giving me the opportunity to sample a new and improved foundation!! I have already purchased another bottle. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a foundation with great coverage without that cakey look and feel.

This one says titanium dioxide as last ingredient, so you don't know how much supposed spf it has (could be a little as .001%) They might as well call this by another name because it's NOT THE SAME. Will go back to fenty pro filtr' when I finish this $77.00 mistake that I bought 6wks ago. There are better MATTE, OIL FREE, NON TRANSFERABLE bases out there like fenty. reviews.review_text: The new formula is absolutely horrendous. Lancu00f4me should be embarrassed. I used 215 Buff N for years and it was my holy grail foundation. The old formula was an absolute dream, but the new one is SO watery and makes me so oily. Within only a couple of hours of wear, itu2019s sliding off of my face and settling into creases. Iu2019ve also experienced an increase in small pimples, and I 100% attribute it to the new formula. What a shame. Iu2019m returning my current bottle and seeking a new holy grail foundation.

She also does not cause me to break out when Iu2019m wearing for extended periods or time (or if I fall Asleep with my makeup on.. it happens yall ud83dude05) I received this product complimentary from Influenster so I can not speak on the price point buttt Iu2019m going to go out on a limb here and say this one is worth the splurge. reviews.review_text: I received Lancu00f4meu2019s newly reformulated Teint Idole Ultra Wear foundation. The original version was renowned for its buildable, comfortable, high coverage, long wearing skin coverage, and hence was excited to to have received this product from the Lancu00f4me Community. The lightweight formula applies effortlessly, should be applied lightly, and then build where you feel more coverage if necessary. A single layer of the foundation provides ample coverage to seamlessly disguise uneven skin tone, moderate discolouration, or redness, creating a smooth, flawless canvas. For those areas that your feel you need slightly extra coverage, just a light buff and blend of extra product is all you need.
