reviews.review_title: A Flawless Complexion All Day Long: Lancu00f4me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When it comes to foundation, I've always been on the hunt for the holy grail product that provides long-lasting coverage without feeling heavy or looking cakey. My quest led me to Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra 24H Long Wear Matte Foundation, and I can confidently say that I've found my new go-to foundation.  First and foremost, the lasting power of this foundation is truly remarkable. I've worn it for full days, from early morning meetings to late-night dinners, and it stayed in place flawlessly. The 24H claim might sound ambitious, but this foundation truly lives up to it. No more touch-ups throughout the day; it's like a second skin that doesn't budge.  The matte finish is another standout feature. It provides a velvety, airbrushed look without making my skin feel dry or tight. I have combination skin with an oily T-zone, and this foundation helps control shine all day long without over-drying the rest of my face.  One of my favorite things about this foundation is the broad shade range Lancu00f4me offers. Finding the perfect shade was a breeze, and the color match was spot-on. It blends seamlessly into my skin, providing a natural look that doesn't scream I'm wearing foundation.  The coverage is buildable, which is a huge plus for me. Whether I want a sheer, everyday look or full coverage for a special occasion, this foundation can do it all. It effortlessly covers imperfections, redness, and uneven skin tone, leaving me with a flawless complexion.  What truly sets Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra 24H Foundation apart is its lightweight feel. It doesn't feel like you're wearing a mask, even with full coverage. It's comfortable, breathable, and doesn't clog pores or cause breakouts u2013 a must for those with sensitive or acne-prone skin.  The packaging is elegant and practical, with a pump that dispenses just the right amount of product. A little goes a long way, so

reviews.review_text: I am so sad they changed the formula. The formulation before was absolutely beautiful. The new formula is thick let and more oily. I gave it a shot. I went in three different times to try to find a color match since every color was changed from the original colors and now 210 is gone completely and 220 is much lighter and many of the colors which were my go to colors for summer are now much more orange or yellow. Iu2019m so sad but after 8 years I feel forced to change to a new brand. When I build coverage it makes it look caked on and my pores look huge and slight wrinkles seem much more emphasized (Iu2019m only 36 but I look older when I put this on). I wish they would bring back the old formula and colors.

It goes on like an oil slick - my fingers were literally sliding all over my face - and the coverage is so minimal. I tried building it, but then it looked awful, dry patches and sinking into lines. I'm just so sad about this. I'll have to find a new foundation. For the record, I'm 60, dry skin, minimal lines.

reviews.review_title: Good coverage, but drying, emphasize pores/creases
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Closest shade match I found so far, but after trying this product for 1 mo, I decided it was a no go. This foundation was so dry, even with moisturizer and hydrating primer. It would make my skin feel very tight and dry within 1 hour of application. Initial application was sometimes uneven as it stuck on dry patches. Through the course of the day, it was still very dry and settled into pores and creases, emphasizing their appearance. Coverage was full and was fine from a distance, but it did not look good closer up at a conversational distance. If you have oily skin though, this foundation may work well for you. For reference, I have dry combo skin. I returned the Ultra Long Wear Matte foundation and will be trying their Care and Glow formula to see if it fits my skin better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okaayyyy Lancome I see youuuu... Ive always been a huge fan of Lancome and they reformulated this foundation to be more lightweight on the skin, and they definitely delievered! I wore this foundation on a few different occasions to get the best review out of! So heres the run down... PROS: Lightweight feel, great medium to full coverage, blends effortlessly and does not dry too quickly, variety of shades to find the perfect match, i love that its a matte finish combined with powder no shine!, smell is pleasant for me theres only TWO con and its that the foundation oxides tremendously. First application to after its dried its like 3-4 shades of a difference which is kind of intense so its best ti get matched to this foundation in person rather than online in my professional opinion. The other con is it does have the toxic chemical sunscreen in it among a few other undesirable ingredients. I definitely do recommend this foundation for a full coverage look without the heaviness on the skin! This foundation lasted about 10 hours for me! I recommend finishing with a powder than setting spray! This foundation could be drying to some people with dry skin     I recevied this product complimentary from Influenster for my honest review :)

reviews.review_text: I have combination, medium, neutral skin and am in my mid forties. This Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear foundation in 350N is pretty great. It is perfect for the summertime because it is long lasting (up to 24 hours), has SPF 25, and has a matte finish. I love that it's buildable and is so breathable that you can't feel it at all. I have to stress that if you have fine lines or wrinkles, you must prep your skin with a moisturizer or primer as it can cause them to show more due to the matte formula. I like to use a sunblock that isn't oily. As long as I prep, my skin looks phenomenal when I wear this. As one that lives in the desert where temps reach up to 115 degrees, this foundation is a must for me. I don't even have to touch up. Love it!

reviews.review_text: This used to be my go-to foundation. With the change in formula and colour selection, I can't find a match as a number of shades were 'combined'. Also, this used to be product that was safe to use for a number of skin conditions such as seborrheic dermatitis, fungal acne etc, as it didn't have any malassezia promoting ingredients. This new formula now does and is super inflammatory if you have one of those conditions (if you have redness around the sides of your nose- you likely do!). This product is promoted on a number of websites/blogs as a safe foundation to select and now it is not. Super, super disappointing.

reviews.review_text: I am here to say that Iu2019m irrationally angry about the formula change. The old formula took care of me for so long I canu2019t even remember! I hate Lancu00f4me for doing this to me. Someone should be fired and youu2019ve lost a lifetime customer.

It doesnu2019t oxidize and sits well on my skin. Itu2019s a waterproof formula and claims to be transfer proof however it did transfer a bit after 8 hours! Itu2019s still pretty good if you ask me.  I will definitely continue to use this foundation! I love it. Packaging from Lancu00f4me never fails to feel heavy and elegant!

reviews.review_title: A Real Review and A New Holy Grail
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A lot of these reviews are incentivized, so I wanted to mention mine's not :). I was using L'Oreal's Infallible Pro Glow, but it's hard to come by now, I think they're discontinuing it. It was difficult finding a foundation with similar qualities, but this one is really close. I like a foundation that's light-weight, buildable, doesn't transfer, and isn't really cakey. This one has all those qualities! Estes Lauder was too cakey, Nars Light Reflecting was too greasy, Haus Labs was blotchy and cakey. The only con is the price. I wear makeup almost daily, so needing to repurchase this frequently will add up. Lancu00f4me, at least run sales ;).

reviews.review_title: I received this product as a free sample

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation was pretty good. It went onto my skin and left a nice, smooth finish. The shade was also quite good and I think it really matched my skin tone. Usually, I find it quite hard to find the perfect shade of foundation that matches my skin, but Lancome's addition of some new shades has made it easier for me to find the perfect match for my skin tone. This foundation has a medium coverage and was extremely buildable, so I could opt for having either a natural finish or a more full coverage finish by adding more layers. I could also really easily spread out the foundation using either a sponge or a brush. Like the name suggests, this foundation also lasts a long time on your skin. Give this foundation a try!

reviews.review_text: Wow! I loved this foundation because it provides great coverage while being lightweight. There are also many shades so anyone can use it! It lasts throughout the day, even in the Texas heat}t which is great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation was reformulated and feels very light on the skin, it has a medium coverage and buildable. It went on smooth and had natural look, covering imperfections, still without looking cakey. The SPF added it's great for sun protection. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 125W - For fair to light skin with warm/yellow undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this foundation. Coverage was buildable and didnu2019t feel too heavy on the face. Blended out well. Also, the pump bottle design is perfect .

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 235N - For light to medium skin with neutral/peachy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product isn't for me, I'm not a fan. Its just okay. I don't want to do touch ups every 2hrs like this product says. Don't have time for that anyway. I like my makeup to last at least for half a day. And it does smudge when brushed against something. My dry skin says it will not be buying this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the fact that this is foundation and sunscreen. It's extremely light weight, easy to apply and buildable. The initial application is a little alarming because it appears to be super light for my skin tone but then it starts to dry and blends right into your face. I absolutely love that there is barely a smell.This made me very excited to not only have blemishes covered but I also was able to fight sun rays at the same time! ud83dudc51u270cud83cudffdud83dude4fud83cudffd

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that itu2019s got spf30 in it!! I work a lot of events and this will be my go-to for those outside during the heat. Itu2019s not as full coverage as I typically wear, but Iu2019m happy with it. I received this complimentary in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is a satin to Matte finish and light to medium coverage. I used it for a 6 hours and it hold up pretty good. I donu2019t recommend this for dry skin on its own but you can definitely mix in a dewy primer to help.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I will say that this foundation was good but not great. The foundation did cling to dry patches and really show any texture on my skin. I will have to try with different primers to see which works best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I could not be happier with a product! It matched my skin tone PERFECTLY, but even more importantly my VERY sensitive skin has had no issues! I also love that it doesnt look or feel oily!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been enjoying the Lancu00f4me teint idole ultra wear foundation! It gives me a flawless complexion and a natural glow. It blends easily and feels lightweight on my skin. It has a high SPF and protects my skin from the sun. It stays on all day and doesnu2019t fade or oxidize. It also has a wide range of shades to suit every skin tone and undertone. It is oil-free and non-comedogenic, so it doesnu2019t clog my pores or cause breakouts. It is also fragrance-free and suitable for sensitive skin. I only wish I had the correct shade

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have reviewed this product as a free sample   Wow! I cannot believe I found a lightweight foundation that actually matches my skin tone. I have a yellow undertone and tan so itu2019s hard to find something that doesnu2019t make me look orange. I also hate full coverage foundation because it feels so heavy. However this one is full coverage and lightweight??? Wow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the Swiss Army knife of foundation - sunscreen, hyaluronic acid, full 24 Hr coverage, inclusive shades = yassss queen!

reviews.review_text: I think this is really nice for matte and full coverage finish. I did feel like I could see my pores exaggerated with application but maybe I need to work with the foundation more Iu2019m not entirely sure

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: f your looking for a long wearing foundation, @lancomeofficial Teint Idole Ultra Wear is full coverage, has SPF for then summer time, and lasts all day. Thank you @influenster and @lancomeofficial for the complimentary foundation which is now in my daily rotation! Love the glass packaging and that it has a pump. Minus half a star because it oxidizes slightly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am really impressed by the coverage that this foundation has, I loved the finish that it gives to my skin. It's really high coverage.
